Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Awi-aɣ-d awal ɣef Tdukkla Tadelsant Imedyazen ideg aql-ik d amaray amatu, am usnulfu d yiswan-is…
Ɛumar Mufuq: Tiddukla Tadelsant Imedyazen d yiwet seg tdukliwin tiqburin akk i ixeddmen ɣef tmaziɣt deg Lezzayer Tamanaɣt. Tennulfa-d deg tallit n lḥeṛs d tuggdi, deg yiseggasen n 1980, deg tesdawit n Bab Zzewwaṛ. D inelmaden i tt-id-yesnulfan. Niqal, d tagrawt (deg 1984) sakkin d amazday (deg 1986), deg tallit-a ideg tuggdi ur telli seg uwanek kan neɣ seg tedbelt n tesdawit, wana
... 
n yid-neɣ i lmend n tedrimt d rrbeḥ.
Mmeslay-aneɣ-d ɣef usenfar n usuqel n wunuɣen yettewliwilen ideg tekkiḍ…
Nuwi-d kra n umecwaṛ d yistidyuten isliẓranen i ixeddmen unuɣen yettewliwilen s tmaziɣt. D acu kan, nesḥissif imi istidyuten-a, ur ssawḍen ad ssenzen ifarisen-nsen akken iwata. Astidyu amezwaru ukud nexdem d Arram Productions i d-iga Mass Mohamed Arram, d imsuneɣ yernu d anaẓur azzayri i yellan niqal ixeddem deg tiliẓri n uwanek, yerna yessufeɣ-d deg yiseggasen n 1960 d 1970 kra n yizawa
...
 i aɣ-yeggunin. Timɣarin i yecfan ɣef tgemmi ha-tent la ttmettatent. Llan aṭas n yilemẓiyen i yebɣan ad lemden tirawt, maca daɣ llan aṭas n yilemẓiyen i izemren ad slemden neɣ ad arun. Dɣa ggareɣ-d tiɣri i yakk wid i izemren ad gen kra akken ad d-ssukksen tutlayt-nneɣ neɣ ad tt-semlen, ad xedmen ɣef waya war cceḥḥa, war leɛḍil. Ma d awal aneggaru netta tiwwura n tdukkla-nneɣ mazal-itent reẓment (ledyent) i kra n win i yebɣan ad t-nalel deg wayen yerzan tutlayt tamaziɣt.
Yesteqsa-t Mhenni Khalifi

Yettikki Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa di tmesrit taɣelnawt n udlis Ḥassiba Ben Buɛli deg ugezdu n Clef, id yettwasudsen deg uzamul : « Tameṭṭut d ulmud : Amennuɣ yezga ɣef usnerni d ugemmir », si 1 ama d 4 Mayu 2023, akken iban-d usnerni n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa imi id rzan ɣer tnefsart-is aṭas n medden d yiselmaden isdawanen d yinelmaden yefkan azal i tgemmi, d yidles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt, imi ttagnit anda ad walin tissufaɣ timaynutin n tsudut-nneɣ akken ad yili usnerni-ines deg yal taɣult akken ad tbin tmaziɣt deg uswir aɣelnaw.
Aya deg tmesbanit tadelsant id tessudes tkebbanit n "tɣamsa n Clef" ddaw laɛnaya n Lwali n ugezdu n Clef s uttekki n waṭas n tkebbaniyin tidelsanin di akk tamiwin yemxalafen n tmurt.

{{Palu}}: 306 km²
Palu tella teṭṭafar Tamnaṭ n Tegzirin tipasifikin i yesselḥaw udabu amarikani. Tura, tesea 200 n tegzirin, i zedɣen 16 000 n lerwaḥ. Tewwi timunnent-is deg useggas 1994. D nettat d taeeggalt taneggarut yak deg Ugraw n Leǧnas Yeddukklen. Dacu kan, ar ass-a, mazal d Iwanken Yeddukklen i yesḥerbiben fell-as, d nutni daɣen i yesselḥawen tasertit taberranit.
{{Undur}}: 288 km².
Tamurt n Undur tettwaḥkem s sin iqerray: Aselway n Tegduda Tafransist akked urehban aspenyul n Urgel. Teww
... 
1974 sɣur Tagelda-Yeddukklen.
{{Malṭa}}: 195 km²
D tigzirt n 362 000 imezdaɣ. Tusa-d deg unẓul n Sisilya. Timunnent-is tewwi-tt deg useggas n 1964. Maca iserdasen igliziyen ur tt-ffiɣen ara almi d aseggas n 1979.
{{Imaldiviyen}} (Maldives): 184 km²
200 seg 2000 tegzirin n ugaraw ahendi i d-igan tamurt-a zedɣen-ten ala 181 000 n yimdanen. Tigzirin-a wwint timunnent-nsent sɣur Tagelda-Yeddukklen deg 1965
{{Seychelles}} : 171 km²
Tigzirin-a n ugaraw ahendi uɣalent d tilelliyin seg Tgelda Yeddukklen
...
tegzirt-a n Pasifik tetten aɣrum seg lminat n zink. Nuru tewwi timunnent-is deg useggas n 1968.
{{Munaku}} : 2,2 km²
Tamurt n Munaku tusa-d sdat n Côte d’Azur n Franṣa. Γas akken mecṭuḥet, nnig n 30 000 n yimdanen i tt-izedɣen. Tetwassen s yixxamen-is n turart (Casino) akked tgeldunt-is. Munaku tuɣal d tilellit deg tmiḍi tis-13.
{{Vatican}}: 0,32 km²
D awanek amecṭuḥ yak deg umaḍal. Γur-s 770 imezdaɣ. D Vatican i d lqebla n n ddin amasiḥi akatulik. Yusa-d deg tlemmast n Roma, tamennaɣt n Ṭelyan.

Lʼinjil ɣares ṯnayen n yisemawen, qqaren-as Lʼinjil qqaren-as ƹaweḏ Ȓƹaheḏ ḏ jḏiḏ. Lʼinjil ḏayes 27 n ssuraṯ. Ssura wis ṯmenya yuri-t Siḏna Bulus u qqaren-as Ṯabrat wis ṯnayen n arrasul Bulus ɣar ȓmuminin zi Ayṯ-Kurinṯ. Ṯtarjem ḏanita s ṯmaziɣṯ n Arrif, iƹni ṯarifiṯ. Min iƹna Siḏna Bulus? Tuɣa netta ḏ aʼisraʼili ḏ axwanji, walakin ijjen n nhar iẓra Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa ḏi lwaḥi ikkar Bulus yumen zzayes. Iggi-ṯ Arebbi ḏ arrasul. Ssura-ya ḏ ijjen n ṯebrat nneɣni iy yura Siḏna Bulus i ȓmuminin imezwura zi ṯendint n Kurinṯ ḏi ṯmurṯ n Lyunan. Ḏi ṯebrat-a yura Siḏna Bulus x can n lmacakil ḏi jmaƹeṯ nni n ȓmuminin. Arrasul Bulus ḏ ȓmuminin nni ɣarsen ttarix jarasen. Ḏ netta ig iggin jmaƹeṯ nni walakin menbaƹd usin-d can yiwḏan nneɣni rezzun aḏ trayyan ḏinni aḏ buṣaren x ȓmuminin nni s useȓmaḏ nsen maci nican. Ȓmuminin ḏi Kurinṯ jjin-ṯen aḏ ggen manayenni minzi lʼiman nsen iḍƹef. Ḏ aneggaru azyen ameqqran qebȓen min ḏasen inna arrasul Bulus walakin ȓebƹaḍ ƹaḏ tƹerraḍen ṯɣuri iy iǧan nican. Yina aṯen iƹaqeb Arebbi s ufus n Siḏna Bulus ƹlaḥsab ssulṭa iy ḏas yuca i arrasul-a. Xzar swadday u klikeḏ x rrawabiṭ ḏi lmilfaṯ p-d-f bac aḏ teɣreḏ awaȓen nneɣni n Arebbi iy d yusin ḏi ssura-ya qqaren-as Ṯabrat wis ṯnayen n arrasul Bulus ɣar ȓmuminin zi Ayṯ-Kurinṯ.
X manaya, ijjen meȓa iǧa ḏi Lmasiḥ aqa itwaxȓeq-d ḏ jḏiḏ; min iǧan ḏ aqḏim aqa iƹḏu yusa-d min iǧan ḏ jḏiḏ.
(Uḏem wis 5, lʼaya 17)

Mass Boukadoum, ay iderwen, s usarag n teẓrit, deg yiwet n temlilit i lmend n umulli wis 25 n umyeḍwal n « Pelindaba » i lmend n useɣnew n wasun zeddigen seg yimrigen iɣwawanen deg Tefriqt, iger-d tiɣri i uzraɛ n termit-a i temnaḍin niḍen n umaḍal, ladɣa deg Ugmuḍ Alemmas.
« Amyeḍwal n Pelindaba yezmel-it umur ameqqran seg tmura tifriqiyin yernu d aya ay d-yesskanayen anmeqqen-nsen i lmend n wussis-a agraɣlan ay d-yellan mgal yimrigen iɣwawanen », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna, am wakken ay d-yesmekti dakken « Lezzayer tella-d gar tmura timezwura ay izemlen amyeḍwal-a yernu tedrew deg uzeddi n Tesmilt Tafriqit n Teẓwert Tabelkimant ».
Iḥettet-d Mass Boukadoum ɣef tixxutert n usebded n uzraɛ n yimrigen iɣwawanen yernu yesmekti-d dakken Lezzayer « tenḍerr aṭas seg warramen iɣwawanen ay iga udabu ahersan deg ugelluy-nnes ». Arramen-a nɣan yernu ǧǧan-d ccama deg « yigiman n Yizzayriyen », am wakken ay d-yegla waya s yisemda n diri ɣef twennaḍt. Yerna-d daɣ, deg temsalt-a, dakken tamsalt n uɣram n yidrimen i wid yenḍerren seg waya yessefk ad tefru s tmaglit.
Seg yidis niḍen, yenna-d uɣella n tdiplumatit tazzayrit dakken Amyeḍwal n Ugdal n Yimrigen Iɣwawanen, ay sɛeddant 51 n tmura yernu yebda yettwasnas deg Yennayer yezrin d allal ara d-yefken tifratin iwatan deg wayen yerzan uguren n useqdec n yimrigen iɣwawanen.

Lkelmat lemġarbiyya f'hada lmeklem ttebbeɛ qawaɛed lektaba men ktab Standard Maghrebi (Latin script). Labjadiyya teċbeh l'labjadiyya lamaziġiyya laken mɛa tebdilat ṣġira; nesteɛmlu Ġġ f'blaṣt Ɣɣ u Ċċ f'blaṣt Cc. Zyada ɛla hadak, ḥruf ljerr, lmetkuwwna men ḥerf waḥed, tetterbeṭ b'lkelmat lli tji beɛd-ha b'apustṛufa u lkelmat lmetkuwwna men kter men kelma b'ḥal raṣ-mal wella kell-ċi yettrebṭu b'meṭṭa (-). Yaser kelmat yqedru yettketbu b'zuj ṭuruq, luwwla ttebbeɛ neṭq mġarbi ṣafi (eg. mdaheb) u ttanya ttebbeɛ neṭq lluġa lɛerbiyya (eg. madahib). Lkelmtin ṣḥaḥ u teqder testeɛmel lkelma lli tnaseb-ek, laken, lukan lkelma lemġarbiyya metnuwwɛa bin llehjat, ḥsen ċi testeɛmel lkelma b'neṭq-ha lɛerbi.

Larebɛa n At Yiraten
Larebɛa n Ayt Yiraten (Larbaa Nath Irathen) d yiwet n temdint meqqren deg twilayt n Tizi Wezzu (Ldzayer), tuzga-d deg yiwet n tama d tamedrart n Tmurt n Leqbayel, u zedɣen-tt azal n 30.000 yimezdaɣen. Larebɛa n At Yiraten tella d ssuq meqqren deg Tmurt n Leqbayel n zik, u d nettat ay d tamdint tameqqrant akk deg wakal n teqbilt n At Yiraten.
Zik tella kan d amkan n ssuq, ulac deg-s yexxamen siwa taddart tamecṭuḥt, isem-is d Icerɛiwen, anda ilul-ed Si Muḥand u Mḥand. Asmi kec
... 
rten" d yiwen deg-sen, maca diɣ nezmer ad d-nernu wiyaḍ : "Yeften" ad yili yekka-d seg "Yif" + "ten", anamek-is "yif-iten" (meḥsub "yif iɛɛdawen-is akk d yiḥessaden"). Ma d "Yernaten", d isem amaziɣ niḍen, yekka-d seg "yerna" + "ten" (anamek-is : yerna-ten, meḥsub "yerna iɛdawen-is akk d yiḥessaden"). D acu kan, deg way-n yerzan "Iraten", ur cikkeɣ ara dakk-n anamek n yisem-a yeɛna "illwen" (dieux) wanag ad yili yeɛna tawacult d waytmaten n win umi fkan isem-a. ɣef way-a, ttxemmimeɣ dakk-n Imazi
...
en n zik llan ttaken ismawen ara "yesrewlen" diɣ tamattant (lmut) ɣef mmi-tsen. ɣef umedya, tameṭṭut umi ttmettaten yigerdan, zik, deg Tmurt n Leqbayel, tettsemmi-yas i mmi-s "Akli" i wakk-n "ad t-tɣanfu" tmattant, ur t-tettawi ara imi ay as-fkan isem-agi. Yessefk ad nẓer dakk-n aklan, zik-nni, llan ssexdamen-ten deg kra n tmiwa timaziɣin u llan ḥeqren-ten medden, ttɣanfun-ten yernu ur ten-ttnasaben, dɣa llan la ttwalin dakk-n lemmer ad as-fken i mmi-tsen isem n "Akli", tamattant ad asen-t-teǧǧ.

YECCU LMASIḤ inna ... NECC d TAFAWT n DDUNIT
Wenni dd ayi i ɣa iḍfaren, war iggur ɛemmarṣ di taǧest, maca ad ɣars tiři tfawt n tudart !
Aseqsi Wiss 2
Man wen iǧan d Lmasiḥ?
Inna lmalak i Yusuf: "A Yusuf, a mmis n Dawud, war tteggʷed ad ɣark tiři Maryem d tamɣart nnek, minzi min i d as-dd itwarwen, aqa netta zi Arruḥ Iqeddsen.” Uca ad taruw aḥenjir, ad t tsemmid Yeccu, minzi netta ad issenjem řgens nnes zi ddnub nsen.” (Matta 1:20-21)
Yuḥanna Amseɣḍaṣ inna x Yeccu Lmasiḥ: "Necc ad kenniw ssɣeḍṣeɣ
... 
i zzayes i ɣa yamnen war ittetwaḥaseb ca, maca wenni war ittimnen ca aqqa itwaḥasab zi řexxu minzi netta war yumin ca deg yisem n uyenni n Mmis n Arebbi." (Yuḥanna 3:16-18)
Lmasiḥ inna I wudayen nni tuɣa ixsen ad t nɣen řami tuɣa ittřaɣa 'baba' i Arebbi, issemqudda ixef nnes ak-d Arebbi: “S tidett, s tidett, ad awem iniɣ, Tamemmit war izemmar ad yegg uřa d ict n tmesřact s yixef nnes, mɣir mařa iẓra Tababat ittegg itt. Min mma ittegg netta uřa d Tamemmit ittegg amenni.Tababat ittexs Tamemmit uca
...
ma ad tt-idd ksiɣ ɛawed. Uřa d ijj war zzayi tt iksi, maca necc wciɣ tt s yixef inu. Ɣari ṣṣulṭa ḥima ad tt wceɣ u ɣari tizemmar ad tt-idd ksiɣ ɛawed. Tawṣeyyet-a ṭṭfeɣ tt zi Baba.” (Yuḥanna 10:14,15,17,18)
Min tennid CEK? Wi innan aqa belli netta ittamen di Lmasiḥ, itxeṣṣa as ad yamen deg wawařen n Lmasiḥ. Mařa war tettimned uřa daysen, ixs ad yini war ggur ad tnejmed zi řmuɛṣiyyet nnek u war ggur ad teṭṭfed asameḥ maḥend ad kides teqqimed u ad t teḍfared, war ggur ad ɣarek tiři tudart n řebda.

Amsawal-a yegga-t Khalid Ahdidouch aked Mustafa Ayned yettwafsar di tesɣunt n "Adrar" Aseggʷas 2, uṭṭun 4. Yulyuz, Cutenbir 1996. Tifray tessufeɣ-it-idd tɛawed-as tira.
Mustafa Aynid ittɣennaj, ittari tiqessisin, ca imuren tiḥuja timeẓẓyanin, d umezgun (Imesraḥ). Netta ixleq di Nnaḍur, ɣer-s tesɛa uɛicrin iseggusa. Iɣra ar tnaɣen iseggusa di ljamiɛa. Ssinni yugur-dd ɣer Hulanda.
Mammec tixḍared isem Aynid? Mayemmi ac-qqaren Aynid?
Isem-a ixdareɣ-t nnit. Wer dayi-yɛjib ca ad ggeɣ ca n yisem amya 
... 
ɛad di lmeɣrib, icten da di Hulanda, taneggarut a dd-teffeɣ di char-a. Ttuɣa raḥeɣ sejleɣ-t di Fas.
Tfekkared a tegged ca n CD?
“Lebda tfekkareɣ deg-s, u ɣer-i min deg-s i ɣa ggeɣ. Maca bac a dac-sejjlen yenni ittsejjalen ixessa: imma ataf issen-ic wen ‘ineccaren CD’. Ad yili yessen mlih belli cek d ij n bnadem ittawi-tt-idd, ɣer-s iwdan aṭṭas (Ijumhur). Niɣ ixes a ɣer-c ilint leflus-nnec, bac ad tegged CD ixess-ac aṭṭas n ttmenyat. Rni-dd ɣer manaya mala tsejjled ca n CD, ad t-acren, a xaf-s se
...
sen n yayetma-k Imaziyen bla ma ad ssedḥaren. Aɣennej ixessa a das-tsennṭed ag lwalidin-nnec d yayetma-c d suyetma-c. Ixessa aɣennej nhar i das-ɣa-teshessed ad ak-issired ul, Ssitimiɣ ad kkren yenni ittɣennjen s tidet. Maci yenni yexsen a das-ggen tteswirt-nnes deg wɣlaf n sinta waha. Maca min teḥdaj Tmaziɣt wer yelli ɣer yina ineggura. Amezruy n Tmaziɣt netnin wer t-ssinen, wer ssinen manis i dd-ittenhedda Arrif.
Gouda 08 juni 1996.
- Adrar-Nieuwsbrief, jaargang 2, nummer ,4 Juli/september 1996

Raḥim, win yecnan tizlit-nni mucaeen « Eyya-d ad m-iniɣ », yemmut ass-a
n 13 furar deg temdint n Tizi-Wezzu. Yemmut mi yeḥbes wul-is. S nnekwa-s Muḥemmed, ilul ass n 07 duǧember 1963 deg At Eisa Mimun, deg leerc n Wagnun, deg Tizi Wezzu.
Ad yesres iɣessan-is deg talwit.
Sgunfu di talwit ay acennay-nneY, ṣṣut-ik d tezlatin-ik ad qqiment i lebda,
Bɣiɣ kan ad d-xedmeɣ yiwet n tamawt, dakken Raḥim mačči deg Fransa i yemmut, deg temdint n Tizi-Wezzu. Yemmut mi yeḥbes wul-is. Ad d-yefk Yillu ssber ameqqran i twacult-is d nekni merra i t-iḥemmlen.

Se encontraron gran cantidad de palabras, solo se muestra un máximo de 1000.
Si lo desea puede refinar su búsqueda por cantidad de sílabas o clasificación gramatical
Palabras que riman consonante con generalizasen de 3 Sílabas:
ahuchasen, airasen, arasen, arpasen, arrasen, balasen, blocasen, bochasen, bofasen, bollasen, brescasen, briscasen, bromasen, cansasen, cantasen, casasen, cerrasen, chamasen, champasen, chantasen, charrasen, chaspasen, chillasen, cifrasen, covasen, cruzasen, cuillasen, cu
... 
sen, undulasen, validasen, ventilasen, visitasen, yugulasen, zabucasen, zaceasen, zahorasen, zampuzasen, zarceasen.
Palabras que riman consonante con generalizasen de 5 Sílabas:
abandonasen, abarcuzasen, abotonasen, abujardasen, acachetasen, acaudillasen, acerrojasen, acetilasen, achaflanasen, aciculasen, acochinasen, acocotasen, acodalasen, acollarasen, acollonasen, acomodasen, aconchabasen, acostumbrasen, acotejasen, acoyuntasen, acuadrillasen, acuartillasen, acuatizasen, acundangasen, adoctri
...
dicamentasen, metastatizasen, monitorizasen, papeloneasen, parapeteasen, personalizasen, pormenorizasen, regularizasen, relampagueasen, semicirculasen, sensibilizasen, serenateasen, solidificasen, videograbasen, visibilizasen, zaragateasen.
Palabras que riman consonante con generalizasen de 7 Sílabas:
antropomorfizasen, connaturalizasen, desespañolizasen, desmilitarizasen, desnaturalizasen, escarabajeasen, gramaticalizasen, interrelacionasen, literaturizasen, monumentalizasen, sobredimensionasen

I lmend n useggas n Yimaziɣen 2960, aɣaram asdawan Aeemriw n lwilaya n Bgayet iga-d yiwen n wahil d amarkanti i d -heyyan inelmaden n uɣaram-a seddaw tecḍaṭ n yiwet n tdukla tadelsant i wumi semman ITRAN. Ahil-a d win i yebdan seg 10 ar 14 yennayar 2010, dgɣa ass n 10-01-2010 tella-d yiwet n tefsirt (exposition) i yebdan ghef 10:00 n ssbbeḥ, aya s yedlisen n tmaziɣt, akked leewayed tiqburin n tmurt n Leqbayel, ma ɣef 21:00 n tmeddit seeddan-d asaru i d-yettmeslayen ɣef yennayer. Ass n 11-01-2010 mazal timsikent tettkemmil. Γef 21:00 llant-d kra n tugniwin ɣef yennayer. Ass n 12-01-2010 seg 10:00 ar 15:00 n tmeddit tella-d yiwet n temsizelt n usewwi i d -heyyan inelmaden n uɣaram, ma ɣef 21:00 uraren-d yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun. Ass n 13-01-2010 ɣef 21:00 n tmeddit ad yella-d yiwen n usarag sɣur BRAHIM TAZAGHART i d-yewwi awal ɣef yennayer, anda i d-yella usqerḍec ɣef watas n temsal. Tagara n ddurt tadelsant ad tfak ass-a n 14-01-2010 s yiwet n tmeɣra ara d-yilin ghef 21:00 n tmeddit.
Yennayer ameggaz.

Deg yiwet n temlilit n umahil d uselway-anemhal amatu n Tbanka n Tkerrazt d Usnegmu Awmazir ay d-yellan ɣef yiɣeblan n yimkerrazen deg wayen yerzan asidrem, yebder-d Mass Hemdani dakken tibankiwin ssuturent-d aṭas n teftarin yeqqnen ɣer tedrimt d usenkid akken ad reḍlent idrimen i yimkerrazen n yimendiyen, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna ulɣu-a.
S waya, yumeṛ Mass Hemdani tukksa n wakk ikmaren-a ay d-yellan d unjug deg ubrid n uskurrez n yimendiyen yernu iger-d tiɣri i tbanka-a takerrazant akken ad tessenqes amenḍar n usekker n ukaram yernu ad tessifses akaram adeblan deg tallit n tkerza neɣ n tmegra.
Deg tgara n umyager-a, aydge yedrew unemhal amatu n Usira Azzayri Agersadur n Yimendiyen, imaslaḍen n Useqqamu Aɣelnaw Agersadur n Ufurk n Yimediyen d yikataren ilemmasen deg tesɣimt n uɣlif, yenmeqqen unemhal-aselway amatu n Tbanka n Tkerrazt d Usnegmu Awmazir akken ad d-yelhu s temsalt-a war leɛḍil.

Incubator: Asali n yifuyla
Ma yella kečč d amseqdac yettwaskelsen, tzemreḍ ad tessaliḍ ifuyla seg usebter Special:Upload. Maca tawuri-agi tettwasexsi deg Incubator. Ilaq-ak ad ten-tessaliḍ seg Wikimedia Commons.
- Asali yettunefk kan i yibiruqṛaten, i t-yesseqdacen kan i kra n twuriwin tinedbalin, am uzettef n yikayaden yettwakksen.
Amek ara tessaliḍ deg Commons?
Ḍfer isurifen-agi yiwwen deffir wayeḍ:
- Tazwara slal-d amiḍan deg Commons neɣ qqen.
- Fren tutlayt-ik deg yismenyifen-ik akken ad yifsus useqdec.
- Ddu ɣer usebter Commons:Upload tḍefreḍ iwellihen. Tzemreḍ daɣen ad tesqedceḍ afecku-agi.
- Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ akk ifuyla n Commons deg Incubator.
Acimi asali yettusexsi dagi, deg Incubator?
Ɣef sebba n bug 11168! ;-)
Maca llan aṭas n yibuɣar ma txedmeḍ-t deg Commons:
- Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ tugna-inek deg yiwikiten meṛṛa n tesbeddit Wikimedia.
- Anect-a ad k-isellek seg uɛiwed n usali n tugniwin i ixuṣṣen seld asali n yisebtaren n uwiki n ukayad s-agi ɣer usmel amaynut.
- Commons yettwaxdem ɣef lǧal n yifuyla; ɣef wanect-a ɣur-s tsartit yufraren, atg.
Incubator ur yesɛa ara maḍi asenqed ɣef usali n tugniwin.

Tarusi n yinesɣuma imaynuten n Tnefrut-a, s tihawt n yinesɣuma i d-yefɣen, i wumi gan tajmilt n Tegduda deg teggara n tuɣdaḍt-nsen, d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-teḍra deg tugdut tilemẓit tazzayrit.
Ulac din ccek, yella uɣanib Tebboune. Aselway n Tegduda, isers ansayen igdudanen imaynuten. S imeslayen-iḍen, yegguccel akken ad yefk i Uwanak ansayen igdudanen n yiwen n Uwanak atrar.
Taselwit n Mass Abdelmadjid Tebboune la tetteddu ad tawi « iselkat unzigen » i tiddin n Uwanak. Ibeddel umyersi asudan akked umyersi asertan. Yerra uselway « tuqqna gar unezmar akked tilawt ».

Ur ilaq ara a nesmundel ayen i aɣ-d-ğğan yimezwura-nneɣ. Ma ulac tafat-nneɣ ad texsi, ad yeɣli lğehd-nneɣ. Yal agdud ɣur-s tigejda, yiwen ur yezmir a tent-yennal: neknni tigejdit-nneɣ d taqbaylit. Ar ass-a n wussan llan wid iḥeqren taqbaylit-nsen. Xersum ma ad d-izid uberrani. Win iran ad yelḥu ɣer zdat ad yissin ani i d-yekka. Am akken taqbaylit-ayi ur ilaq ara a d-tekk nnig tiyaḍ? Wayi d yir awal, yir awal yeqqaz irennu, deg ul yugi ad irid.
Wiyi ad a sen-nini: abrid i tetteeddi ɣef uccen, uma nekkni eeddant fell-aɣ ugar… Wid yeṭṭfen di teqbaylit-nnsen ur stufan ara a d-rren lmendad ɣur-sen. Zik-nni mi ara d-srewten, fernen ger lḥeb d ukerfa. Aclim a t-yawi waḍu, tifrac a tent-id-awin s axxam. Ayen iɣemlen a t-ffren. Ihi win tezdeɣ teqbaylit deg ul iban, win yesḥirbiben fell-as ad yessiweḍ.
Taqbaylit d nnif-nneɣ, yes-s a nettwali tifrat i yal ugur, akka i nenǧer abrid ideg ara neddu.

Tasenbḍayt n Bgayet teḥkem-dd s ijjen leḥkam maḥend ad tḥebbes akarikaturist Aqbayli Γilas Ɛinuc. Tewca-as ttuhmet n « useɣḍel zeg uselway n tegduda d ubersiggʷed ».
Ijjen tsenbḍayt (lmeḥkama) d Tadzayrit teḥkem-dd di larbeɛ-a (30 nufember, 2022) s ɛecra n iseggusa di lḥeqq n ukarikaturist Γilac Ɛinuc, i yellan berra i tmurt, s ttuhmet n “uzawar deg uselway n tegduda” d « ubersiggʷed » alaḥsab mayen tenna tayemmunt tanamurt n usnufsel xef inekraf.
Yura Γilac Ɛinuc ijjen twit zegga i dd-fesren leḥkam-nni kunṭra-nnes yus-dd dag-s « Iffeɣ-dd zi lmeḥkama n yibekkiḍen di Bgayet (ẓelmeḍ n usammer n Dzayer) leḥkam n ɛecra n iseggusa n leḥbes d ijjen uwardi d agraɣlan ḥma ad ṭṭfen Γilac Ɛinuc x arrsumat-nnes. »
Tenna tyemmunt n unufsel n inekraf, belli ttuhmat i das-wcin nitenti d « abekkiḍ n usemɣer zi ca n tmegga d tiberggʷadin, d ubekkiḍ n uzawar deg uselway n tegduda d uzawar n ijjen wegraw d anegmam »
Γilac Ɛinuc (34 n useggʷas) d akarikatursit, izwar-as ixdem di Charlie Hebdo Tafransist, d netta ass-a yettɛic di Fransa, ayenni iwweḍ ifesser x iraqqen n wemsawaḍ anamur d ca n imassen n tɣemsa i yellan di treɣmamt (opposition).

Di yunyu 2013, ɣlin-d igefran d imeqranen armi i d-faḍen isaffen di Luṛub talemmast. Di Hungarya, asif n Danub yuli-d deg waṭas n imukan akteṛ akk n zik.
Imi liḥala tebda teţţiweiṛ, aɣlif yeenan ixeddamen di Hungarya yeḍleb i lbiru aɣelnaw n Inagan n Yahwa ma zemren a d-fken afus n lemeawna deg wayen ara yeţwaxedmen bac ur d-teţţili ara lexsaṛa elaǧal n iḥemmalen n waman. Lbiru aɣelnaw iweṣṣa ihi tijemmuyae n Inagan yellan rrif n wasif n Danub ad ţekkint di lecɣal i d-heggan yemḍebbren n lḥukuma n leǧwayeh-nni i lmend n useḥbiber ɣef wemḍiq-agi.
Ayen i xedmen Inagan yessewham aṭas. Deg wussan i d-itebeen, eeddan i 900 Inagan n 72 tjemmuyae i gefkan lemeawna bac a d-ssalin leryuf n wasif akken ur d-iţfaḍ ara. Yeţwaḍleb-asen ad eellqen lkarṭat iɣef yeţwakteb “Inagan n Yahwa”, ismawen-nsen akk-d temdinin ansi i d-usan.
Yiwen ueeggal si tuddsa yeţeawanen leibad, yeţţusemman “la Croix-Rouge” n tmurt n Hungarya, yura imeslayen-agi i yiwet n tejmaet n Inagan: “Nebɣa a ken-ncekkeṛ yerna a wen-d-nesbeggen leqder d ameqran: ur nẓerr ara daymen tadukli am tagi neɣ imdanen yeţsebbilen iman-nsen am kenwi, mebla ma nemmeslay-ed ɣef wayen i d-telḥam bac a d-tasem! S zzux ara d-bedreɣ lemtel-nwen yeteeddan di temdint-nneɣ.”
Aselway n yiwet n tuddsa n usellek, i gellan daɣen d aeeggal deg Wesqamu Aɣelnaw n Hungarya, yura tabṛaţ i lbiru aɣelnaw n Inagan n Yahwa bac a ten-icekkeṛ ɣef lemeawna-nsen.

Uccen d awessar yisi igeâmez g thufret nnes, s iseggasen d netta yehrez.
D igen s wadin n uccanen ileh’rfen, iseqdeâ tameddurt-is d netta ittazzel deffer tiwji m utcu. Yegic tbuqâet as yeflic negh ccellag llhiwan y tcic sis izmer negh sen. Yessen inilta n ddunyet d dis yila mmuten d netta yeqqim yedder.
Assu y mgher d ur yezmer ayetc g ddist-is d izmaren n xxul
rah’en uâeren afellas, alaz irenni, ttallast tenned sis, yeh’cu g thufret weh’des, la mammu yesseni, gher ixsan ttemqaqasen jar tittawin
... 
mel deffer
adus n wisum, adann-is ttezfen d isinn-is tsetren allemmi an-tyezzu am tadriwin g tekrumt n igen s wadin n izmaren.
Manis yerni afella-s lhelwas d irah’ yuser mallik meââadc ghers ljuhed bac ay wett af iman-is, yukez belli inilta n xxul uâeren d uccanen llamahud wuh uci uâer d ammi ufinc matta a-tcen tteten g iman nsen.
Amyu yegged ay neggez afellas igen s wadin n uccanen ileshmen d at yetc gher ammi yeswa aman d ayu s matt ixemmem ay rwel xir-as d ay ali l wedrar, balek ay af thufret
...
ijit teggay dis.
Qdeâen afellas iseggasen d netta yehcu g wedrar, yuser, tafenzuzt-is tneqqel d id’arren-is qquren s usemmid’, yetmita g adin n izmaren la rahen afella-s, ickelt ay af tyardest, ickelt tili temmut d ickelt ay qqim blac.
Tamettant tqerreb sis, yerni afella-s axetref, ijjujaf s iberkas d izmaren alemmi yehbel s alaz d irah’ issufagh
g ixef-is s thufret d iâegga, iâegga id ikmel.
D ayu d lhal n tmeddurt ussan gguren, izmaren ttazlen
d uccanen iwessaren aqqimen âeggan !
Sassi Dehmani

Ɛeddan 150.000 n yinelmaden i yeṭṭfen abrid n lakul iḍelli. Azal ameqran deg-sen d yinelmaden n uɣerbaz amenzu, imi 72475 i yettwasejlen i unekcum aɣurbiz 2011/2012. Deg uɣerbaz alemmas wweḍen 58 421 n yinelmaden. Ma d anekcum ɣer tensawinyin ugar n 27.000 n yinelmaden i teɛna temselt.
Si tama nniḍen wekkden-aɣ-d srabes n tenmehla n trebga belli 1086465 n yidlesen n uɣerbaz i iweǧden.
ad ner lwalah, belli testfayed-d lwilaya n Tubiret s 14 n yiɣerbazen akked d 30 n tzeqqa n usečči ara yeldin tiwwura nnsen, aseggas-agi.
S.O.A
“3,6” d laksida d wass
36 d laksida i d-yellan gar 28 seg waggur yezrin ar 04 seg wagguru n ctember, deg lwilya n tubiret. Tiwaɣiyin-agi glant-d s 62 d amejruḥ akked 2 n tmettatin.
Almend n usali-agi d-fkan n laman, iban-d belli 36 n twaɣiyin ḍrant-d ɣef tuɣzi n ɛecra n wussan. Aya yesbegen-d belli llant-d 3,6 d laksida d yiwen wass.

1Ɛisa Lmasiḥ isellek-aɣ iwakken a nesɛu tilleli n tideț. Ihi ḥerzet tilelli-agi, ḥadret aț-țuɣalem d aklan !
2?esset-iyi-d ! Nekk Bulus, nniɣ awen-d : ma yella tḍehṛem, Lmasiḥ ur kkun-infiɛ ara.
3Yerna ad ɛawdeɣ a d-iniɣ i yal argaz i gḍehṛen, belli ilzem ad ixdem ayen akk i d-tenna ccariɛa.
4Kunwi yețnadin aț-țuɣalem d iḥeqqiyen zdat Ṛebbi s ccariɛa, ur d-yeqqim wacemma gar-awen d Lmasiḥ, tețwaḥeṛmem si ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi.
5Ma d nukni, nessaram a ɣ-yerr Sidi Ṛebbi d iḥeqqiyen zdat-es ; ayagi n
... 
 ɣef Lmasiḥ ițwasemmṛen ɣef wumidag, ur yețțili d ugur ula i yiwen.
12Wid-nni i kkun-icewwlen ɣef ṭṭhaṛa ad ṛuḥen ihi ad ɛegben iman-nsen.
13Ay atmaten, Sidi Ṛebbi ifka yawen tilelli, ur d-țafet ara sebba s wayes ara txedmem s tlelli-agi lebɣi n tnefsit-nwen ; lameɛna beggnet-ed lmaḥibba yellan gar-awen.
14Axaṭer lameṛ i gesdukklen meṛṛa ccariɛa d wagi : ḥemmel lɣiṛ-ik am yiman-ik .
15Ma yella tețțemkerracem am lewḥuc yerna wa itețț wa, ḥadret iman-nwen neɣ m'ulac yiwen ad issenger wayeḍ.
16Ddut
...
yakan : wid i gxeddmen lecɣal-agi ur seɛɛun ara amkan di tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi.
22Lameɛna atan wayen i d-itekken si Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen : leḥmala, lfeṛḥ, lehna, ṣṣbeṛ, lehhu, leḥnana, liman,
23ul yeṣfan, aɣlab n tnefsit ; eɛni ccariɛa tugi annect-agi ?
24Wid yellan n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, semmṛen ɣef wumidag lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen, s ccehwat-is d umenni ines.
25Imi d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-d ifkan tudert, ilaq-aɣ ihi a neddu di lebɣi ines.
26Ur ilaq a nessimɣuṛ iman nneɣ, ur ilaq a nețnaɣ neɣ a nețțemyasam wway-gar-aneɣ.

LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Imuhal n tɣimit tis 3 n Udiwenni astratijan azzayri-afransi bdan ass n lḥedd deg temdint n Lezzayer ddaw tselwit n uneɣlaf n Yweẓla iwerdaniyen, Abdelkader Messahel, akked umtil-is afransi, Jean-Yves Le Drian.
Imuhal n temlilit-a medlen fell-asen, usan-d seg d-yeḍra, deg tsebḥit, tiɣimit tis 4 n Useqqamu ucrik adamsan azziri-afransi (COMEFA).
Adiwenni astratijan, i yellan gar snat tmura, d akatar arulɣan ara yessiwḍen sin yeḥricen-a akken ad fesren tiselḍin-nsen akked umbiddel n telɣutin yerzan icqirrwen akked tegnutin tiɣellisanin, dɣa amhaz n tremɣa.

Sidi Ḥmad u Musa
Aḥmad U Musa nɣ Sidi Aḥmad U Musa (1460 - 1563) ikka tt inn iga yan umurabiṭ, agrram amuslm d argaz n ddin ɣ Taẓrwalt ɣ tmazirt n Sus ɣ Lmɣrib[1].
Iga Ḥmad U-Musa yan zɣ ixatarn n mutaṣawifin ɣ Lmɣrib ɣ uzmz nns ɣ tasut tis-XVI. Iṭṭaf tazdayt ifulkin d iṣulṭaniyn Isaɛdiyn, agrram ad ittuysan ig yan urgaz ilan bahra atig ɣ umzruy, d lqist nns ttussan ɣ kraygat mani ɣ tmazirt n Sus. Ittussan Ḥmad U-Musa ɣ warratn iɛrabn iqburn ddu yism n Aḥmad Bn Muha Al-Jazuli As-Smlal.

Deg wahil n wass wis sin n terzi-nnes, aselway n tegduda Tebboune ad yerzu ɣef temḍelt n usersal n Tegduda n Ṭṭerk, Mustafa Kemal Ataturk, deg Ankara, am wakken ara yerzu ɣef usalay n teftarin d tɣawsiwin tudmawanin n uselway-a aqbur.
Deffir terzi-a, ad yemmager uselway aṭerki, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, aselway n tegduda deg usuddis aselwayan anda ara ssiwlen ɣef wassaɣen isindisanen yernu ad derwen, deg udiwenni-a, daɣ, yineɣlafen n snat-a n tmura.
Deffir yidiwenniyen-a, ad zemlen imtawayen d tsektayin n umsegzu i usdusu n unmireg gar Zzayer d Ṭṭrerk deg mennaw n tɣula.

7 n yiɣrbazen deg Tubiret…
Tella-d tulya tunṣibt n 7 n yiɣerbazen deg lwilaya n Tubiret, taṣebḥit n wass-nni n larebɛa yezrin, i d-yellan d ass amenzu n tuɣalin n warrac ɣer leqraya. Gar sebɛa-agi n yiɣerbazen, llan setta deg-sen d iɣerbazen imenza. Sin seg-sen deg tɣiwant n Tubiret, tlata-nniḍen deg Ṣur Lɣezlan, wayeḍ deg Lexḍariya. Akked yiwet n tesnawit tamaynut deg tɣiwant n Meɛla, i d-yezgan tama n ugafa-amalu n lwilaya n Tubiret.
… Rebɛa-nniḍen deg Bgayet…
Deg wass amenzu n unekcum n yinelmaden ɣer tneɣriyin-nsen i useggas-agi aɣurbiz amaynut 2017/2018, ula deg lwilaya n Bgayet, yella-d uftaḥ n ukuẓ n yiɣerbazen ijdiden, i d-yernan aseggas-agi. Iɣerbazen-agi d wigi: sin n yiɣerbazen imenza ldin tiwwura-nsen i yinelmaden ass-nni n amhad iɛeddan lewhi n 07h30 n ssbaḥ, yiwen deg tɣiwant n Bgayet, wayeḍ deg tɣiwant n Amiẓur. Tella-d diɣ tulya n yiwen n uɣerbaz alemmas deg Tiniri, yetabaɛen ɣer ladayra n Ukfadu, akked tesnawit tajdidt deg tɣiwant n Tuja, deg ladayra n Leqsur. Am wakken daɣen i bnan azal n 32 n tzeɣwa n waddal akked wazal n 23 n yinurar n wurrar i lfayda n yinelmaden yeqqaren, ladɣa wid n uɣerbaz alemmas d wid n tesnawit.
… Deg Tizi Uzzu, llin tlata n yiɣerbazen
Ula deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, llin kraḍ n yiɣerbazen-nniḍen tiwwura-nsen i yinelmaden ijdiden n useggas-agi. Yiwen deg-sen d aɣerbaz amenzu n tama n Uẓeffun, akked tririt n sin n yiɣerbazen-nniḍen ilemmasen d tisnawiyin .
Ghani Amazigh

Mala nessawal x temɣarin ibedden deg wudem n uḥewwas, d amezwaru ad neydar tajellidt Tamaziɣt Dihya i yewwḍen ad tbedd deg wudem n usugi Aɛrab i Tmazɣa, din Lalla Faḍma n Sumer i yesbuhliyen ifransisen s tiɣist-nnes, tjull ad tewseq ifransisen zi tmurt n Iqbayliyen.
Di Arrif, timɣarin irarent ijjen tilalt ula d nitenti di tnezbayt, s tzemmar-nnsent i yeggint deg uswizi n yemjahden, maca ula s yezlan-nnsent i d-isfaqqan targazt deg wulawen n imeɣnas.
Tawgrat Ult Ɛisa: tasedda n Ayt Sexman.

s nnan imerzuten ?
Izlan-a nnes i ttuɣa yellan d tirjet treqq, tejja ifransisen ad tt-iydaren deg idlisen-nnes.
D aya i yejjin ijjen ameknaw François Reyniers a tt-id-iydar deg udlis-nnes “Taougrat: Ou les Berbères racontés par eux-mêmes” (Tawgrat: Xmi i yettɛawaden imaziɣen x ixef-nnsen). Adlis i x-as yura wer yeɛdi 80 n tefray, yeffeɣ-d di Paris aseggʷas n 1930.
François, ɛemmers ma yemmelqa Tawgrat, maca ttuɣa ittesla x-as waha, maca ijmeɛ izlan-nnes, isturjem-iten s twiza n tarwa n tmurt-nni
...
emma x imseksiten i ttuɣa yellan deg Iceqqiren, Ayt Sexman d Ayt Yeḥya d tmewwa-nneḍni“.
Zeg yezlan-nnes
Izlan-a maci neksi-ten-d zi Tmaziɣt nican, maca d asuɣel waha, ḥaca negga ammu maḥend a nades ɣer min txes ad tini:
“Wwḍen-d Irumiyen, swin zeg weɣbal n tsaft
Wer ggʷiden, cedden din iysan, wtin lewted
Imaziɣen, waxxa ketren
Axmi wer llin”
Tenna ɛawed:
“Ssijj-d a Tuda, laɣa-dd x “Yezza” d “Yeṭṭu”.
Aqqa tus-d twalat n temɣarin
Ad ksint taɛellamt n girra
Irgazen waxxa llan, maca axmi wer llin”.

Tazart !
Gar n l fakia n lexrif di tmurt n leqbayel annaf tibexsisin s lasnaf nesent ; (taemriwt, aberken, buenquḍ….). Tibexsisin seent aṭṭas n yaftilen (les fibres) akter akw n lfakia de laxaḍra niḍen. Yiwen ufasas annaf ḍeges 02 y gramen n iftilen : azal n 20% g ḍi lqut n wamden yel as. Deg saǧǧasen imeǧura ufend imusnwen aken iftilen (les fibres) ilan deg safaren n lqut ama da lexḍra neɣ ḍ lfakia seen azal meqren i wa-ken a ḍilḥu u ebuḍ akken ilaq. Daɣen iftilen agi
saḥbibiren ɣef bunaḍem ɣef w aṭṭen n lḥaqnan akkw tbuecut n lkunsir. Iferw-en n ifitwen mara d qaren t magand ḍ laelef i y zgaren. Tazaret di targit n bunaḍem ḍ azamul asedi

Isuffeɣ-d unaẓur Aqbayli Lounis Aït Menguellet deg usebter-is n Facebook tanazalt{affiche} tunsibt n usiḥar-is n ccna i t-yettraǧun ass n 26 wamber 2022 deg tzeqqa n Accor Arena di Paris.
Seld lɣiba iḍulen, iban-d ihi s wudem unsib yiwen n ttiɛad n ccna n mmi-s n Yiɣil n Wammas, di leɛḍil ad d-alint ahat tegnatin nniḍen sey-a ar wass-nni.
Yuɣ lḥal, d tazɣint{crise} tadawsant icudden i Covid-19 i yellan deffir n ubeṭṭel n temlilit n Lounis Aït Menguellet akked wid i t-iḥemmlen. D ayen yeḍran i wa
... 
g ugar n useggas tura.
Ad d-nesmekti dakken yella iberreḥ-d umedyaz-acennay i uzayez s tmeɣra-a deg yiwet n tvidyut i d-yesres di internet ass n 12 yennayer iɛeddan. « Ssawlen-iyi-d nnan-iyi-d ma ad tqebleḍ ad txedmeḍ tameɣra deg 2022 di Accor Arena […]. Dɣa qebleɣ, nniɣ-as ad iseɣzef Rebbi tudert […] », i d-yenna unaẓur bu 71 n yiseggasen.
Ikemmel deg wawal-is di tvidyut-nni: « Ahat sey-a ar wass-n, ma ad ilint tmeɣriwin nniḍen, ur ẓriɣ ara […]. Meɛna tagi, atan ad awen-d-ɛeggneɣ si tura ».
Yel
...
is Aït Menguellet seg yinaẓuren i iwansen azayez-is m’akken inuḥ ukman, izehher coronavirus. Ddeqs n tvidyutin i d-izuzzer imir-nni di internet, netta icennu kra n tezlatin.
Si tama n yimdanen i yeṭṭafaren anaẓur-a ameqqran, aṭas umi yehwa yisalli n temlilit-a gar-asen, ulama mazal tḍul deg wakud. D acu, zemren xersum ad ḥerzen imeḍqan-nsen si tura s ttawil n internet, war zzirban d tazzla deg wussan ineggura.

1985, ma d tis snat deg useggas n 1987, tlata wagguren mebɛed tamettant-is. Ass n, 27 tuber 1987, teḍra yiwet n twaɣit n ubrid, i d-yeglan s tmettant-is netta d tlata n yimeddukkal-is, deg leɛmer-is ala 22 n yiseggasen.
Yecna ɣef tayri, ɣef tudert, ɣef usirem d tirga n umdan. Gar wayen i d-yeǧǧa, ad d-nebder tizlatin-agi: siweḍ-as sslam, Taqcict n ɛecrin, Ini-as ay aḥbib ini-as, Tabrimt n lfeṭṭa, Ax ul-iw a llala…atg. Yettwamḍel deg tmeqbert n taddart-is deg Agouni Hamiche di Tala Bouzrou.

Awdan
Awdan (Assaɣ ussnan: Caracal caracal) d aɣersiw asuṭad amseksum yeṭṭafaren tawacult n tserɣuda, Awdan yettusismel seg tserɣuda meẓẓiyen maca d netta yakk i d ameqran deg-sent, Tazla ynes d tin yudsen ar wagla n uzdal
Aglam[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Azuk n uwtem n uwdan d win yettawaṭen ar gar n 13 ar 18 kg ma d tawtemt gar n 11kg ar 15 kg, Tiddi-ynes tettawaṭ ar wazal n 65 cm, ma d asallaf-is gar n 20 ar 30 cm ma d addud-is ar tuyat seg 40 cm ar 45 cm
Dɣa talɣa n uwdan d tin yettemcabin ar tawurta n Urasya ɣef anect-a yella yettusismel d akken-it yettili-d s waṭas i twurtiwin maca tura DNA yesbeyyen-d d akken Awdan ur d-yettili ara i tawurta maca yettili-d i uzdal
Iɣersiwen-a ttmircalen deg yak akud deg useggas maca anecta yettili-d s waṭas deg talliyin dgi yettili wučči s tuget Tamentilt n wanect-a d tilin n wučči deg tallit n unadar ɣer twetmin, Tallit n tadist d tin yettaṭafen gar n 68 ar 81 n wussan, Adis-is yezmer ad yawi seg yiwen n ummuc ar 6 n immucen

Leonardo di ser Piero da Vinci (Taṭalyanit: leo 'nardo di, sɛr' pjɛ:ro da (v)'vintʃi]; 14/15 abril 1452 - 2 mayyu 1519), ittwassen s Leonardo da Vinci, ikka-t-inn iga yan ugtusnak awṭalyan iddren g tleslalit, iruran taynit ɣer kigan n yigran zun d unuɣ, taklut, "sculpture", tasedga, tussna, aẓawan, tusnakt, tajenyurit, tasekla, "anatomie", tusnakalt, tasnallunt, tasnemɣit, "paléontologie", d "cartographie". Ikka-t-inn Leonardo da ittiri ad yisin akkʷ mayd illan ɣef ugama, ad yisin man imek s da 
... 
 ur ilin anaw, d mas t-inn-ikka daɣ, dima da as-ittaker tiɣawsiwin-nnes g taddart, idder id-s ammas n uzedduɣ-nnes i 30 yiseggʷasen amm unelmad d umazzal-nnes.
Ayyis AxatarEdit
Afares n Leonardo akkʷ ilan atig akud-ann g uzemz n twuri ɣur Ludovico, iga-t asennulfu n yan usefris axatar ɣef talɣa n yan umnay nna issudan ayyis-nnes, ad ssimɣuren is-s anebbaḍ-nnsen izwaren Francesco Sforza. Izwur-d Leonardo s wayyis, deffir mayd isker tuzrawin-nnes mliḥ ɣef tussna n tfekka issutulen anaw-ad g yimuda
...
d yales i kra n tfelwit nna igan zun d nettat.
Aseggʷas 1506, yurri-d Leonardo s Milan akked yinelmaden-nnes, idder g taddart-nnes nna d-yusan g Porta Orientale. Aɣulen yidsen g yinelmaden-nnes gan imeklawen: Bernardino Luini, Giovanni Antonio Boltraffio d Marco D'Oggione. Isker D'Oggione mennawt tunɣilin i Imensi Ameggaru, isker Luini yat i Tamgudt n Isulilen, ikʷla Boltraffio d wiyyaḍ kigan n tugniwin n yid Madonna d Urba, iɣey ad tent-inn-yaf wenna tent-iran g yisefsar n tẓuri d ula tiglizin.

Tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen FFS , d asirem, d tifrat yettwaṭerfen.
Assegas kan seld timunent n lezzayer, amennuɣ yella-d war tufra gar yimḍebren-is. Sdat n taɣert n uqerru n uselway ilemẓi, kra n yiɛeggalen n lwilayat (III d VI ) begsen-d ad ɛerḍen ad xedmen ayen iwatan akken ad qeɛden lecɣald tlufa. Snulfan-d akabar d amaynut, win ara yilin ireṣṣa ɣef tlelli d tugdut .
Tuget n yimaɣnasen n ukabar-a, d wid i d-yekren deg yirebbi n umussu aɣelnaw, uktuyen-is twarefden-d seg ugenna n wunbir d tɣerɣ
... 
-d imeɣnasen n Tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen di Paris akken ad affen kra n tifrat. Ass n 16 yunyu 1965 yeffeɣ-d yiwen n wulɣu (FFS-FLN) deg tɣamsa, amsefhem yella-d ɣef tneqqiḍin-a; “ Aḥebbus n rṣaṣ d umennuɣ- Wid yeɣlin di traḍ-a, tiwaculin-nsen ad twiɣerment- Imeɣnasen n FFS ad asen-yuɣal yiseɣ d ccan d igrawliwen n ALN- Tilelli i kra n umeɣnas d userti yettwaṭfen ɣer lḥebs.
Ass n 19 yunyu 1965 Bumedien yenneqlab ɣef Ben Bella yesseɣlit. Yesbed iman-is d aselway ɣef lezzayer s leḥkem aɛessekri. W
...
en-is. Tajmilt ara as-nerr i umeɣnas-a ameqqran n lḥerma d talwit, d akemmel umennuɣ-is d ubrid i d-yenǧer i treṣṣi n uwanek azerfan. Dda lḥusin yewweḍ leɛfu n rebbi ass n 23 duǧember 2015. Ass n temṭel-is 01 yennayer 2016 d tamesbanit. Ulac tamnaḍt di tmurt neɣ berra i tmurt anisa ur d-usin ara. Annect-a d tajmilt i as-d rran ɣef wayen i d-yefka di tudert-is. Dda lḥusin iɣsan-ik di lǧennet, steɛfu di talwit.
Karim Sɛawi.

AT YA∑LA (SIWEL) – Win yesdergen iman-is
Di tizi n leḥris
Ieemmed ne yettekka.
Seg yiseggasen n tegrawla n Lezzayer ar Tefsut Taberkant, ulac win igan azal i Leqbayel, amzun d tigdi n usteeref s weɣref yefkan azgen seg-s i lmut mgal Fransa; azgen-nniḍen yebḍa ɣef sin yiḥricen:
amezwaru yefreq gar wid yettikkin di lgirra (wid tezgel lmut)
wis sin d wid yeṭṭfen tudrin, tuget d tilawin, d arrac akked yemɣaren, dɣa yes-sen i teqqim Teqbaylit akked yiseɣ-ines rnu afus n tallelt i fkan i yemjuhad s wu
... 
nuɣ ɣef tlelli d aẓar mačči d ifer, d ayen yesseɣlin nnig n 600 n Leqbayel s ufus n Lezzayer taderɣalt, taḥeqqart, tabeetit.
Lezzayer i ɣef nnuɣen Leqbayel, teqqim-d kan deg yisefra d yimeṭṭawen yesswen akal n temnaṭ tis 3.
Aẓar umennuɣ ɣer Yiqbayliyen, yuki-d i tikkelt-nniḍen di 1980 imi tugdudt akked yiseɣ Aqbayli ifelleq-d zdat leḥkem amalus n Wejda, maca berra i Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen, ur d-iḥerrek ula d izi amzun d tilisa tigraɣlanin i yettwasbedden gar Leqbayel d Yizzayriyen n yiwen ukabar.
X
...
baz abeeti; aya ixelq-d idles n usuter nebla tigdi neɣ aḥbas.
Di 2001, tekker-d Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen s lǧehd mgal lbaṭel n udabu i d-irebban wid yettrun ɣef warrac n Ɣazza nebla ma xemmen ula s lɣiḍ ɣef warrac n Tmurt n Leqbayel yeɣlin ɣef tugdudt di Lezzayer n 48 n lwilayat.
Syin, fehmen warraw n Eebban Remḍan amgared gar tzemmurt d tezdayt imi yessefk ad d-yawi yiman lehna i yiman-is uqbel ad d-yezger nnger akin i lecqayeq.
Win yesdergen iman-is

Ieemmed ne yettekka

Tɛawed-as tira: Milouda El Hankari.
“Ijjen useggʷas ttuɣa laẓ aṭṭas di Arif; ij urifi iruḥ ɣar ijj n ṭṭaleb, inna-as: tarwa-inu ttmettan s laẓ; mani zeddɣeɣ dinni aṭṭas n ilfan n lexla. Xseɣ ad-ten nɣeɣ ad awiɣ aksum-nsen i tarwa-inu ad kksen laẓ-nni i day-sen. Inna-as ṭṭaleb: ilef necnin imselmen ḥaram xaf-neɣ ad t-necc, lexmi ɣa tenɣed ilef, kkes-as zeg ucekkrud ttaksart.
Lexddenni arifi-nni iruḥ ɣer taddart-ines, iksi lmeddfee-ines, iffeɣ ɣer lɣabet, inɣa ij n yilef iɣars-as, yuza-t, irra-s icekkrad tsawent, ikkes zeg ucekkrud ttaksart, iwi-t-ɣer taddart-ines ad t-ccen.
Zi lexdenni ar zdat kul nhar ineqq ij n yilef ittawi-t ɣer taddart-ines armi iedu laẓ, yusi-dd useggʷas iṣebḥen.
Lexdenni igru tilmay n yilfan, iksi-tent i ṭṭaleb issers-as-tent inna-as: a sidi, ha tilmay n yilfan i cciɣ, aqqa-k-tent; tarwa-inu snejmeɣ-ten zi laẓ, wami ixlef useggʷas ur tetteɣ ilef.
Inna-as ṭṭaleb-nni wami das yuca tilmay: ad tirḍeḍ tilmay, ad tazled aked ibriden, aked znaqi, ad cek-ẓren midden, ad inin d amegnun niɣ iffeɣ leeqel-ines, a xaf-k ttazlen iḥermucen s iẓra, qqae bnadem i xef ɣa tekked a xef-k iḍḥek, ḥuma ad-ak ismeḥ rebbi mayn teggid.”

Adabu "ad iwwet s wayen yezmer, tidebbuzin, lḥebs akked taɣdemt, akken ad issezri tafrent n APN di yunyu d-iteddun"
Tamurt n Lezzayer ur tuɣ abrid n yiseɣ acku adabu-s ur d-yufrar seg yidles n tmurt.
Adabu ibedden di 1962 (agraw n Wejda) ilul-d di lbiru n Gamal Abdelnaser di Lqahira, mačči di tẓegwa n imennuɣen n ALN mgal Fransa tamhersant. Asalu d-inejren seg uswir n Ifri-Uzellagen (congrès de la Soummam) di 1956 gan-as tasfrat di tazwara-as.
D win i d ugur amezwaru ; ayen d-irnan si 1962 ar as
... 
an, ad ibeddel tikli, akken daɣ ad iqader yal azref i tezmel tmurt n Lezzayer zdat ugraw n ONU, ur nefhim ma umnen s wayen nnan yal tikkelt, neɣ rnan-as kan awal i yir tallit.
Tamuɣli-nnaɣ : adabu n wass-a ur illi d ababu wukud izmer ad yili wawal neɣ amjaddel. Adabu n wass-a d asekkak icudden tamurt. Ur izmir ad yili usuter n yal tamsalt deg uxsim ma tewweḍ ɣer talast.
Sin imedyaten i nessen llan deg umezruy n tmurt-nnaɣ :
1) deg 1u Nunamber 1954, tiɣri n tnekra ur telli d asuter deg udabu n Fr

m ifra wawal-is : effeɣ si tmurt-iw !
Timlilit n yidles n tmurt, win i d-ifka umezruy, akked yidles imeqqin ittnernin ass-a di tmurt-nnaɣ zemren ad siherwlen abrid i tegrawla n talwit i nessaram.
Di tmuɣli-nnaɣ, ulac amgared gar "Effeɣ ay ajrad tamurt-iw" akked "Yetneḥḥaw gaâ" i d-inna s neyya-s ilemzi-nni tameddit n wass di tiɣremt n Lezzayer.
Aumer U Lamara

TAMURT TAQVAYLIT (SIWEL) — Tikli deg axmir mačči dayen isehlen ɣef iḍaṛṛen, maca xas akken llan kra (s levɣi neɣ s uḥazzez) sbisiffen ɣef yixfawen-nsen aḥrured deg yir uccuḍ. Akka dɣa akked Samir Bouakouir yiwen uɛaggal n-ukabar n tirni n-inemalyen, id yesnulfan tagara-agi yiwen urar amaynut( deg ahat yuffa iman-is) tisusaf ɣer igenni.
Tagara-agi (segmi adabu aẓẓayri iṣeffer i yimexfafen-is ad heggin iman-sen ɣef tifranin di 12/06/2021) yestuqet ulɣuten ama deg uẓeṭṭa (Facebook) ama anda nniḍen.
... 
 yetthuddu iɣulad n leqder akked usehru. Ass-a yeṣṣawaḍ ulaɣer wannay amaziɣ yellan d-azamul n-inekiw n imaziɣen meṛṛa si rrif alamma di rrif , ama di Lmaruk, Lẓẓayer, Libya neɣ Tunes. Deg ulɣu ines anagaru yerra-t ɣer ddaw uḍar-is. Deg awal-is , Mass Samir Bouakouir yenna-tt-id war adari : nek ɣur-i ala senjaq n Lẓẓayer s wacu steɛrifeɣ ! A buh akka i d-taḥvuvt id yeffɣen seg imi-s. Ahat Samir Bouakouir yekreh iman-is, yekreh liḥala-s yellan d teqvaylit, wagi d cɣel-is. Meɛna yettu yiwet n tams
...
lt n kra n yiqvayliyen. Ugin ad lemden seg temsirin id yewwi lweɛd di lǧǧera-s. Xudi amuli n tidyanin n tafsut n imaziɣen akked tafsut taverkant ḥaḍru-t-id. Xudi asexnunes n-iqadacen iqvayliyen n-udavu mazal ur tensi ara tugna-ines (Ouyahiya, Ait Ferhat Ali….) deg allaɣen… meɛna akken yeqqar wanzi : yir serdun ur tettdeqim, yir asɣar ur tettleqim, yir aragza ahder neɣ qqim.
Akka i tadyant n wid yebran i umanuɣ deg ayala-sen, yenwen ttalasen deg ayla n medden. Aḥlil daya !

Tapulisistimt d ict n tseṭṭa zi tɣuriwin n usuɣel, tessers tirsal (llsas) n tmassant tatrart n usuɣel, tban-dd tiẓirt-a deg uzyen ameggaru n usatu wiss 20 di tesdawit n Tel-Aviv, aked imussnawen: Evan Zohar d Gideon Toury.
Asenti-nnes yusa-dd awerni tarezzutin n Evan Zohar jar 1970 d 1980, ttwafsarent d adlis sadu wezwel n: Tifray deg usefru amezruyan “Papers in historical poetics”.
Yuyem-dd Evan Zohar zeg imenzayen n tinmel talɣant Tarusit i d-yussin zzat nnes, iksi aṭṭas zeg iremmusen-nnes ame
... 
snummal deg umcan n usuɣel asnilsan i ttuɣa yutin iẓuran deg wakud-nni, ifsar sin n idlisen ismun day-sen ixaṛṛisen-nnes:
- In Search of a Theory of Translation (1980)
- Descriptive Translation Studies and Beyond (1995)
Gedeon Toury ibḍa isbdaden n usuɣel xef kraḍ n iswiren:
- Isebdaden n usenti (initial norms)
- Isebdaden zzat i usuɣel (prelimenary norms)
- Isebdaden deg usemhel n usuɣel (operational norms)
Aya ijja-t ad issers izerfan n usuɣel umi yegga:
- Azref n tyumi tanawayt (Law of growin
...
ebridt-a, ad niydar:
- Iɣarḍayen d midden, Mizian rahou, ungal, 2020.
- MARX DI ARRIF, Mohamed Farissi d Hamza Zarraoui, tamzgunt, 2021.
Da nesrusa ijj n useqsi ad iqqim yerẓem, ma tiẓiṛt-a ad tuc ṣṣabet “ yield ” i usuɣel ɣer tmaziɣt? S ijj n wawal-nneɣni, tamaziɣt d ict n tutlayt yudrus umawal “ lexicon ” nnes, bac ad nessiriw amawal-a, ad nerni zi tdelsawin d tussnawin-nneɣni min war ɣar-neɣ yellin, niɣ ad neqqim netteg allas n tira “ rewriting ”s bla tamerniwt-nsen tamamkant “ qualitative ”.

Di mya n wussan waha, ruḥen deg-s ca n temnemyat-alef n yewdan di Ruwanda, deg wemseksi i din yemsaren, wami i sugen ihututen x itutsiyen i yudrusen di tmurt-a.
Mayemmi ttuɣa ttexsen ihututen ad nɣen itutsiyen ?
Kter zi 85 di mya n imezdaɣ n Ruwanda nitni d ihututen. Maca itutsiyen i ttuɣa yudrusen, d nitni i ttuɣa yeṭṭfen tamurt-a n Ruwanda, d nitni i ttuɣa deg-s ittḥekkamen xarebbi zeggami.
Deg useggas n 1959, iwḍen ihututen ad ɣeḍlen tajeldit n itutsiyen, zi ssenni, rewlen itutsiyen d tiḥimri
... 
ya, luluf n temɣarin titutsiyin i ḥebbsen, bac a x-asent kerfsen mamec xsen, d melmi ma xsen.
Ma yesnejbed ḥed ɣer wesbeddi n ɣezzu-ya ?
Timizar imunen d Biljik, ttuɣa ɣer-sen lɛesker di Ruwanda, maca ttuɣa wer ɣer-sen bu ttesriḥ bac ad sbedden amsiqḍi.
Awern i yij useggas x tmenɣiwt n iɛeskriyen imirikaniyen deg Usumal, iɛemmed umarikan bac ad imeyyek x ca n wemqerwac di Tefriqt zi jjdid.
Zi i mmuten ɛecra zi lɛesker n Biljik, yeffu-dd timizar imunen d Biljik gerwen-dd lɛesker-nsen zi Ruwanda.

...
nu, yesmun deg-s Ruwanda x yij n wawal, yeqḍa deg-s x urasizm.
Yegga ij n lḥukuma, deg-s kter zi 30% n temɣarin, yerẓem amsawaḍ aked waṭṭas n tmizar di Tefriqt d umaḍal amen yekmel. Di 2010, yegga taglanzit d tutlayt d tunsibt, yeqḍa x tefransist. Amen yeffeɣ zi tesmunt n tmizar tifrunkufunin.
Lexxu tademsa n Ruwanda tuley, amen yuley ccan n uselmed d uturizm, tedwel Ruwanda, zi tmura i ɣer sskanent tmura n Tefriqt. Zeg wemsiqḍi d wemsinɣi, tedwel zi tmura i ɣer yella ccan di tefriqt.
Tala : BBC

TamanaYt n Tgeldiwin yedduklen Lundun d tamiwim n unẓul n tmurt, uYallen ar wakman assa imi d yuYal unfafad n Kuruna s wudem amaynut akken i d-yenna Mass Boris Johnson aneYlaf amezwaru. TalYa (forme) agi VUI-202012/01, d ttin yeneṭṭḍen aktar n talYa tmezwarut s wazal n 70%.
Acku ur ilaq ara ad nettqeleq imi mačči tikelt tamenzut ara ybeddel talYa, d win yettbedilen imi d anfafad ARN, talYa tamezwarut i d-yeffYen di Wuhan, isem-is ageyyir L (souche L), deg yennayer 2020, imi yettenṭaḍ seg wa Yer wa ffYented snat n talYiwin niḍen S uk d V, acku d talYa niḍen uk imuccɛan deg Lurup, d ageyyir G.
Ma d acraḍ nni heggan d win ara jerben s tYawla Yef talYa agi tamaynut

Tutlayt tacenwit
Tacenwit (s tifinaɣ: ⵜⴰⵛⵏⵡⵉⵜ) neɣ Haqbaylit d yiwet n tutlayt tamaziɣt i ttmeslayen Icenwiyen di temnaṭ n wedrar n Cenwa di Dzayer. Tutlayt tacenwit d tin i teqqnen ger n Teqbaylit yakk d trifit.
Tcenwit d tin yettwaggzen s umihi n wengar. Acku Ur d-iqqimen ara aṭas n medden yessawalen yis tura di Lzzayer. Zik sawalen-tt di temdint n Bazar ( Tipaza), deg uɣir n Iyurayen ( Gouraya), Cercal, Sidi Ɣilas, Sidi Brahem, Nnaḍur, Damus, Ayt Ḥewwa d Brira d Bist (Bissa).

Aferrun
Aferrun (FR: Marsouin, UK: porpoise)
Yekka-d seg uẓar (FRN).Ur d-nufi ara anamek n yisem-a akked unamek n uẓar-is. Llan kra n yimsulɣeyen i aɣ-d-yennan isem-agi aferrun yekka-d seg yisem Ferɛun (ferrun = ferɛun). Qqaren-as akka acku yewɛer, Yeǧhed yerna yeḥṛec aṭas. Amdan ara t-yewten, neɣ ara t-yjerḥen ad as-yeṭṭef cceḥna; mkul mi ara yeḍgger acebbak-is deg yilel akken ad d-igmer iselman, ad as-t-yefri akk.Aferrun d amsuṭṭaɣ. D netta akk i iḥercen gar yiɣersiwen n umaḍal.Yesɛatafekka d taɣezzfant.Yezmer ad yaweḍ deg teɣzi alamma d sebɛa n yiɣallen(talata n lmitrat d wezgen), ma deg taẓeyt yettaweḍ 150 n kilu. Aqerruy-is iṛuḥd imdewer, ur yesɛi ara aqamum. Yettemcabi aṭas ɣer uddenfil.Ini-s amyiɣiɣden neɣ d aberkan; tikwal iseɛɛu ccwami d ticebḥanin.

Tutlayt taɛebrit
Tutlayt Taɛebrit (עִבְרִית, Abdar s Tehibṛut tamzikt: ɛiḇriṯ/, S Tehibṛut tamaynut : iḇɣit) d tutlayt i ttmeslayen Israyliyen, tutlayt-a tettekka deg twacult tutlayin tisamiyin am Tserɣint neɣ Tmehrit.
Amezruy[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Nettat d tutlayt n wedlis n Wudayen, Tawrat. Mi d-keccmen Ibabyluniyen deg Jerusalem, taramit tuɣal yiwet seg tutlayin n wat Israyil. Ass mi d-keccmen at Ruman, Udayen ruḥen s lɣerba, u tutlayt nsen temmut akk...
Di tallit n sionism g turuft, imussnawen udayen ssidiren tutlayt-nsen, tura tuɣal-d d tutlayt tunṣibt n tmurt n wudayen akk d taɛrabt deg Israyel.
Tira[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
- ẓer agemmay aɛebri
Yettuseqdac agemmay aɛebri di tira n tɛebrit. Deg-s llan 22 n usekkilen. Nettat d agemmay abjed am agemmay aɛrab neɣ agemmay alibi (Tifinaɣ n zik). I Isekkilen-is d asusru n zik, asusru n ddin, d asusru n tura deg teɛbrit tisrayilt.
Tiwelhiwin[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]

« Agbur n udatsenfar-a n usaḍuf ad d-yettwasnuged deffir ma yessekyed-it useqqamu n yineɣlafen deg yimalasen ay d-yetteddun, sakkin ad t-id-qeddmen i umni uqbel ma ifuk uzgen amezwaru n useggas-a, akken ay yeɣtes uselway Abdelaziz Bouteflika », ɣef wakken ay d-ye
... 
gnatin iwatan i usmal n tmaziɣt d ussekmem n uẓayer-nnes n tutlayt taɣelnawt, tunṣibt ;
Deg useqqamu-nni n yineɣlafen n 14 Meɣres, daɣ, sɛeddan yiwen n usenfar n usaḍuf i ubeddel d ussmad n usaḍuf n Yulyu 1963 yerzan timeɣriwin tusḍifin i ureṣṣi usḍif n tmeɣra n Yennayer deg wumuɣ n tmeɣriwin tusḍifin n tmurt.
Aɣtas n ussidef n Yennayer deg wumuɣ n tmeɣriwin tusḍifin d azwur ur yesɛin tamtilt yeddem-it uɣella n uwanak yernu iswi-nnes d assejhed n tdukli d umtawa iɣelnawen.

Ɣef leḥsab n yisefka n uɣlif n ussegmi aɣelnaw, asselmed n tmaziɣt iɛedda seg 11 n twilayin seg 2014 ɣer 38 n twilayin deg useggas aɣurbiz n 2017-2018, yernu yerna umḍan n yibalmuden ay izerrwen tamaziɣt armi ay yewweḍ ɣer 350.000 ddaw ussegrer n 2.757 n yiselmaden.
Azal n 300 n yiselmaden imernanen n tmaziɣt ara d-ssidfen i useggas aɣurbiz n 2018-2019, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna uɣlif ay d-yennan dakken iswi-nnes d asmatu n usselmed n tmaziɣt deg 48 n twilayin n tmurt.

Iran iga yan wawenk ilan tanbaḍt ɣ Wasya. Isem-nnes unṣib iga-t Tagduda tuslimt n Iran (جمهوری اسلامی ایران). Ɣ iggi n wakal-nnes, tezri yat zeɣ tɣermiwin akkʷ qdemnin n umaḍal. Tamaẓunt n Iran tga-tt Tehran.
Amezruy[edit | edit source]
Tanbaḍt d tsertit[edit | edit source]
Asistem asertan n Iran ittbaẓa f udestur n 1979.
Anemmal[edit | edit source]
Anemmal axatar n Iran (رهبر معظم ایران) nettan a'ibedden f tsertitin akkʷ n Tegduda tuslimt n Iran. Adwas illan dar unessiɣef n Iran idrus f win Xamengi, Anemmal axatar.

Seg tgemmi turtangawt (patrimoine immatériel) i inuḥen deg tama n Timimun, aɣir n Adrar, ulac win i ur nesla s Uhellil n Tgurarin (Gurara). Yuɣ lḥal, d Lmulud n at Mɛemmer i yellan d amezwaru seg Tezwawt i as-yefkan azal i tgemmi-ya ed yizlan akk i d-ttawin s yisefra yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nni, mi yerza ɣer dinna deg useggas n 1971 lwaḥi ed yiwen n umussnaw afransis deg uẓawan, anida i iga anadi alqayan ɣef wansay-a-nsen yerna yessekles-d izelwan-nni. Syinna, deffir-s llan wiyaḍ i yerran awellih-nsen ugar ɣer tgemmi-ya i yettwaɛeyynen, yuɣ lḥal, d tigemmi turtangawt tamaḍlant (patrimoine immatériel mondial) sɣur UNESCO seg useggas n 2005. Sem (lǧemɛa) iɛeddan ay tettwaseqqef ihi deg Timimun teẓrigt tis tẓa n useggas-a n Uhellil n Tgurarin, ideg ttekkant ma drus 28 n trebbuyaɛ tidiganin (locales). Deg yizlan akk i d-ttawin at Tigurarin s yisefra, ad naf wid icudden ɣer tesreḍt ed teflest (foi), maca daɣen ula d wid yeɛnan tudert-nsen n yal ass ed wayen i d-iḍerrun: am wayen i ten-yesferḥen, tadukkli-nsen, imennuɣen-nsen…atg. Am yisefra n ddeqs n yimedyazen iznatiyen i yettwaḥessasen, ɣas ini, ala deg tegnit-nni. Ma nemmeslay dɣa ɣef yimedyazen iznatiyen, ad naf seg-sen wid i mazal ṭṭfen deg teznatit, ḥerrzen-tt, sekfalen-tt-id, sissinen-tt. Imi ula i tfaska n tmedyezt n Udrar n Fad, ɣas yeggug ubrid, usan-d acḥal n tikkal.

Falesṭin (Awanek)
Falesṭin; s teɛrabt: فلسطين, isem ines unṣib Awanek n falesṭin; s teɛrabt: دَوْلَةْ فَلَسْطِنْ, Dawlat falestin), tamurt tezgad g umalu n umenẓaw Asya d rrif asammer n ilel agrakal, tesɛa tilas d Lubnan s ugafa, Surya s ugafa asammer, s usammer Urdun, s unzul asammer Maser , yezgad gar-as d tamurt n l’Urdun ilel amettan , Awanek n falesṭin d awanek aɛṛab , tajumma ines mectuḥet maca llan g-yes tigwti n waɛṛaben d tadersi n udayen inselmen, ineṣriyen, idruzen d isamariyen. Llant daɣen tasfift n Ɣezza d tama tanẓulit neɣ tama turdunit.

Aeiwen n yimeqranen n tmezdayt, imḍebbren n trebbuyae n yinelmaden d imeksawen isbedden timezdayin anida llint tewwura n linǧil, akken ad fehmen amek ara lemden tudert n trennawt di Lmasiḥ yerna ad ittkel ɣef talelt d uwelleh n Rruḥ Iqedsen iwakken ad slemden wad wellhen imekdiyen-nsen.
Asrudem n temsirt
Igmaḍ yettwarǧan seg usileɣ-a
- Ad d-issefhem amek Amasiḥi d taxelqit tajḍiḍt d wamek i yufa tamagit-is di Lmasiḥ.
- Ad d-issefhem allalen n yimdanen wala wid n Yillu i yettekkan di gemmu-nneɣ di leqdasa.
Ṭṭbiea: Γer taggara n temsirt, Anelmad ilaq-as…

Iswiyen ivwaṛiyen ssadfen-ten Franck Kessie (timikt tis 23), Ibrahim Sangare (timikt tis 40) d Nicolas Pepe (timikt tis 55), deg wakud aydeg Sofiane Bendebka yessadef iswi azzayri ayiwnan deg tis 74. Deg temlilit-a, yezgel uqebṭan Ryad Mahrez tiyita-nnes n temqasit deg tis 60.
Deg temlilit tis snat n tegrawt E, Ginya Tasbegsant terna Sierra Leone s 1 ɣer 0 s yiswi ay yessadef Pablo Ganet (deg tis 38).
Deffir wass-a wis kraḍ d uneggaru, Côte d’Ivoire (7 n tenqiḍin) d Ginya Tasbegsant (6 n tenqiḍin) uɣrent ɣer tis tamet n tgarant, deg wakud aydeg Sierra Leone (2 n tenqiḍin) d Zzayer (1 n tenqiḍt) ttwafsent seg tyaka.

Amezry n iban-ed ! Rnu, s tmaziɣt a mḥaynek ! I txeddem Dihya Lwiz !
« Amezruy lberj n Petra iɣef i d-yella waṭas n unadi ama seg tama n yimusnawen izzayriyen neɣ ibeṛṛaniyen akken ad d- skeflen ayen i d-yeḍran deg lbeṛj-ayi. Aneggaru-ya yettunbder-d aṭas deg yidlisen n umezruy, acu kan ur ẓṛin ara anda i d-yezga. Imnadiyen ufan yakan kra n tɣawsiwin i yettuɣalen yer Iqeṛn wis 4 seld tlalit n Eisa, deg umkan iwumi semman Mlaku, deg Sedduq -Bgayet. Taɣawsa tamezwarut î y ufan deg useggas n 1900, d tablaḍt tettwaru s tlaṭinit, akken i d-ibeyyen umusnaw S. Gsell Tablaṭ-a tres ass-a deg usalay ayelnaw n Lezzayer tamanaɣt. » (Chapeau de l’article de Dihya Lwiz, La Cité du lundi 12 janYier 2015, édition spéciale Yennayer, entièrement en tamazight, p.12)
D. Lwiz, « Lbeṛǧ n Petra yuɣal-ed ! »

Qsemṭina
Yettwassen yiɣṛem n Qsenṭina (isem ines amziki: Kirta) s teɣremt n tiqenṭirin iy yettwaɛellqen agezdu 25.
Takalirawt[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Qsenṭina d-tamdint n wegmuḍ (eccerq) n Dzayer, tezga-dd ɣef yiran n yiwen n wezṛuf d-aɛlayan, nnig wasif n Rumel. D-nettat ay d-tamaneɣt n twilayt n Qsenṭina. Zedɣen tet 438.000 n yimezdaɣen.
Tadamsa[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Qsenṭina d-tamdint tameqqrant en tnezzut (ettijaṛa) akked temguri (industrie) yerna tella deg-s yiwet seg tesdawiyin timeqqranin akk en Dzayer. Zik, Qsenṭina d-yiwen seg temdinin wi ɣur dd-ttasen medden ad lemden.
Amezruy n temdint[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Tezga-dd teɣremt en Qsentina deg tma en umalu en tmurt en Dzayer, yella isem is Kirta (Cirta) deg twala en Yinumiden ass nni, tella tamanaɣt en tanumedt Numidia seddaw ufus en Mikiwsen (Misipsa) llan zedɣen deg-s yimzenza Iṛomanen, iderq iten Yugurten, dacu yejjan Caius aselway en umenkud en Roma ad et yekcem, semmant Ayt Roma daɣen Constantina ɣef yisem en Konstantin amezwaru.[1]
Eṭṭfen tet Yiɛraben sdeffir nsen, umbaɛd, Iṭorkiyen, umbaɛd Ifransisen yezmir ara Clauzel ad et yekcem deg useggʷas en 1836, maca yekecem itt es deffir-s Vale (Valée) yeqqim deg-s Damermont, aked Lamorsier.
Tla (tesɛa) Qsenṭina tura Tasdawit en Qsenṭina, Amafag en Qsenṭina (Roplan), atg.

Ul (ulawen [NM][ZW][RS][MẒ][NF], ilawen [MH]), a. cœur (fr) - heart (en) - corazón (es) - قلب
b. nnig wul-nnes, à contrecoeur - a regañadientes - رغما عنه
c. yefka-as wul-nnes ad yeg kra - avoir le coeur à faire qqch - haber ambiente para (hacer algo) -
Tasenfelt: ur.
Addad amaruz: wul (wulawen).
Imedyaten:
Aql-ikem deg wul-inu ass-a, yerna deg-s ara teqqimed i lebda - Tu seras dans mon coeur aujourd'hui et pour toujours - Estarás en mi corazón hoy y siempre - ستظلين في قلبي اليوم و للأبد
Nniɣ-d aya seg wul-inu - Je l'ai dit du fond de mon coeur - Yo digo esto del corazón - قلت ذلك من قلبي
Aql-iken deg - Vous êtes dans - You are in - Ustedes están en - أنتم في

Neẓra akk amek tewɛer tudert n berra i umeɛḍur s tceryult-is, ama deg yidurar neɣ deg temdint. Imi sanda ma yerra, ad d-yemlil ugur ara as-yagin ad yaweḍ ɣer da neɣ ɣer din, d tiseddarin, d targa, d amdun neɣ d agerrac.
Ama weḥd-s neɣ akked umsaɛef-is. Tizdi n umeɛḍur deg tmetti, di tudert n yal ass, mazal-itt d awezɣi am yiseggasen iɛeddan. Ulamma yella usaḍuf deg Uɣmis unsib n tmurt, ulama yella-d kra n wayen yemmuggen sɣur tddukkliwin neɣ sɣur kra n yimḍebbren, wanag tallit-a tatrart tesbegge
... 
r neɣ ɣef lxir, akken ad mmeslayen ɣef usenfar n usishel n wawwaḍ i umeɛḍur deg tudert n berra, am ɣer yisɣuren yemgaraden, ixxamen n uwanek, isensuyen, ulzuzen, atg.
Seld timlilit-a i d-yeḍran deg uxxam n Useqqamu aɣerfan awilay, mtawan yimeḥḍar ɣef kra n waqqayen iɣef ara yili uqeddic, gar-asen asefqed deg unnar ɣef wayen akk yellan d uguren. Aheggi n rrapul yettwafesslen ɣef wuguren yettwawfen deg unnar, akked usendeh n tsuda d termisin yemgaraden akken ad gent ɣur-sent ttawil n uɛeddi i yime
...
eḥman. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ad yettwabudd usenfar-a n usishel n uɛeddi i yimdanen i ten-yuɣen di tfekka, i umiyupat Sufyan Arezqi, i aɣ-yeǧǧan ayyuren-a iɛeddan.
Dɣa, ɣef taluft-a n uɛeddi, yella yerza ɣur yiwen seg wid yellan d aɛeggal tura deg Useqqamu n twilayt, akken ad as-yefk kra n yisteqsiyen ɣef uɣbel-a, ad as-yessuter ad d-lhun yis-s ma yella rebḥen tifranin tisaḍufanin yezrin. Ugar n waya, yella Sufyan ixeddem irupurṭajen ɣef yimukan akk ideg ur xdimen ttawil n uɛeddi i umeɛḍur.
M. K.

Azul fella-k ay Imtaareb.
Mi d-tufidh aceqqiq kan agh regmedh a mmi-s n bexta ! Aqemmuc nwen iccur d ssem ar uqvayli ; yak ssnegh kwen seg iseggasen nni sebaïn. Nekwni nessen dacu d attan n tmurt nnegh fihel ma nnan-agh-d medden. Kecc truhedh ar wayen uran iberraniyen fellagh u agh mmledh belli tessnedh xir nnegh. Nekk ar ghuri, ak inigh : ruh att... awin ur nessin tigert. Ak inigh yiwen wawal : Acugher it semmadh imanik houari ? Akken agh d-regmedh ? Ulac akk isem nnidehen armi i teghtaredh waggi ? Tnettdhedh di lsit aggi am uselluf, tugidh agh tedjedh way garanegh akken n mmeslayt (...)

D aberru n artikelat i yuran imeɣnas n umussu Amaziɣ maḥend ad d-arren x Bensalem Ḥimmic (awzir yezwar n tussna di Lmuɣrib d aselmad n Tfelsafit).
Ḥimmic yura deg ijjen artikel s Teɛrabt yefsar-it x Hispris, igga-as i wezwel « iẓuran n ladas jar Taerabt d Tmaziɣ », inna dag-s belli asekkil n Tfinaɣ wer ɣer-s bu iẓuran, mamec inna ila imeɣnas n Tmaziɣt « ttetten lɣillet ccaten di ddin » zeɛma ismeɛna-dd umi imeɣnas n Tmaziɣt ttarin s Teɛrabt d nitni ccaten dag-s.
Ḥimmic wer yettu ca ula d Argun Muḥemmed, min xef d-ihwa, inna-as qa netta wer yessin i Taerabt, mayen yejjin tamɣart n Argun ad x-s terr, tenna-as ila Ḥimmic wer yelli bu d aryaz minzi tuɣa wer izmir ad yini manaya di lḥeqq n Argun umi tuɣa yedder, mamec tenna ila Ḥimmic iterra lḥar zi Argun minzi wer iqbil ad kid-s izemmem dduktura-nnes.
Artikel n Ḥimmic, issreɣ ula d Facebook, aṭṭas n i das-innan ila netta d Aɛurubi, wer iḥemmel Tmaziɣt.

Tamenɣiwt n Ɛednan, terr-d amharwaḍ x « usbuxsi n buḥbel » di Lmuɣrib i yellan di lqanun, maca tettwabedd zi 1993. Aḥenjir umi qqaren Ɛednan tuɣa iweḍḍer di Ṭanja. Aṭṭas zi tarwa n baryu-nnes tuɣa rezzun x-as. Rezzun ula x wenn kid-s d-ibanen di lkamira. Deg wass n ssebt yeɛdan, nnan-d ipulisen n Lmuɣrib ila qa ufin lxecbet n uḥenjir. Tarezzut tamezwarut temmel-d ila ijjen uḥudri tuɣa yewwi-t ɣer-s ɣer taddart. Iḍiyyeɛ-it d amezwaru uca yenɣ-it.
Lqanun n Lmuɣrib dag-s « tiwwura » ?
Lebda ttaɛedd
... 
idet, ttawin-t ɣer usbuxsi n buḥbel.
Ccemsi iqqar netta aqqat aked usbuxsi n buḥbel. Maca wer lli ad tt-nejj amenni waha, ixess-as ad x-as negg afray mliḥ. Netta yettwala ad tili x iwdan ittɛeddan x iḥenjiren neqqen-ten. Wer tettili ca deg yiger n pulitik. Ɛawed, ixess akriminal ad ikk x uḍbib anefsi, waxxa netta wer itter ca manaya.
Ma asbuxsi n buḥbel ad ikkes ddegg-a n ttaɛeddu x iḥenjiren ?
Abarru n iwdan, zeg wami i d-rrin lexbar n mayen das-imsaren i Ɛednan. Ttarin hactagat x Facebook d tw
...
sen ggen lɛuquba iqsḥen qaɛ.
Netta yeqqar ila ixess ad asen-yemsar « tikesaqellalt (castration) » i lhuḥuc-a ina. Deg wemkan mani ɣa x-as ɣa texsar ddewla zi ttmenyat-nnes. Ɛawed, iqqar belli ixess ad asen-wcen « lexdayem iqesḥen »
Zeg ijjen uɣezdis nniḍen, ittwala belli amharwaḍ n tidet ixess ad yili x « mayemmi ipulisen ɛeḍlen wer ssersen fus-nnsen x ukriminal-a ?» ula ktar zeg wami i d-iban ufuṭu-nnes di lkamira.
ɣer ɛawed : Ih ya Ɛednan, urid cek d amezwaru ura d ameggaru
Tala: Maghrebvoices

Anekcum ar uɣerbaz deg tɣiwant n Iɣil Ɛli (93 ikilumitren ɣef B’gayet) igellu-d yal aseggas s yiɣublan imaynuten, i rennu-n ɣer yeqburen! Mači d yiwen ar ad nebder, maca iɣublan imuqranen cudden ɣef: Asiweḍ, učči ( Les demis-pensions), lixṣaṣ n yiselmaden, leɣla n leqlul n leqraya lakked d wiyaḍ. Ayagi yettaǧa inelmaden ur qqaren ara akken ilaq. Ma nebda s wagnu n usiweḍ, wagi yella d-aqbur, mači d-amaynut. Tuddar yella-n deg tɣiwant-agi, nḥafen-t aṭaṣ s lixṣaṣ n-uṣiweḍ. Ɣas akken llan lkiran ye
... 
 ttaɣen-d deg tiḥuna d-ac ar ad ččen ! Tagrest t-ttqerrib-d agnu-agi ad izad ɣef inelmaden-agi, imi iḥetem-iten lḥal ad ččen učči aṣemmaḍ ! Lixṣaṣ n yiselmaden yettili myal aseggas. Ama d wid n tefransist, neɣ n-ugama, aɣbel-agi ar ass-a uryesɛi tifrat-ines. Inelmaden ttɣimin kra n smanat mebla iselmaden, ayagi yuɛer iwakken ad kfu-n ahil n leqraya nsen. Deg tama nniḍen, aɣerbaz alemmas n Ben Badis, yella-n deg Iɣil Ɛli, akken i nesla, ur yesɛi ara anemhal ! « Aɣerbaz-agi i leḥḥu mebla anemhal !
...
 yewet-iten-t » wugur-agi, imi xuṣen inelmaden ar yeɣren deg llakulat-agi n « wanziwen »! Ama deg taddart n Taẓla, neɣ Illugan,Tabuɛnant, d wat Sraj, llakulat yella-n din akk ɣelqen-t iwwura nsen, acku ulac inelamden, neɣ drus-it. Wigi ttruḥu-n qqaren deg Iɣil Ɛli. Am inelmaden n tadadrt n Tabuɛnant yeqqaren deg Iɣil Ɛli, ɣas akken sɛan aɣerbaz, d-acu kan yeqfel. Lukan ad nebder iɣublan yella-n deg tɣiwant-agi n Iɣil Ɛli ur n ttfak ara. Ihi, cwiṭ kan iwakken ur i tezzi ara laɛqel nwen !
Syphax.Y

TIZI WEZZU – Yenna-d, ass n laṛebɛa, usemyaddas n wenmalu n Useqqamu n Yixeddamen n Usselmed (CNAPESTE) dakken assuter n wenmalu-a yettwaqbel deffir ma ssutren-d ad stixren sin n yimasayen n tmehla n ussegmi.
Yenna-d Abderrahmane Ouaked i Tnegga n Yisalan n Ldzayer, dakken tella-d temlilit ass n laṛebɛa deg tesɣimt n tmehla n ussegmi aydeg ay ssawḍen ɣer yiwen n wemtaa aydeg ay msefhamen ad ssuffɣen iɣef n umeẓlu n yeknasen ɣer testaɣt. Ma d iɣef n umeẓlu n yixeddamen, ɣetsen ad as-fken anurẓem 
... 
ad ara ad imahel deg wegzum n ussegmi n Tizi Wezzu.
Naqal tessumer-d tmehla n ussegmi n Tizi Wezzu ad tbeddel tawuri i yiɣef n umeẓlu n yixeddamen daxel tmehla-a, maca yugi useqqamu n twilayt n wenmalu-a assumer n tmehla n ussegmi deg temlilit-nnes n wass n letniyen, yernu yecreḍ dakken amasay-a ad yettixer akk seg tmehla n ussegmi.
Tifrat-a ssawḍen ɣer-s deg yiwet n temlilit ay d-yellan ass n laṛebɛa, d tin ay yeqqimen 4 n yesragen yernu ttekkan deg-s yigensasen n wenmalu n Useqqamu Aɣelnaw Afu
...
diwan n uwali, aselway n Wegraw Aɣerfan n Twilayt d unemhal n ussegmi.
Amtawa-a yesɛedda-t useqqamu n twilayt n wenmalu-a ass n laṛebɛa tameddit deg yiwet n temlilit deg tesɣimt-nnes, yernu yenna-d Mass Ouaked dakken azmal n wemtawa-a ad d-yili ass n lexmis, d ass n tuqqla n yiselmaden ɣer usselmed deffir yiwen n usunded ay d-yebdan deg Wamber yezrin ɣef lǧal n wetɛeddi n yiwen n wemsaltu, deg tmehla n ussegmi, ɣef yiwet n tselmadt s weḥdaṛ n sin-nni n yiɣfawen n umeẓlu, ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked.

Ussan n « Ssinima n Twat » deg Wedrar: asɛeddi n wugar n 20 n yifetrawen d yisura iwezlanen
ADRAR– Ugar n 20 n yifetrawen d yisura iwezlanen ay d-iɛeddan deg wussan n « Ssinima n Twat » ay d-yellan ass n ssebt deg tzeɣɣa n ssinima n Afrah n Wedrar.
Tadyant-a d azwur n Wexxam n Yedles n Wedrar yernu iswi-nnes d anadi d ussebɣes n wuẓwiren n ssinima deg temnaḍt-a deg wayen yerzan afares asliẓran d usseɣnew n tallunin n wesɛeddi n yifetrawen n yenfarasen ilemẓiyen, ɣef wakken ay d-nnan yemsuddsen.
Tiṣekkiwin ay d-iɛeddan deg tedyant-a ḥuzan-d isental yemgerraden gar-asen arramen imiɣsen ay tga Fṛansa deg Reggan, tamsalt tafalesṭinit, asselmed n Leqran deg Wedrar, tamerrit deg Tniri, tamedyezt taɣerfant d tgemmi n uhellil n Yiguraren.
Asɛeddi n yisura-a yeḍfer-it-id weskasi meɣɣren gar yemttekkiyen, imaslaḍen n tesmilt n wezraf d wegdud ɣef temsal yemgerraden yeqqnen ɣer ussewjed d ufares n yifetrawen d yisura imwezlanen, asinaṛyu, abran , asentel d wuguren itwilanen n wemday, isemda imeslanen d wid n tmeẓriwt d uɣellet n teṛcibin deg ufares.
Cekṛen-d yemttekkiyen azwur-a ay d-yesseknen ussisen-nsen deg ufares n ssinima yernu yella-d d tabitrint i ussunnem n yifarisen-nsen, azɣan sɣur yimazzagen d wesnegmu d usseblel n yifarisen-a deg yimal.

LEZZAYER TAMANAƔT – Aneɣlaf afṛansawi n tuṛubt akk d tɣawsiwin n wezɣaṛ, Jean-Yves Le Drian, yenna ass n lḥedd di Lezzayer tamanaɣt d akken yella "uɣiwel" akk d"usurrif iwatan" i wassaɣen ger Lezzayuer d Fṛansa.
"Yella uɣiwel iwatan deg usurrif n wassaɣen-nneɣ, imi ad d-tili tegrawt taneɣlafant n weswir ɛlayen deg waggur n duǧambeṛ d-iteddun. Aql-aɣ deg yiwet n tallit iwatan n wassaɣen-nneɣ daymi nebɣa ad tt-ntebbet s temlilit-agi", id-yenna i tɣamsa Mas Le Drian, mi d-yewweḍ ɣer unafag ageraɣlan Houari-Boumediene.
Amḍebbeṛ n tdiblumasit tafṛansawit, yellan di Lezzayer almend n tedwilt tis kuẓ (4) n tseqqamutt tadamsant yemmezdin ger Lezzayer d Fṛansa (COMEFA) akk d tedwilt tis kṛaḍ n udiwenni aseṭṛatiji ger Lezzayer d Fṛansa.

Mamec i ɣa tili tfukt-nneɣ awerni xmi ɣa temmut ? Ssersen imussnawen aṭṭas n lxezrat zi ssa d usawen x mamec i ɣa isala usistim-nneɣ afukan, d melmi ɣa yili uya ? Maca aqqa iwdan wer ttilin ca ḥeḍren ḥuma ad ẓren tameggarut i ɣa tyura tfukt.
Imussnawen n tesṭrunumt ila ttɣilen qbel ila tfukt iggur ad tedwel d ijj n usegnu ittebsissiqen s ugaz d tɛejjajt xmi ɣa temmet. Maca alaḥsab mani iwwḍen imussnawen yiḍ-a nnan-dd ila qa ixess-as ad tili d taqemqamt kṭer bac ad tedwel amenni.
Tufa ijjen tseḍm
... 
ent ar Mars. Xenni tisfay-ya n tfukt ad serḍent tammurt, mala tammurt nican iggur a teqqim ar lweqt-nni.
Din ijj n ḥajet ixess-aneɣ a tt-nessdettet, ataf iwdan wer zemmren ad ɛicen. Di tidet, iwdan iqqim-asen yalleh ij n melyar n useggas waha mala wer nufi ca n webrid i zi ɣa neffeɣ zi tmurt; minzi aqqa ṭṭya n tfukt ittmernay kul melyar n useggas s 10%.
Nnumru-ya ittban d ameẓẓyan, maca qa ṭṭya-ya weḥḥd-sen ad salan aked tudert di tmurt, mani lebḥurat iggur ad bexxren; tamurt ad tedwel testextux
...
issawal x manaya d netta yeqqar « Xmi ɣa yemmet ca n yetri, ineṭṭar-d ijjen tsemkta n leɛjaj d ugaz – aya yettwassen s leɣlaf n yetri – deg ujenna, aɣlaf-a n yetri ittakk°aḍ ɣer wezgen n min iwezzen yetri. S manaya ittban-dd uɛeqqa n yetri i ttɛeqqaben safi immut, ixessi qbel ma ad immet qqaɛ ».
Zijlstra issawal x manaya iqqar ɛawed : « xenni waha i ɣa ibsisseq weɣlaf-a … ca n ɛecraflaf iseggusa … Ataf nzemmer a nẓer absisseq-a zi lagg°aj, maca itri xenni ad yili yeḍɛec aṭṭas bac a t-nettwala ».

Mahatma Gandi
Mahatma Gandi ula Muhandas Karamcand iga yan umswingm d yan urgaz n tsrtit ahndi, ar fllas ttinin "Iman Mqqurn". Ilul d Gandi ɣ usggʷas 1869 immut ɣ 1948. Inkr d ɣ yat twja tamjahdiyt, iɣra ɣ Lunḍun aylliɣ sul iga anzzarfu. Ifta ilmma s Bumbay fadd s Tfriqt n iffus ɣilli ɣ rad immaɣ mgal asnaḥya aẓuṛan d ɣaylli mi ttinin "angraw n ubaṛṭayḍ".
Ɣ udwal nns s Lhnd, rad inkr f usddurri Anglizi da iɣʷin f tmazirt nns, iɣra i mddn afad ad inkr ttɣwwiɣ uɣrim bla ddafuniyt d ad bbin ayt lhnd kra d ikkan Nngliz. F mayad, ikcm mnnawt n ttwal s usqqur, idra daɣ ɣ umhawaḍ n tdrfit qbl imiɣ amaḍlan wis sin. Yut ula f ungiddi gr mddn.
Immaɣ bla ad imurs ad itawa gr Imuslmn d Ihndusn aylliɣ t inɣa yan Uhndus azakrar ass n 30 Ynnayr ɣ usggʷas 1948.

Asaflu arurad
Asaflu arurad (Assaɣ ussnan: Phylloscopus collybita) d talmest n iylalen yeṭṭafaren tawacult n Phylloscopidae yettidir s tuget deg Uruppa d Tefriqt yakk d Asya. Ini n usaflu arurad d aras izzegzwen deg ufella n tfekka-as d umellal deg wadi-is. Talmest-a tebṭa ar kra tdu-lemsin
Tawtemt tbennu Agdef yemmugen am tkerbust (taqubbet) sufel neɣ zdat n tegnit (lqaɛa) yerna tzeddel ɣef yifrax annen daɣen id tettawi učči. Ma d awtem ur yila ara (ur yesɛa ara) tiremt deg usegdef neɣ deg useč
... 
timeẓyanin n iylalen. Ula d asaflu arurad iga d iswi n kra inegmren imsuṭaṭ am wemcic d tedɣaɣat yakk d kra n tsekliwin n iden
Agbur
Aglam[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Tafekka[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Asaflu arurad d yiwen n weylal meẓẓiyen tafekka-ynes teččur, Awtem yuwzen 8,7 g más d tawtemt gar n 6 d 7 g. Amawaṭ n wadu-telmest n wanaw utrim P. c. collybita ila (yesɛa) imuren ifellayen (n ufella) igan d izegza d izurirɣen (ur qessiḥ ara) yakk d waras. Ma d imuren iddayen (n wadda) d imellalen yedda ar tewṛe
...
niten maca meẓẓiy-it fell-asen. Ma d ifrax gan d arasen deg imuren ifellayen ugar n imawaṭen

 d uskkir n temsmunin timazighin, ar kkerzn tasrtit n usârreb 50 n usggwas ayad g wakal amazigh, srfufnn amadan (peuple) amazigh g idurar ula timdinin, sndallfen imeghnasn (ttayn lexttabi, neghin lmsaâdi d wiyyad, sneghubun lhbbaz, amzen azayku d idbelqasm d ikken d harc rras d wiyyad ).

Tamusta n isefra
Tamusta n isefra d adlis wis qrad n Belqasem Iḥiǧaten id-ifYen di ctember izrin di tmurt. Wisen d tahregt neY d aneYmes, maca amedyaz agi nneY ur izmir ad yanef I wayen I t-icweYben deg ul-is. Yufa amek ar aY d-ittak tikktiwin ines. Igza d akken tallit tbeddel u wid ittaken zik tameẓẓuYt I imedyazen assa ulac-iten. Assa s udlis kan ar issiweḍ umedyaz awal-is, tikti-s, tamuYli-s, addad-is I wiyaḍ.Asefru mačči d awalen kan ittemseḍfaren am akken amedyaz mačči kan d win isnen a ten
... 
yal tikwemmict n wawalen ittwasennan akken I wulem illa lqerḥ, uneYni, urrif, tumert. D aya iyi djan qqareY-as asefru d udem umedyaz war talaba. Asefru d amedyaz ḥenturi, akken I t-is ureb yemma-s.
Neqqar tikwal Yef kra imedyazen nneY d akken ur ten nessin ara imi ur d-ttmeslayen ara I medden srid am isartalen, neqqar fell-asen ẓewren negh ɛugnen imi ur neẓri ara amek igan di tudert nsen, maca netta anect-a yakw d awalen kan. (azgen amezwaru)
Seg wami yettwarbeẓ Muḥsin Fikri aked wefraḍ ass n 28 Kṭuber 2016, tekkar tɣuyyit n wegdud tuɣa yuflen s useɛqar d tsertit zi ttcerfaḍen igelwan n yewdan ttejjan ten d imeẓlaḍ, rni d xas tasertit n wesɛarreb zi xsen ad mesxen udm n Arrif ad as weḍḍren tanettit nnes.
Tamenɣiwt n Fikri tuɣa tt d tuddimt i yessefyen abuqal, minzi amezruy n lmexzen aked Arrif degs abarru n tsersiwin (lmaḥeṭṭat) d tiberkanin, wer izemmar ula d ijjen ad tent yessettu niɣ ad tent yemḥa seg twengimt n w
... 
sen. s uya, tɣuyyit n wegdud yelqa tt lmexzen ɛawed s lɛesker d uqarṭaṣ d ṭṭnuga…
Ggin ɣezzu d ameqqran mahu wenni i ggin di min yeɛdun, ugar zi manaya, tiweḍ tubberkent n wulawen nnsen d wekrah i ggin i Arrif ad ten yejj ad neḍlen iwdan amen ddaren di Tneymart (Tawima). maca ɣezzu ameqqran i yeggin igezzimen deg wulawen yemra (yeqseḥ) ad ggenfan; netta umi d yeffeɣ Lḥasan wiss tnayen ḥuma ad ikemmel i min yeqqimen, deg wawal nnes zi yeɛfes x idammen d yiman n yenni yettwanɣen.
Lḥasan wiss 2 yes
...
s yesɣuyyu x tseqqar nnes di lxedmet d tseqqar nnes maḥend ad yedder ijjen tudert d taṣebḥant.
Yus d awarn as ijj n ɣezzu nneɣni i yegga lmexzen deg wegdud n Arrif, umi iwyen tamnawt i Lḥusin Belkic i tuɣa yettwassnen s yisem n “Rifinuks”, umi t ukaren zzat i taddart nnsen uca nɣin t nḍaren t di tagant n Gurugu, manaya yemsar deg uyur n mars 2015.
Rifinuks wer yeggi walu, illa tuɣa t d ameɣnuj seg iḥudreyyen iḍefren abrid n leɣnuj maḥend ad yessitem tudert di tlelli i Arrif nnes.

Imenɣi amezzwaru gar Legliz d Afɣanistan yebda deg 1839 yekfa deg 1984 deg-s teɛreḍ tgelda yedduklen ad tesseɣli Afɣanistan deg tallit n wurar ameqqran id-yellan gar-as akked Rrus ɣef umenkud ara iseeɣlin amur ameqqran n tmura deg Asya. Tfukk s rrbeḥ n Afɣanistan.
Timental timazzranin[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Yextar-d udabu n Lhend yiwen n uɣalla-ines qqaren-as Alexander Burnes, i yettmesslayen tutlayin n Urdu d Dari akken ilaq lḥal (tutlayin n ugdud n Afɣanistan d Pakistan) yernu yessen aṭas seg tut
... 
n Wazir Akbar Xan, mmi-s n Dust Muḥemmed. Yettwanɣa Burnes i yuɣalen d immetel n umenkud abriṭani deg wass n 2 unbir 1841 akked yiɛeggalen n terbaɛt-is. Fɣen yinglizen seg Kabul deg yennayer 1842. Yerwel uzal n 16 500 n yimdanen (gar-asen 4 500 n yiserdasen d 12 000 nniḍen seg twaculin-nsen d wid i asen-yettilin) ɣer Jalalabad . Maca akken ma llan ttwanɣan akk neɣ ttwaṭṭfen deg tnegluft n Gandamak imi imdanen mazal tassa-nsen terɣa ɣef ucengu-agi. Yiwen kan id-yuɣalen d amuddir d amejjay Wiliam 
...
eɣ ad ɛiwnen tuffɣa n tmurt tilellit. Di taggara anembaḍ n Kabul Yeɛqub Xan i iɣeḍlen baba-s Cir Ɛli mmi-s n Muḥemmed Dust azref n uceyyeɛ n terbaɛt tadiblumasit ɣer Kabul i wakken ad ili talwxit akked yirusiyen yessewsaɛen akter d wakter. Ferḍn yinglizen fella-s lɛehd n Gandumak deg 26 mayu 1879 i yettaken i yibriṭaniyen azref n leqdic deg tsertit n Afɣanoistan d tmura toiberraniyin ma d lamir ad yesɛu lǧehd s daxel n tmura yella deg tlisa ara yettwasunnɣen iwayen ara yuɣalen tura d Afɣanistan.

Vendredi 28 mai 2021
Tidak n Da Lḥusin
Da Lḥusin yessea tahanuţ di taddart, yaewat yiwen uɣarda, yefka-yas axeṣṣaṛ. Tipakiyin n ligaṭu, mi yeseffsed yiwet, ad inneggez ar tayeḍ. Da Lḥusin yeţţmeslay waḥdes weḥdes, yeqqaṛ-as :
– Muqel tura i wemumad afuḥan! Limmer meqaṛ i teţ yiwet n t-pakkiţ ar ţ-ifak! Umaena neţa i teddu-yi di neqqwma, a d-ineqev yiwet a d-inneggez ar tayeḍ!
Aɣarda amcum yuɣal yečča-yas ula d kaṛni andda yeţţmaṛk-ay akkriddi.
Da Lḥusin yekkufar! Deg-wass n suq iṛuḥ yuɣ-ed lmenddif (piège à rats), iḍeggaṛ ar daxel-is kra n tligaṭutin i wakken a tisellqqweḍ, yenna-yas :
– A k-id izenz Ṛebbi deg iḍ agi, azekka aţ waliḍ!
Azzekka-nni, mi yelli kan tabbwurt n tḥannuţ, yesla i weskarwec, yenna-yas :
– Ɛeslama-k a win fi ţnnaḍiɣ acḥal aya !
Yeddmed aɣarda-nni, yeṭṭf-it di tṣeṭṭa, yevda yeţţṭuṛṭur-it. Yekkat-it s yiwen ueekkaz ar teqqaṛuyt-is, yeqqaṛ-as :
– Akka a yiwen uffuḥan ! Ur testeqneeḍ ara s ligaṭu, tuɣaleḍ teččiḍ-iyi ula d akarni n wukriddi! Tura mebla eezzṛayen-ik ur temuteḍ, alamma teffkiḍ-iyi-d yakk ismawen n wid yesean a kriddi ar ɣuṛ-i!

Igzennayen
Igezennayen neɣ d yiwet n tqebilt di yeffus (wenẓul-utaram) n Arif.
Imdanen-ines qqaren-asen Igezennayen, nutni ssawalen (meslayen) s tutlayt Tamaziɣt. Tuddar imeqqranen di tmurt n igezennayen d : Icaweyyen (Aknul),Ajdir, Tizi Wesli, Bured,Ineḥnaḥen, Tala Tazeggwaɣt. Igezennayen mutyen (ɣriben) aṭas ɣer Turuft d timdinin n Merruk am Taza, Fas , Ameknas , Rbaṭ ... Taza d tamdint deg illan aṭas n Igezennayen.
Igzennay tella deg wammas n "userdas n tlelli" neɣ "Armée de libération" s trumit. Irumiyen semman tamawin n Aknul, Tizi Wesli , Bured" s "Akraḍan n Tmeṭṭant" niɣ s tefransist " triangle de la mort ".

Lamtal Imaziɣen zi Jurnal Agraw Amaziɣ
Nnan wi-lli zrinin
Ur udjin imzwura may ttinin inggura.
1. Assa ɣurc, askka ɣuri.
2. Aṣeṭṭa n yiḍ, aseṭṣa n wass.
3. Setc leƹdu day tenɣet-t.
4. Ssufeɣ-tn-i-d lsan; ur ssinn midden may tcan.
5. Urar d ikzin, illeɣ-ac aqmu.
6. Ur itkkes rebbi mucc i iɣerdayn.
7. Yuf usekkin atig nnes.
8. Mnaɣen xef lemdud, urta illi uɣyul.
9. Ur llint tzizwa bla tisennanin.
10. Ur da ittamẓ tuga ɣas azeggwar.
11. Ur da itƹemmar lfic tiɣrar.
12. Ur da reggwelen adday ur ƹlifen.
13. Ur da izzaḍ uzreg bla imendi.
14. Ur da isenkar yun umnay ageḍrur.
15. Ur da itelleɣ ixf nnes ɣas azger.
16. Ur da ittefsta ɣas unna immuten.
17. Ur da itegga wuccen tiqeddidin.
18. Ur da itqqen aman ɣas aluḍ.
19. Ur da ittili lƹezz bla imettin.
20. Ur da ittawi uzwu ɣas aḥbub nna yuran.
21. Ur da iteddu xef udis ɣas ifiɣer.
22. Ur da itebbi umger afus ɣas leɣcim.
23. Mec ur tgit ca, ur teggwidd i ca.
24. Aynna-yi ttinit, ini-t i ixf nnec.
25. Unna izdemen ca irɣ iss.
26. Unna iwweten ixf nnes ur da ittru.
27. Unna-t iṣṣmiḍen urdjin-t itci.
28. Unna ɣif-nex yusin igenna, ad-as irẓem.
29. Unna-xef ikka ifiɣer, la-t issiwid iziker.
Idda-d wawal-ad zeg “Nnan wi-lli zrinin,” Agraw Amazigh, 15 septembre, 2004, numéro 131, p. 12. Illa laṣel s tifinaɣ.

Agmuḍ alemmas
Agmuḍ alemmas (s taɛrabt : الشرق الأوسط, s taɛebrit : המזרח התיכון, s tagnizit : Middle-east, s tafransist: Proche-Orient) d tamnatt deg wenẓul-ataram (sud-ouest) n asya akk d ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n tefriqt.
D tamnatt agi, s umata, tesɛa timura-yagi Beḥreyn, Maṣer, Tturk, Iran, Ɛiraq, Israyil, Urdun, Kuweyt, Lubnan, Ɛumman, Qaṭer, Tasaɛudit taɛrabt, Surya, Tidukla n imarat aɛraben, Yamen akk d Falasṭin.
Dacu, tikwal awal n Agmuḍ alemmas yettusedac i wakken ad meslayen ɣef tafriqt ugafa.

Wp/shi/Swid
Swid s ism unṣib Tagldit n Swid (s taswidit: Konungariket Sverige) tga yat zɣ tmizar n iskudinafya tlla ɣ ugafa n Uruppa.
Swid tga yat tamazirt tiss kraḍt imqqurn ɣ tmizar n tamunt n Uruppa s tjumma 450,295 22 km², ilkm uṭṭun n imzdaɣn nns uggar n 10.0 mlyun n ufgan. Iggi n 85 ٪ n imzdaɣn ddrn ɣ tmnaḍin tiɣrmanin, Stukhulm tga tamaẓunt n tmazirt ad tg ula tiɣrmt imqqurn ɣ tmazirt (uṭṭun n imzdaɣn nns 1.33 mlyun n ufgan ).
Ɣ tasut tiss sat d mraw, tssmɣr tmazirt ikaliwn nns, dffir ma turri tambraṭurt tadwasant ɣ Uruppa ɣ tasutin tiss sat d mraw d tamt d mraw. Imnɣi anggaru lli tskr swid ikka t inn ɣ usggas n 1814.
Illa ɣ Swid adabu agldan adusturi s unbaḍ abṛlamani d tdamsa ibuɣlan. mk tlla ɣ tskflt tamzwarut ɣ umaḍal ɣ umuɣ n ikunumist n tdimuqraṭit d tiss sat ɣ umuɣ n tumasin imunn n tnfalit tanafgant. Swid tga agmam ɣ tamunt n Uruppa zɣ 1 innayr ɣ usggas 1995, tga ula agmam ɣ tuddsa n umyawas d tnfalit tadamsant.

Amuli wis 03 Yef tmettant n Meqqran Agawa
Meqqran Agawa d tigejdit n cna n Ddin n teqbaylit, isem-is aheqqani, Waeli Muḥand Ameqqran, ilulu deg useggas 1929 deg taddart At Eṭelli deg temnaḍt n Larebea n At Yiraten, anda yettwamḍel ass n lḥed 13 ctember 2009. Aṭas n yemdanen id-yusan Yer temḍelt-is deg yal tamnaḍt n tmurt iwakken at-zuṛrn i tikelt taneggarut, ger-asen aṭas n icennayen, inaẓuren, imḍebren n temnaḍt n Larebea n At Yiraten akk d imḍebren n yedles n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu. Meqqran Agawa
... 
 tẓuri lqayen mači d kra. Aseggas 1950 yekcem Yer Radyu n bgayet anda id-yekkes tamusni lak d waṭas inaẓuren nniḍen lawan-nni, am Eebd Lwehab Abjawi, Cix Sadeq...atg, yelḥa-d akken amecwar almi d aseggas 1962 i yeḥbes axeddim deg Ṛadyu n Bgayet, labaeda imi medlent tewwura-ines i lebda. Agawa d isem s wayes i s-sawalen yemdukal-is id wi ixeddem deg Ṛadyu, isem-agi yekka-d deg leerc Igawawen neY At Yiraten, anda i ilul. Labaeda mi id-yefaY Dda Meqqran deg Ṛadyu aseggas n 1962 yekcem Yer tmerrit( 
...
t i temnaḍt-is,Lzzayer...atg), yecna daYen Yef cbaḥa n tmurt-is, Yef ṣellaḥ, Yef laxert. Dda Meqqran yedda aṭas Yef temeemrin. Idum deg temeemmart n Sidi Emar Welḥağ id-yezgan deg temnaḍt n Wizgan, anda yettmeddiḥ ilmend n tmaYriwin n ddin am Teacurt, Lmulud, Laeyudat,Remḍan, agur ideg yewweḍ laefu Rebbi. DYa ass n sed 12 ctember 2009, tensa tcemmaet id-yefkan tafat i yedles n teqbaylit s umeddaḥ Yef ddin neY ttedkir, Ccix "Meqqran Agawa", d temkerḍit n tmedyazt n ddin n teqbaylit.

Ḥannabaɛl
Ḥannabaɛl (Hǎnnibal Barca, 247 qbl talalit– ? 183/2/1 qbl talalit), ikka-tt-inn iga yan umɣar n wawank d yan ujiniṛal igan aqrṭaj. Ikka-tt-inn iga acngu n tgduda taṛumit akkʷ imqqurn.
Ḥannabaɛl, ittyawssan bahra s aylli iskr ɣ ammas n yimnɣi Abuniq wis-sin. Izzigz s yat tsrdast zɣ Ibiriya isaka-tn iggi n yidrarn Ibṛansiyn d yidrarn n Walb ar agafa n Ṭalyan ɣilli ɣ inra Iṛumiyn ammas n yan usddiy n yinaɣan. Ammas n yimnɣi n Cannae, ikka f tsrdast n Iṛumiyn akkʷ darsn ixatrn ɣ umzruy nns
... 
Ɣ unggaru, tsnnukma-t yat tukkya taṛumit ɣ Tfriqt Ugafa ad yurri s Qrṭaj. Ittrẓa gis, zzugn-t Iṛumiyn bṛṛa n Qrṭaj bzziz nns.
Iddr ɣ usarag n Seleucid, isqnɛa ɣinn agllid-nns ad immaɣ mgal Ṛuma. Maccan lliɣ ittrẓa ɣ yan yimnɣi n yill, irwl Hannibaal s ammas n usarag n Bithynian. Ukan, lliɣ as-nnan Iṛumiyn ad isrs yimrign[1] nns s yat tklit, inɣa ixf-nns ɣ lḥin.
Ar ittyawḥsab Hannibaal f yikumanḍarn n lɛṣkr akkʷ xatrnin. Amussnaw n umzruy n military Ayrault Dodge, iga-as yat twal s yism "baba-s n
...
ṭaj ɣ umnɣi, ibbi Hamilcar ill afad ad islk tiqbilin n ɣayda mi ttinin ɣ ass-a Ṣbanya.
