« Addud n Zzayer deg wayen yerzan tazɣent n Libya dima yella d imezgi yernu d afraray. Aselway n tegduda, Abdelmadjid Tebboune, iger-d tiɣri i uḥraz n tnaya d tdukli tagelluyant n Libya d tawert n tgermant deg yiweẓla-nnes igensiyen », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Lamamra deg tgermant-nnes deg usarag n « Tsentayt i Urkad n Libya » ay ireẓmen ass n ukwas deg Ṭrables.
« Zzayer twekked-d, acḥal d tikkelt, dakken aferru n tezɣent yessefk ad d-yili s ukala n ustag gar Yilibiyen, d win aydeg aytmaten il
... 
erwen akk yidisan ay terza temsalt, d adiwenni ara iḍemnen allus n tmeṣkiwt d usdukkel n wakk tisuda yernu ad yeḥrez amsuɣal aɣelnaw ».
« Zzayer tummar s ufara ay d-yellan deg ukatar n ukala asertan ay d-yellan ddaw usiggi n Tuddsa n Yiɣlanen Yeddukklen, d win ay yessawḍen ɣer ufran n uselway d yimaslaḍen n Useqqamu Aselwayan d Unabaḍ n Tdukli Taɣelnawt yernu yesbeḍ-d azemz n 24 Dujembeṛ 2021 i usuddes n tefranin timuta », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna.
Mass Lamamra yessenfali-d daɣ adwat n Zzayer deg w
...
awa n usebded n yimenɣi deg Libya, am wakken ay d-iḥettet dakken yessefk « ad faken akala aredsan d uɣellisan s umuqqen i lmend n ugdal n yimrigen d ujbad n yiɣallen, imkariyen d yimenɣan iwerdaniyen seg Libya », yernu ad d-yili waya s umciweṛ d yineblagen iwerdaniyen ay terza temsalt d udraw n tmura tinaragin n Libya deg yidiwenniyen, am wakken ara d-yili daɣ waya deg ukatar n tegrayin ay d-yellan deg temlilit taɣlifant n tmura tinaragin n Libya ay d-yellan deg Zzayer ussan n 30 d 31 Ɣuct 2021.

3Lexbeṛ-agi n lxiṛ i wen-d newwi ur ibni ara ɣef lekdeb neɣ ɣef tḥila d lexdeɛ.
4Sidi Ṛebbi ițkel fell-aɣ, daymi i ɣ-iceggeɛ iwakken a nbecceṛ awal-is. Axaṭer iẓra nețmeslay mačči iwakken a neɛǧeb i yemdanen, meɛna iwakken a s-neɛǧeb i nețța yessnen ulawen-nneɣ.

11Teẓram daɣen nella i mkul yiwen deg-wen am ubabat ɣer warraw-is.

18Acḥal n tikkal i nebɣa a nuɣal ɣuṛ-wen, nekk s yiman-iw, yiwet neɣ snat n tikkal i ɛerḍeɣ a n-ruḥeɣ, meɛna Cciṭan ur aɣ yeǧǧi ara, iqḍeɛ-aɣ abrid.

20Ț-țideț, d kunwi i d can nneɣ i d lfeṛḥ-nneɣ.

Amlu aneggaru ay d-iheyya Antonio Guterres ɣef tegnit deg Tniri Tutrimt « maci d amlu ummid deg uglam ay d-yeglem tagnit » yernu d win ara yeǧǧen Aseqqamu n Tɣellist ad yeswingem dakken tagnit attan d tarusant yernu krayellan atan yelha deg temnaḍt-a, yili tagnit attan trekkem, ladɣa deg Lgergarat, yernu iduba imeṛṛukiyen mazal ttkemmilen arkaḍ-nsen n yizerfan n umdan deg yigelluyen yettwawedgen », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Mohamed Omar deg yiwet n tesguri i Tnegga n Yisalan n Lezzayer.
Ixebber-d dakken Tagduda Taɛṛabt Tawnirit Tamegdayt tessenfali-d tagayt-nnes i waya s ubrid n uselway-nnes d uwnetlay amatu n Terni n Polisario, Ibrahim Ghali, deg yiwet n tebṛat ay tuzen i uwnetlay amatu n Tuddsa n Yiɣlanen Yeddukklen d uselway n Useqqamu n Tɣellist, ass n 6 Tubeṛ.
Ɣef leḥsab n yidis awniri, amlu-a, mer dani, ad yili d amesɣaru yernu ad d-yessken tilawt deg temnaḍt-a maca netta yessers taɣtest d win irekḍen izerfan deg yiwen n udeg, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Mohamed Omar.
D acu kan, tagnit deg temnaḍt-a mazal tebɛed akken ad tili akken iwata imi awdag ameṛṛuki mazal iɣeḍḍel-d aramaɣ ɣef Yiwniriyen deg temnaḍin yettwawedgen yernu yettkemmil arkaḍ anagrawan n usebded n yimenɣi deg Lgergarat sdat tiṭṭawin n Tuɣdaḍt n Yiɣlanen Yeddukklen d-Yelhan s Usuddes n Tsefrant deg Tniri Tutrimt, ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked ugensas n Terni n Polisario deg Tuddsa n Yiɣlanen Yeddukklen.

Lezzayer Tamaneɣt Tiferkit n webrid n tufɣa seg wekman, id yellan s sseba n unfafad n coronavirus (Covid 19), ad tili « tafarant d tamleɣwayt » yesefk ad tili « s waccil » ɣef leḥsab n isemtar n udabu adawsan s lemcawrat akked yecriken inmettanen, id yewekked ass n larebɛa uneɣlaf amenzu, Mass Abdelaziz Djerad.
Mass Djerad, i yesselwin, yiwet n temlilit id yellan s usarag n tezrawit akked unabaḍ, yesmektad iwehhiyen n uselway n tegduda yerzan tamsalt a, yerna yennad dakken « Tiferkit n webrid n tufɣa seg wekman, ar ad yilin d tafarant yerna d tamleɣwayt, yesefk ad tili s waccil ɣef leḥsab n isemtar n udabu adawsan s lemcawrat akked yecriken inmettanen ».
Yerna yewekked ed, ilmend n temlilit a, dakken « tadawsa n yiɣermanen ad teqqim d aɣbel uzwiran n yiduba inagduden ».

(Tamurt) – Awal yewweḍ ɣer yal tama n tmurt. Nnan tutlayt tamaziɣt ad tuɣal d tutlayt tunṣibt di tmenḍawt n tmurt tadzayrit. Wa yenna igerrez wannect-a mačči d kra, «tout va bien» tura. Wa yenna «annect-a d azerreg kan». Nekk s yiman-iw ufiɣ annect-a kra yelha deg-s, kra d irit.
Ayen yelhan: Tamezwarut: Yad yezzin azagur i tutlayt tamaziɣt, ddan d udabu tura atan twabahdeln, acku adabu-nsen yenna ih i tmaziɣt, ɣas annect-a d awal kan. Irgazen-a amek ara ad xedmen i wudmawen-nsen tura? Tis snat: 
... 
es amaziɣ anida yedda yiwen. Tis krad: Amur ameqqran n Yizwawen/Tizwawin ur yizmir yiwen a sen-izerreg tura. Ɣran, ssnen, faqen!
Ihi adabu adzayri ma yella d tidet ira tamaziɣt d tutlayt tunṣibt n tmurt, ihi cic ad yefkk akk ayen yefka i taɛrab i tmaziɣt daɣen. Ma d tidet ira tamaziɣt, ihi yessefk ad yekmasi ass-a yakan tira-ines di tɣiwanin, ad yefkk udem amaziɣ i tmurt tadzayrit deg kra yellan d aḥric n tsertit n tmurt.
Ihi ma d tidet ira tamaziɣt, cic ad yerr tamurt n Dzayer d tamurt tafidira
...
en d tamaziɣt. Nekni di tmurt-nneɣ TamazɣaTalemmast (Tamurt n Iqbayliyin) a nexdem s tutlayt-nneɣ Tazwawt-Tamaziɣt. S uwanek akk d unabaḍ kan izwawen i yezmer ad yili wannect-a!
Nekni s Yizwawen yessefk a nẓer merra d nekni kan i yebɣan tutlayt-nneɣ, s nekni kan i tezmer ad tedder. S tutlayt-nneɣ kan i nezmer a nessali tamurt-nneɣ d asawen, s tutlayt-nneɣ kan di tmurt-nneɣ i nezmer a nseggem tudert-nneɣ. Ihi tutlayt-nneɣ yessefk ad tili gar ifassen-nneɣ! Ayen akk nniḍen d azerreg kan!
Akli Azwaw

« Yesmemmi unabaḍ tiferkit n ubrid n uɣlif n tmaḍirt i usnegmu n tyufa tisnuddsanin, yernu izedda-d tisemsedda ara iḍemnen asmekmem d userbeḥ n tferkit-a n ubrid deg unrar deg wakk iswiren, ama seg yidis azerfan, ama seg yidis n yimetwiyen n udhal, n tmunit d usileɣ atwilan », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Harouadi s yisem-nnes d agensas n uɣlif n tkerrazt, i lmend n urẓam n usarag ɣef usnegmu n tyufa tisnuddsanin ay yessuddes uɣlif n tmaḍirt.
Aɣlif n tkerrazt, ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked, « yessaram adraw n wakk idisan ay terza temsalt n wahil n usnegmu n tyufa tisnuddsanin, ama d imkerrazen, ama d imsatwilen, ama d imuzzayen niɣ d imasayen n yiɣsuren ibankanen d yideblanen deg ukatar n tiddit-a ».
Yesmekti-d dakken tamhelt-a iswi-nnes d « asemselsi n yifarisen d-yettwaǧwen s yifarisen iɣelnawen i uḍman n umnekni n tsistelt tanezzant d useḍru n usnegmu anmetti d udamsan ».
Seg yidis niḍen, yenna-d Farid Harouadi dakken amyager-a, aydeg derwen yigensasen seg 10 n twilayin n utaram n tmurt, « iswi-nnes d asemned n wakaten ay teddem tmaḍirt i usnegmu n tyufa tisnuddsanin s usugget n uskurrez n ukulza d uwekked ɣef wakaten isebɣasen ay yettwaɣetsen i ubaɣur n yimkerrazen d yimsemhal idamsanen i usnegmu n yifurka ikerrazanen yesɛan azal yernan ».

Mark Knopfler
Mark Knopfler d amgay d asniy. Yetturar tagiṭart u icennu . Ilul di 1949 di Glasgow .
Yesbedd netta d gmat David tarbaɛt Dire Straits d 1977 , yuɣalen mechuret aṭas. Tarbaɛt-agi teḥbes aseggass 1996. Si tallit-nni Mark Knopler yeturrar d abecniw.
Ccna d lḥen n Mark Knopfler d win icebḥen nezzeh . Ṣsenf n ṭzuri ines d win n blues-country-rock.
amgay : auteur ( néolog)
asniy : compositeur (néolog)
abecniw : soliste ( Timmimoun)

Adanay armiti (s Taserɣint : أبو منجل الأصلع ) iga yan wanaw n waylaln imqqurn g tmsgza n udanay d ar ifsser g tama n isaffn. Iga waylal ad yan ɣ imudar ittusmagln s ufuḍ s kigan, d ilkm uṭṭun n waylaln ad g taganin 420 hlli, d uṭṭun nnsn g tmqqilin ar ilkkem ar kra n 1500. Ikkattin ifsr g ku iẓẓlmḍ n tfriqt d ugmmuḍ anammas, d idrarn n Aleb d Uṛupa, waxxa yafuḍ g kra n 400 n usggʷas izrin.
Ar itturkan ufssr n udanay armiti agafan ɣilad g ugmmuḍ anammas d iẓẓlmḍ n tfṛiqt d kra n tmnaḍin ɣ tiniri tamqqrant, slawann akkʷ g Umṛṛuk d Tuṛkya d Ddzayr d Surya. Ar yadlli ittunna mas-d aylaln ad ar itturkan ufssr nnsn ɣar g Umṛṛuk, ar kiɣ tettyufa yat tmsddurruyt g Surya g usggʷas n 2002. Adanay armiti illa ɣ Umṛṛuk g wasif n masst.

Lexsas n waman, yir iberdan akked tugett n yiḍuman deg iberdan yesserfa imezdaɣ n Taddart tameqrant di tɣiwant n Amizur.
D anect-agi i yissawḍen imezdaɣ-agi ad cektin ɣer wid teɛna temsalt ass n tlata 9 deg waggur n tuber.
Imezdaɣ n taddart-agi, nnan: » ɣas iffeɣ unebdu, mazal aman xusen di taddart-nneɣ ». Am akken daɣen i ttcetkin ɣef yir ḥala n webrid yettawin ɣer taddart. Dɣa wid isexdamen tikeryas, ḍruran s waṭas. Rnu ɣer-s, imezdaɣ-agi wehmen d acu i yeǧǧan imeḍbren ur jmiɛen ara iḍuman imi ayagi iḍur imezdaɣ s yir rriḥa, izan d tizzit akked waṭanen i izemren ad d-nnulfun.
Ouanoughi Cherif

Imezdaɣ n Rrmila i d-yezgan di tɣiwant n Sidi Ɛic, belɛen ass-a n letnayen 12 deg waggur n ctember abrid aɣelnaw wis-26 yettawin ger Bgayet d Sidi Ɛic.
Imezdaɣ-agi ran ad d-sseknen lɣiḍ-nsen mgal imḍebbren n luzin n lyajuṛ akked d wid ibennun lkazirna n iǧadarmiyen i d-yellan d sebba n uɣebbaṛ iḍurren imezdaɣ s waṭas. Aɣebbaṛ-agi yekka-d seg wedrar ansa i d-ɣazen akal s win xedmen lyajuṛ. Akal-agi s i d-xedmen lyajur d win i sebba n uɣebbar iɣumen abrid sexdamen imezdaɣ. Am akken i d-yewwi lmeḍra s waṭas i yimezdaɣ d isekkla akked wakal n tfellaḥt.
Imezdaɣ -agi, yuɣ lḥal cektan aṭas tikal i wid teɛna temsalt, maca tifrat ur d-tella ara. d ayen i yeǧǧan imesbaniyen-agi ad belɛen abrid , imi d wa i d ttawil aneggaru s ara ṣiwden ɣer wayen suturen.

Iguersafene, La Vidéo-conférence de Rachid OULEBSIR du 25 mars 2016
Ce vendredi, le 25 mars 2016 à Iguersafene, Une conférence-débat sous le thème « Amager N’Tefsut, la sauvegarde du patrimoine kabyle ». Animé par le journaliste écrivain Rachid Oulebsir, cette communication est donnée au niveau du foyer de jeunes d’Alma organisé par l’association touristique « »Le village du monde »
Amager n tefsut, Seddaw tafukt i ijeǧǧigen.

Tameddit n wass, ttawin tullas yewwḍen i zzwaǧ ad glilzent deg umrij qqaren-as aglilez n tefsut. Mi d-uɣalen iseggaden ad ferqen ayen d-ṣeǧǧden ɣef yixxamen n taddart, ad xedmen imensi. Imensi xedmen deg-s 7 n yisufar i useqqi aquran, (lḥemmeẓ, ibawen, lɛess, lubyan, ajilban…), arrac ttbaddaden ɣef twwura n yixxamen, yal tawacult tettqbaliten-id s tẓidanin, imeqruḍ, t

Ad d-nawi timẓin d yirden
Yiwen n ilemẓi yenna-d :
Deg yiwet n taddart mi ara yeɣḍel yiwen aseklu, at-taddart tt-ḥettimen fell-as ad yeẓẓu 10 akken ad yeɣrem winna yeɣḍel akken.
Akken yefka usarag, tebda tikli ar iḥerqan n taddart, arrac zwaren, zzenǧeq n Yimaziɣen di tlemmast-nsen, teddun ttsuɣun : « Ad nemmager tafsut argaz tameṭṭut », ḍefent tlawin, d yirgazen, di tlemmast-nsen iḍebbalen, ttawin-d tizlatin, s ṭṭbel, abendayer d lɣiḍa, s taḍsa deg udmawen, lferḥ yeččur ulawen.
Tansa n Talsa

Tennulfa-d tddukkla n yimiyupaten DEFI di tdayra n Tezmalt, aseggas n 2001. D tameṭṭut tabeɣɣast Nura Ayt Ɛebderreḥman i yellan deffir usnulfu-is s tallelt n yimsujjiyen d kra n medden. Aṭas-aya segmi teccektay tddukkla-a seg lexlas n wallalen idrimanen d yiɣawsanen ara tt-yeǧǧen ad tessemres akken iwata aɣawas-is n tigawin n useggas. Llum, yettili yal tikkelt ɣef yimḍebbren n uɣlif d twilayt n Bgayet abeɛda, ur d-nerri ddhen-nsen ɣer tddukkla-a d yimiyupaten s umata. Dɣa, ussan-a kan, terza-d y
... 
ddukkla akken ad testeqsi ɣef kra n tlufa, ad twali amek tella tddukkla d wacu-tent tsutriwin-is tigejdanin.
Yedda-d deg teseqqamut-a n unadi imwelleh n uɣlif n temsetlelt, anemhal n tigawt tinmettit n Bgayet d unmazul-is. Deg ddeqs n wakud, yella-d uskasi d umbaddal n wawalen gar yiɛeggalen n tddukkla DEFI d wid n teseqqamut-a. Ferḥen ayendin yiɛeggalen n tddukkla-a seg tirza-a i ssaramen ad d-tawi kra n ubeddel i waddad d tudert n yimiyupaten n Bgayet abeɛda. Gar wayen i d-yellan daɣen di tirz
...
 yizmamen i tddukkla DEFI i lmend n unadi-nsen. Ɣef wawal n yiɛeggalen n tddukkla-a n twilayt, tefka-asen akken ilaq s umeẓẓuɣ teseqqamut ɣef wayen sutren deg-s d wayen i as-ccektan ɣef lexsas. Mi tekfa dayen temlilit, ffɣen yimekkiyen ɣer berra anida gan kra n tewlafin i ccfawa. « Nwala aṭas-aya segmi yettwaḍerref umeɛḍur, yettwakkes-as uzref-is. Nessaram ad bdunt ad teddunt tlufa akken ilaq, ad aɣ-yemmag uɛeddi di berra, imi ula d tajernant-nneɣ ad tt-salin », i d-yenna yiwen n umiyupat.
M. K.

« Imeḥsab yellan deg weḥbaz adeblan deg tkurmutin tisṛayiliyin ɣetsen ad ɣanzun tinefra tisṛayiliyin yernu d tikkelt tamezwarut ay d-yella weɣtas-a, am wakken ay ɛewwlen ad yili d aɣtas-nsen aneggaru seg wass n 15 Fuṛaṛ d asawen, yernu yella-d waya i uccetki ɣef tsertit-a taruɣdimt », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Issa Qaraqe deg yiwen n usarag n tɣemsa deg Ramallah, deg Ugemmaḍ Utrim yettwawedgen.
Azal n 500 n Yifalesṭiniyen ay yella, ass-a, deg weḥbas adeblan deg tkurmutin tisṛayiliyin.
Anagraw-a d win ay yettaǧǧan aḥbas n yimeckuken war ccṛeɛ i tallit n 6 n wayyuren ay yettwaɛawaden war tilisa. Kra n yimeḥbas ur ttwaxebbaren ara ula ɣef ssebba n weḥbas-nsen. D ccṛeɛ aserdasan isṛayili ay iɣettsen asseɣzef n weḥbas-nni neɣ tukksa-nnes.
Yenna-d daɣ Mass Qaqare dakken imeḥsab ifalesṭiniyen ay yettwaḥebsen ddaw unagraw-a afɣuɣdim ad fken lameṛ i yibugaṭuten-nsen akken ur d-ttasen ara ɣer tnefra aydeg ara ttwacaṛɛen.
Anagraw-a n weḥbas zeɣnen-t Yifalesṭiniyen, tuddsiwin n temḥaddit n yizerfan n wemdan d yimaslaḍen n wemɣiwan agraɣlan ay yetthamayen Isṛayil s usseqdec-nnes akkin i tlisa.
Imeḥbas ifalesṭiniyen nnummen ttgen isundiden n laẓ akken ad d-ssummlen ṣṣenf-a n weḥbas d yir tignatin aydeg ttwaḥebsen.

Dda Saɛid ḤAMUM, ilul deg useggas n 1956 di taddart n At wizgan. Asmi yesɛa sin n yiseggasen di leɛmer-ines, yeɣli ɣer lkanun, times tečča allen-is, tes-sedrɣel-it. Xas ma tadyant i as-yeḍran qerriḥet, Dda Saɛid ur yebri ara i ṭṭbel deg waman, ur yerr ara iman-is deg-idis di tmetti ideg yettidir.
Yekker- d am yilmeẓyen n taddart-is, ileḥḥu, yetturar, yettḥewwis, am tizya-s, am winna akken yettwalin. Aṭas n imahilen yexdem iwaken ad yessasi aɣrum-is. Dda saɛid yezweǧ, yesɛa kraḍ warrac akked teqc
... 
uy isufar n wučči, alarmi d asmi d-yufa axeddim deg yiwet n tkebbanit yessexdamen imdanen ixussen deg usekkud. Dinna, Dda Saɛid yelmed amek ara yexdem imedwasen, dinna daɣen i yegza amennuɣ ɣef yizerfan n yimeɛdar.
Xas akken ur yeɣri ara deg uɣerbaz, maca tessɣer-it ddunit, yelmed si tilufa i as-yezzin, tid-nni yurzen tudert-is, yettmeyyiz, yettxemmim am yimusnawen imeqranen yecban amaru mechuren aṭas  >, id yennan deg wawal-is:  >. Yezri wakud, Dda Saɛid, simmal yettaẓ ɣer sdat, xas ma uguren z
...
n  >, iswi n tiddukla-a d amennuɣ n yal ass ɣef izerfan n imeɛdar sumata. Di tazwara, tiddukla-agi tettɛawan imeɛdar s kra n tɣawsiwin, am tiɛewzin, tifersuda, isufar n wučči.
Ass-a,tiddukliwin nniḍen ttmettatent, kra dayen mmutent, ma d tiddukla n Dda Saɛid mazal-itt tedder, tessewhem imdanen. Xas ma ḥercaw-it wussan maca tiddukla tedder d wussan, tessawed ass-a, teldi aɣerbaz anda ara sselmaden imeɛdar. Aya akk dayen yeǧǧan aselway-is ad yuɣal d amedya di tmurt n Leqbayel.
Sghur Hemmar Bussaed

Lmulud yettmuqul taqeddact ar wallen, am akken anda itt-yessen, itt-yemlal yagi. Netta yuɣ lḥal, yettani-tt kan ar wudem akken ad yessers tamuɣli-s, ad iẓer ma ttagnawit n lmerruk neɣ ttin n lzayer. Maca ima ahat ttamaziɣt maḍi ? Is-yeqqar, mačči imi tettmeslayt tagnawit kan dayen ttaɛravt i tella. Llant aka tmaziɣin n Lmerruk xeddment ttiqeddacin ar iqvayliyen di ttevrani-nsen; yak ula d nutenti uḥwaǧent ad idiren ttilelliyin ! Deg iseggasen n sebɛin, tmanyin, xilla n taɛravin id-yemmaren ar Fransa am (...)

Adrar n tmeddurt ad iknu imi iǧǧa-d tarwa-s i s ifkan azal, wid dɣa is d-iskanen udem-ines n tidett.
Tarwa-k d awezɣi ad k nekkṛen, udem‑ik d win ttawin ger wallen‑nnsen anda vɣun ilin. Wid I wumi teččureḍ allen d widak ittaken idammen‑nnsen d tidiwin‑nnsen akken ad sswen azar n yedles‑inek ad yiddir ur yettɣar ara. Trika d ugerruj i d-teǧǧiḍ i tarwa‑k mačči d ayen yettfakan d idles ɣlayen, yal wa d acu n temda n tzuri i yekcem, imezwura ṛzan asalu, tasuta n wassa ttfen deg ijufaṛ‑nnsen; win ise
... 
lali Ccix. Ilul di tewrirt n at gana deg ifnayen Vgayet .
Deg useggas 1980, azamul n Tefsut imaziɣen yella di tmurt Lalman. Anazur‑agi ɣas akken iseggasen 80 yura‑ten wallaɣ‑is imi yeǧǧa tamurt‑is, maca tamaziɣt iwwitt deg wul‑is imi ɣas akken yettidir d iminig, tiktiwin‑is d awezɣi a sent‑ivru deg idammen i s yettazzal wawal n tmaziɣt. Ǧillali Ccix d anazur amaynut di teklut maca ikcem s telqay deg wennar‑agi imi ula di nnqec ɣef usɣar yufrar‑d attas.
Ayen i d-isken ɣef telwiḥin yemhel d ayen d
...
‑is, wid yessnen walan d acu i d‑teqqar taklut s yiniten tekseḍ ttafen ula d taɣara n wemdan amek‑itt. Tazuri ass‑a tuɣal d amḍiq i deg tteffren imaziɣen. Yenna s tzuṛi‑inu ad sen‑d‑werriɣ I wiyaḍ d akken ar ass‑a idles‑inu ikṛeḍ.
Di taggara, Ǧilali Ccix yerra tajmilt tameqqrant i yimaziɣen yeɣlin ɣef tmurt n imawlan akken llan, d amyaru, d aneɣmas, d amussnaw, d acennay:
« Ayen iḍeṛṛun di tmurt‑iw d ayen iqerḥen aṭas.
Ssarameɣ talwit, tazmert d tilelli i widak i yettmehilen ɣef yedles Amaziɣ. »

Cḥal qaɛ n Mikro‑Plastik i yellan di Tmurt?
Lebḥer n wagrakal (méditerranée) i yellan yallah d 1% zi min day-s di tmurt d aman, nettaf day-s 7% n mikro-plastik n ddunect!, ijen wanict, wer t-ufin imerzuten ura deg yijen lebarar 1,25 mlyun n iwezwizen n Plastik di km². anict uya, a t-idd-tennḍed rebɛa n twalatin i min yellan di Pazifik.
95% n wefraḍ day-s di lebḥer acemlal d Plastik. ittas-d zi Tturk d Seppaniya, Ataryar, Misra, d Franṣa! ɛlaḥsab tarezzut n WWF .

, ad tedwel d Mikro‑plastik! Afraḍ di lbidu n wefrad!
cwayt n ḥeṭṭu deg usewweq yessbeḥ, a nessenqes zi min ittmenzan di Plastik. akid-neɣ nkessi tacyart di dd-ɣa nttegg leḥwayej. Tantala
Tga tantala tawila n yat tutlayt, ar sis tsawal kra n trabbut n mddn. Mddn nna izdɣn ɣ yan udɣar iẓḍar ad ckrn yat tantala. Mddn lli mmrwasnin s kra n tɣarast, zun d asmil anamun, ẓḍarn ad drun kra n tantala
Ur illi kra n unuḥyu ifawn gr tantala d tutalyt. S umdya, tantala n Ayt Baɛmṛan d tin Iḥaḥan gant tantlayin n tutlayt taclḥiyt. Ur mmzrint amr s imikk ɣ umawal d ususru. Mqqar illa imikk n unuḥyu, ar ttiẓḍirn imssiwln sisnt ad ttnyalkam, irms ku yan winn yaḍn.
Taɣtst f is iga yan ung
... 
ty) n mddn nɣ af ad gin agzzum zɣ tdlsa tanamurt mqqurn. Yat tikklt inna umsnils Maks Weinrix, s taḍsa, ma s d "Tutlayt tga tantala iṭṭafn tasrdast d tylant".

Tutlayt Tajapunit d Tukinawant lant assaɣ gratsnt acku gant snat itsnt zɣ twja n tutlayin tijapunikin, maccan ur illi unyarmas gratsnt. Lliɣ ikcm uwank n Jappun s Ukinawa ɣ uzmz n Miji, ar tettini tnbaḍt n Jjapun is d tantala n Tjappunit ka ad tga Tukinawant. Aya tssmrst afad ad tgdl awal s tukinawant f ayt dars
...
m tutlayin. Acnt lli s aẓnt i Tbrṭqqizt d Tuksitant, a s aẓnt i tṣbnyult.
Tinglizt, ass ad, ibayn is tga tutlayt, macc tkka tt inn tga Tanglu-saksunt, yat tantala n Tsaksunt Taqburt.
Imzarayn g tantlayin ẓḍarn ad gin:
- Tiguriwin: Gawr ɣ kra n tqbilin d Skkiws ɣ tiyyaḍ.
- Asusru/astutli: t ɣ kra n tqbilin, ar ittwstutli s. (Amdya: Sasa / Tasa)
- grammar: tanzɣt s (tanilant) ɣ kra tantlayin ur da tsskcam ism tt iḍfarn s addad amaruz, ɣ tantalyin yaḍn ar t tsskcam. (Ddiɣ s agadir / Ddiɣ s ugadir).

Aɣrud n tejṛa d-yettwawekkden n unfafad bu uqacuc yewweḍ ɣer 124.288, gar-asent 184 n tejṛa timaynutin. Aɣrud n tmettanin yewweḍ ɣer 3.335, ma d amḍan n yimuḍinen yejjin yewweḍ ɣer 86.554, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna ulɣu-a.
Seg yidis niḍen, 22 n yimuḍinen ay yellan, imir-a, deg usesfer aneẓẓaw, ɣef wakken ay d-yerna uɣbalu-a.
Seg tama niḍen, 29 n twilayin aydeg ur d-telli ula d yiwet n tejṛut deg tecrawt taneggarut. 14 n twilayin kelsent-d gar 1 d 9 n tejṛa, deg wakud aydeg 5 n twilayin kelsent-d ugar n 10 n tejṛa.
Aɣlif yesmekti-d, i lmend n waya, dakken tagnit tasenbayyurant aydeg tella tmurt tessurut-d seg yal aɣerman ad iḥader yernu ad yezrek ilugan n wuɣus d umgugu afekkan, am wakken ay d-iḥettet ɣef uzrak n ukman d tmelsiwt n tgelmust.

Ttilibizyu Aspanyu, yessiwel x ca n iḥudriyen d Imeɣrabiyen, ig innuɣen di Sebta. Iwdan-a yina ggin ijjen ubeddi maḥend ad ten-jjen di Sebta. Niɣ ad ten-awyen ɣer Spaniya. Iḥudriyen-a ksin bandu Aspanyu, ca zzag-sen iqqar belli ixes ad idwel ɣer Lmuɣrib maca azgen ameqqran rezzun ca n tebdridt i zi ɣa raḥen ɣer Spanya. Deg ubeddi-nni i yeggin qqimen sɣuyyen « Viva España »
Site n "www.lerifain.fr" d ijjen uraq mani nettari s Tmaziɣt waha, dag-s ineɣmisen d merra mayen yeqqnen ɣer tira, aya d tizemmar zeg iḥudriyen maḥend Tmaziɣt n Arrif ad kid-s nennum di tira, ad yemɣar wagra-nnes n tira.

Titeggarin timezwura yellan d tiqdimin yakan, d tibṛatin i yura Bulus s yiman-is. Tid meṛṛa yura uqbel ad yili d ameḥbus di Ṛuma, ger useggas n 60 d useggas n 62. Nufa belli azal n ɛecra n tebṛatin yura-tent ger usaggas n 48 d useggas n 60. D iḍrisen imezwura meṛṛa n Lɛehd Ajdid.
Anwat ihi Bulus-agi yellan seg imyura imezwura, i d-yeǧǧan iḍrisen n Lɛehd Ajdid ? Yella d aɣerman aṛumanin, lṣel-is seg at Israil. Isem-is asrayili d Caɛul. Ilul di temdint n Ṭarsus, d tamdint d yezgan asamar n tmurt n
... 
k d yiniyen yura.
Yeɣra di Yirucalim ɣer yiwen uselmad meqqren yettusemman Gamalyal. Aselmad-agi d yiwen seg meqranen n ukabar n ifariziyen, akabar n ddin n wat Israil. Yella Bulus d anelmad d yewwin iman-is, yeččur d leḥrara, yeṭṭef mliḥ deg ansayen n lejdud-is, d tnettit n wat Israil. Ad yini ayagi di tebṛatt yura i wat Galasya (1.13).
Yezmer ahat ad yili yettekka ula deg seqqamu ɛlayen n wat Israil. Deg akken yeṭṭef nezzeh deg iṣuḍaf d wansayen n wat Israil, yekker-d mgal imasiḥiyen imezwura 
...
nger tijmuyaɛ-nsen ( Galasya 1.13). Armi d ass i deg yemlal d Lmasiḥ, deg ubrid n Dimecq, anda yeɛqel, s lbal-is d terwiḥt-is, tidett n leslak yellan deg ubrid-agi. Ters-d deg ul-is s ttbut meqqren tidett n lmut d ḥeggu n Lmasiḥ. Yuqel d netta i yrefden izen-agi n Lmasiḥ, yuqel si ger imceggɛen ara yeṣṣiwḍen lexbaṛ n Lmasiḥ i leǧnas meṛṛa.
D tudert-is yenbeddalen ara yilin d tangit d ttbut n wayen ara yesselmed ara yeṣiṣiweḍ, di tebṛatin akk ara yaru ɣer zdat. D iḍrisen ara d-yeqqimen i wmezruy.

Yusa-yaɣ-d yiwen isali id-yeqqaren: Mass Maǧu Aɣilas ( Madjou Aghilas ) hatan yettwacelqef (yettwaker) di tama n tegzirt ass n lexmis 18 tuber 2012 yernu Ilemẓi-agi yuḍen aṭṭan n sekkar.
Taddart-is “At Illul” id-yussan deg uẓeffun, tessawal i yeqbayliyen anda ma llan akken ad ilin ɣer yidis n twacult n ilemẓ yag, i wakken ad d-yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is.
Tettwaheggad yiwet n tikli akked tagant n snat swayeɛ akken ad d-yili usutar n ussareḥ n Ɣilas melba ccerṭ. Tikli-agi ad d-tili ass n Lḥed 21/10/12 deg uẓeffun seg wexxam n tɣiwant a la ma d axxam n Tedwirt n temdint agi.
Tadyant-agi ad d-ternu ɣer waṭas n tiyaḍ id-yellan yakan di tmurt n iqbayeliyen. I wesmekti kan tadyant taneggarut d tin n Muqran Belqasem id-yellan di Meɣres 2012. Aṭṭan agi id-yeɣlin ɣef tmurt n iqbayliyen yettnerni seg wass ɣer wass.
Asteqsi-nneɣ d wagi: Anda yella udabu? D anwaten yemdanen agi itezzin am tgarfiwin ɣef tmurt n n iqbayliyen? Acuɣer ayagi yettili-d kan di tmurt n iqbayliyen?
Sɣur: Muccen.

Massinissa
Masinissa Iga masinissa amzwaru agllid amqran deg umezruy amaziɣ azayku. Ilul deg usggas as n 238 zdat n tlalit n lmasih, g tgldit n masin. Tugha t d argaz idusn. Ittmngha khf tmurt nnes ar tingira n tudert nnes. Ittwassn s tnka n iysan d ufrag d tayri n tmazirt nns. Umi yumz tanbaḍt , yufa masinissa kigan n tmnaḍin n tmazirt ns g ifassn n umddurruy n iruminiyn d iqrtajn. Awarin n wattas n imnɣan , ismun timnaḍin ad, ismunt ntn ɣ yat tgldit taxatart. Isɣuda Masinissa tudert n ugdud nns. Isbughla tadamsa n tgldit nns s ussmghr n ufars n imndi d uzatim d idqqi. Issugt inyalkamn imzzizayn akd tmizar yadn. Anaruz n masinissa: tilelli d tamunt n ifriqya n yizzlmd. Llig immut g usggas 148 bra n uzmz n eisa, Iskr as agdud ns yan usmdl imqqurn g tmnadt n yiɣrm n qsstantin. Da ttinin ittwassn Masinissa amzwaru s Wawal nns: >

Ṭariq Ramadan d Amaṣri deg uẓar, d Asswisi di taYlent imi ikker-d di tmurt uguglu d cikula. AsYan ur ivan d Ineslem akken iqqar netta neY Isneslem akken qqaren wiyaḍ fell-as. Maca akken ivYu iffer asYan ines afuḥan, ini ines isvegnen it-id, neY ifḍeḥ it-id akya. Nesla yas u nwala-t ar tiliẓriyin n Fransa u ḥaca wid i mazal-iten ccuren d nnya i umi ittkellix. Wanag wid i t isnen d wid isnen wid t icuvan kra ara d-yini d aḍu. Ula d tidett ines ilaq as ttvut akken ad tt nwali d tidett macci d aṛeqq
... 
Ṭariq d Arufi assen ad tenger ddunit. Ma d assa levYi-s d wayen ittmenni d ayen issargagayen wid ittewten Yef tlelli d wid itemlek tlayikit.
Ṭariq teẓwer iẓwer. Issen as i wawal d uskasi tikli. Yufa avrid i wid isqardicen yid-es acku issen timuYliwin d usirem nsen. IttYima asen am uṣeggad yundin i umargu. Nutni llan s tidett dacu illan d wayen ssaramen, netta yuni-ten akken aten irnu, aten yagar s wawal. D axabit Yef sin iḍaren. D tiḥraymit ivedden! DiYen netta aYvel ines, am Isenselmen ak ifkan
...
ḍen, mi iẓra iman is gar Inselmen i illa ad ivdu aseqdec gar wid is issellen akken aten issarki Yef tmetti turufit. Aten idegger Yer cwal d usYan. Ur ten ittweṣṣi ara ad Yren ad ṣṣegmen iman nsen akken ad revḥen u ad srevḥen. Uhu! Ayen i t iceYven d tineslemt d wamek ara tennerni, ara timYur di Turuft akken ad tessiweḍ ar iswi nsen amuqran: aYmar n umaḍal u ad sseYlin deg-s tugdi s ilugan n cariâa. Ad war sneḥdar i ugejdur d uqriḥ am wa. A war sneḥder i uṭṭellis ma ara iYurm tafat deg zal qayli.

Héritage des Celtes
L’Héritage des Celtes (Hêrezh ar Gelted) a zo ur strollad sonerien, lod vrasañ anezho eus ar broioù a vez graet keltiek anezho. Bodet eo bet ar strollad gant daou Gemperad, ar produer Jakez Bernard hag ar gitarour-kaner Dan ar Braz. Asambles e son an holl sonerien tonioù keltiek hengounel hag ivez tonioù rock ha folk bet savet gant Dan ar Braz.

Taddart n Ifouzer, d yiwet seg 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-yezgan deg ugafa n tɣiwant-agi, yellan di dayra n Ouaguenoun. Taddart-agi, mazal ar ass-a n wussan, tettidir, iseggasen-agi ineggura, lexṣaṣ d ameqqran deg yiḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert tartar, gar-asen: ttawil n Internet, yir liḥala n yiberdan, imḍiqen i yilmeẓyen akked uɣbel n waman n tissit, trisiti …atg. Acu kan tikkelt-agi, kkren-d yimezdaɣ n taddart-a i wakken ad ssutren azref-nsen i ttraǧun acḥal-aya. 
... 
 d aseggem n ubrid ameqqaran n taddart. Aneggaru-a, yeqqnen gar Tizi n Tagouma (Akaoudj) d taddart-agi n Ifouzer, i ittekemmilen alamma d taddert n Manaam, ha-t-an deg yir liḥala.
Niqal deg useggas n 2013 i d-yeffeɣ usenfar n ubrid-a, imi teffeɣ-d tedrimt-is, maca mazal ur yettwaxdam ara. Di tazwara, ufan-d ssebba s usekcem n lgaz n temdint, yuɣal nnan-asen ad nexdem kan azgen deg-s, maca ar tura ulac d acu yettwaxedmen. Xas ulamma deg useggas n 2018 i d asen-yefka aṛeggem Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwa
...
 i d-ibanen. Mbeɛd sebɛa n yiseggasen n uraǧu, ɛebblen-d yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi i uɣlaq n uxxam n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Yella-d uɣlaq-is i wugar n ddurt tura, ttellin-tt sya ɣer da akken ad xedmen yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant-a lecɣal-nsen. Ma d iḍelli n lḥed, 06 cutember 2020, kemmlen ɣelqen daɣen asɣim n dayra n Ouaguenoun, yellan di Tikobaine. Ɣef wakken i t-id-nnan yimezdaɣ n taddart-a, ad ikemmel uɣlaq-agi alamma bdan lecɣal n uɛiwed n ubrid-a, yesɛan ma aṭas 2,8 ikilumiṭren.
Adaoun Abdel Ghani

« Amaḍal d umɣiwan agraɣlan ukzen s tillit n sin n yidisan deg umyenkaf n Tniri Tutrimt yernu wi d Meṛṛuk d Terni n Polisario. Zzayer d Muriṭanya d iwanaken kan imanayen », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna uselway Ghali deg yiwet n tdiwennit ay iga d tliẓri tazzayrit yernu iɛedda-d ass n usinas.
« Zzayer d tamurt tanaragt tamsisat yernu ur tetteffer ara adhal-nnes i Tniri Tutrimt. Tedhel daɣ nagdudi imussa n uslelli deg Tefriqt d temnaḍin niḍen n umaḍal am Timuṛ Tagmuḍant, Namibya, Muzambik, Angula, Tafriqt n Unẓul d Falesṭin », ɣef wakken ay d-yesmekti.
Imi Meṛṛuk teɣs ad tessedrew Zzayer deg yistagen n uferru n umyenkaf deg Tniri Tutrimt, idis awniri iger-d tiɣri i « usedrew n Fṛansa deg yistagen ladɣa imi ay tedhel asemɣer n uwdag ameṛṛuki s uviṭu-nnes in ugdal n usmemmi n tneɣtusin yellan mgal tɣennant n Meṛṛuk deg Useqqamu n Tɣellist ».

G uyeddeY n umesseḥtu nra ad awen-nn-nesnil yat tatiknikt nna swurun ixendallasen ittasin tilYa n ifeganen g “Internet”. Ggudin iberdan s ttasin tilYa maka illa yan ubrid idrus
Axendelles, neY “Phishing” s Tnegliziyt iga-t yat takiknit nna sskern ittsen ixendallasen afad asin, smuttern d smersen tilYa tibaḍniyin n mdden mi mdin. Mara ad iss-afen, da ttasin
Ittsen imenzayen n tYellist n Uselkim-nnun. Kwnni iYran izen-a, tlam aselkim ittwurun [s umata] s unagraw n wammud (OS) tssker Windows. Aya n unagraw ur Yurs mas ittrara
Anṣuf issun g usmel nnun, InYayi wulinw ig unfeY google afeY ilsawen n umaḍal digs xs winw; TenYayi tasanw ig ssneY idd amata g ijenyuren ittwurun s yilsawen

BRUXELLES– Tiddukliwin timeṛṛukiyin n westan n yizerfan n wemdan ttehment, ass n letniyen deg tesɣimt n Wemni Uṛufi deg Bruxelles, iduba imeṛṛukiyen s wemḥaq n umussu n uccetki aɣerfan d umelwi n Rrif, yernu nnant-d dakken iduba imeṛṛukiyen rekḍent arkaḍ d « amaglay » izerfan n wemdan deg temnaḍt-a.
Ɣef leḥsab n yigensasen n tiddukliwin-a, ay d-yessawlen deg usarag ɣef umussu n Ḥiṛak n Rrif deg Wemni Uṛufi, asseqdec n tekriḍt yekkan i tlisa mgal umussu-a n uccetki amelmi d ayen ay yessawḍen ɣer 
... 
awzi, asseqdec n tekriḍt yekkan i tlisa, abbaẓ war ssebba, acaṛeɛ, aɛetteb d usekker war ṛṛeḥma ay la sɛeddayen yemsulta ɣef yenmeskanen, yernu yerfa Mass Fawzi ɣef « usserdes yernan deg temnaḍt-a. »
Ɣef leḥsab n yimeɣnasen n yizerfan n wemdan, tagnit aydeg tella temnaḍt n Rrif ssebba-nnes d irkaḍen n yizerfan n wemdan, izerfan isertanen, idamsanen, inemttiyen d yidelsanen n yimezdaɣen n temnaḍt-a, yernu yenkeṛ itthamen « ikellaxen » n uneɣlaf amenzu ameṛṛuki ay d-yennan dakken amussu n temnaḍt-
...
n « llan-d yerkaḍen d imaglayen n yizerfan n wemdan deg Rrif », yernu tuggad seg « wexṣar amecɣab » n yizerfan n wemdan deg temnaḍt-a.
Teḥseb-d tmeɣnast-a acḥal n tegnatin n werkaḍ n yizerfan n wemdan deg wayyuren-a yezrin deg temnaḍt n Rrif, yernu tesḥassef imi d timiḍa n yimeɣnasen n umussu-a ay yettwabẓen deg temnaḍt-a, am wakken ay d-tenna dakken azal n 30 seg-sen ay igan asunded n laẓ acḥal n ledwaṛ aya akken ad d-ssummlen ama d abbaẓ-nsen ay ttwalin d amesbaṭli, ama d tagnit-nsen n weḥbas.

Fahem Djoudi …un astre poétique brille sur Gouraya !
Biographie : Fahem Djoudi est un jeune talentueux poète kabyle né le 15 Août 1987 à Bejaia. Ses parents, originaires du village Ifoughalen ont dû quitter le berceau ancestral pour s’installer dans la ville de yemma Gouraya et ; c’est dans cette belle cité de la Kabylie chantée par Chérif Kheddam, Youcef Abjaoui et consort que Fahem a vu le jour.

Yebrir di tmurt n Leqbayel
Yewweḍ-d yebrir, d tafsut. D tafsut n Yimaziɣen akked tefsut tabarkant. Si yal tama yeffeɣ-d ṣṣut. Bgayet, Tizi-Uzzu, Tubiret… Ula di tuddar n Leqbayel yeffeɣ-d ṣṣut n yilmeẓyen, akken snat n tef Aṭas n tiddukliwin id iheggan asmekti n wass-a. Yal tiddukla amek i tjerred leqdic-ines, akken ad smektin ass yecban ass-a, tafsut n Yimaziɣen akked tefsut tabarkant.
Leqdic d amerkanti, yeččur d isaragen, timzikniyin, tamedyezt… Ad naf daɣen tazabut (la dictée) n tmaziɣt d tinna d-yettilin di leqdic n kra n tiddukliwin, deg-s ssebɣasen ilmeẓyen tt-yeqqaren akken ad snernin deg uswir-nsen di tlemda n tutlayt-nsen.
Aseggas-agi ad naf ula d tulawin llant s udem amaynut deg usmekti n snat n tefsuyin-agi. Tulawin tt-id d-yeffɣen culant deg yizenqan n tmannaɣt s tqendurt n Leqbayel, d azamul n yiselsa n tmeṭṭut. S tikli-agi bɣan-t ad d-inint : « mazal-aɣ nella… nella iḍelli ad nili ass-a ».
Di leḥyud n kra n tuddar ad naf ilmeẓyen uran « MA ULAC TAMAZIƔT, ULAC LZZAYER ». Uran daɣen s-yeskilen n tifineɣ yiwet n tefyirt gar isefra n tezlatin n Ferḥat MHENNI « REKKMEƔ DEG URFAN UGAREƔ AMAN ƔEF TMESS », uran daɣen « TILELLI ». Xas ma di tira –nsen llant tucḍiwin n kra n yiskilen, maca dayen yessefṛaḥen acku ilmeẓyen-agi ssawḍen, nudan lemden isekkilen-agi. Di tefyit-agi ad nefhem belli ilmeẓyen-agi zzaɛfen, bɣan ad d-inin : « nessen tameslayt-nneɣ »… D tiɣri n wul akken tamaziɣt ad tuɣal d tunṣibt di tmurt-is, mačči d tarbibt n tutlayt n taɛrabt.

Ibn Ɛarabi
Muḥyeddin Ibn Ɛarabi, s taɛrabt محي الدين ابن عربي, yettwasen kan s yisem n Ibn Ɛarabi, d amedyaz, d amusnaw n ajjed, u wayen umi neqar Mystisism. D yiwen ger ibabaten n tasnakta Taṣufit. Ilul deg usegas n 1165, di Mursi, tamurt n Andaluz, di Sbanya.[1] Imut deg 1240, di Dimecq, tamurt n Surya n tura. Qaren-as daɣen « Cix amuqran », isɛa azal n 846 n yidlisen. Deg isefra ines, yettmeslay-ed af tayri, cbaḥa, iba, aramsu, atg.
Asmi isɛa 14 isegasen, imlal di Kurdu (Sbanya) akw d Averroès, sɣur ilmed aṭas n tmusniwin d tfiluṣufit.

Iswi n temsirt
Asileɣ n yimeqranen (imrayen) n tmezdayt, imḍebren n trebbuyae n yinelmaden d imeksawen iwakken liman n yimekdiyen ad yers ɣef lsisan iǧehden deg wayen ienan Adasil neɣ aselmed, iwakken ad ttwaḥerzen mgal islemden n lekdeb d isekkuden-nsen ittɣurrun s tmusni iwatan n uselmed alsisan n Tira Iqedsen.
Arudman n Temsirt
Tamsirt-a tessenqad isekkuden n lsas i icerken akk Timezdayin tinǧiliyin yellan di ddunit. Di tikli n yimenzayen n uselmed n yinelmaden imezwura (azamul n Yimceggeen),
... 
r ad d-issken aselmed n Tira Iqedsen alsisan ɣef ṭṭbiea n Yillu, n Lmasiḥ d Rruḥ Iqedsen, ɣef umdan, ddnub, leslak, tudert tamasiḥit,Tamezdayt, tigawin tuɣrisin d tuɣalin n Lmasiḥ yerna ad izmir ad d-iwekked aya s tseddarin n Tira i wayen akk ienan tineqqiḍin-a.
- Ad ifhem assaɣen illan gar tneqqiḍin-a n uselmed iwakken ad t-yeg d yiwen imtatan.
- Ad izmir ad d-issken d akken liman di tneqqiḍin-a n uselmed, ma ttwafehment akken iwata, ad seunt later di tudert d tikli n lmumen.
Ṭṭbiea : Γer tagga
...
ala lqayen i ulmad n Tira d lebɣi ad iḥrez wiyaḍ seg uselmed n lekdeb.
Tiẓwarin: Γer taggara n temsirt, anelmad…
- Ad issiweḍ ad d-icfu i cchada n liman wad tt-id-yini seg uqerruy-is. Ad yili iwjed akken ad d-iwekked aya s tseddarin n Tira Iqedsen.
- Ad yizmir ad d-issers yiwen n uselmed ɣef tedyant n leslak i tegzi n wamek i d-ttwanan neɣ i immug uselmed.
- Ad issiweḍ ad yeeqel isekkuden (islemden) n lekdeb n kra n ṭṭayfat wad izmir ad d-issken isekkuden ifesden i yellan d lsas n uselmed-nsent.

Mass Djerad, s urafeq n uneɣlaf n Tiẓraf, Aymen Benabderrahmane caren s wudem unṣib imeẓla akked yifarisen n tiẓraf tislamant deg Tbanka taɣelnawt n Lezzayer (BNA) yesseddi-d dakken "alday n tmesgidiwin ur yelli ara d tatut n waṭan",yerna yenna-d dakken "yessefk ad tili tmesgida d amedya deg uqader n wakaten n uḥezzeb, rnu-d ula d aqader n usmecceq anmetti akked tmelsiwt n teḥlast".
"Ur yessefk ara ad ilint tmesgidiwin d ssebba n uzuzzer n waṭan. Yessefk ad allent i wakken ad yeḥbes waṭan, s uqader n wakaten n uḥezzeb", i d-yenna.

Tsunami n wawařen n Taɛrabt! Amec itwassen deg iyyar n tusna, xmi nessawař Tmaziɣt, nessawař itt s umawař n Tmaziɣt tayemmat, maca din mani i itemrusan wawařen n midden deg wemcan n wawařen n Tmaziɣt. Manaya war iǧi d amnus d ameqqran minzi marra tutlayin n midden daysent awařen i d-yudfen zi tmura nneɣni, s uɣiř niɣ s wuř; waxxa, s minzi i ɣa nessen awař n Umaziɣ zeg wawař n midden? S wawařen nneɣni (in other words) din iwdan xmi itesřan i ca n wawař n Tmaziɣt yudes, niɣ yarwes deg wawař n taɛrabt, qqaren aqa awař a ikke-d zi tutlayt taɛrabt. Maca ixes war ntettu ca aqa waxxa awařen arewsen deg wayawya, war yexs ca nican ad yini aqa war ǧin ca d Tmaziɣt. Ḥuma ad nessen amussen n min neqqar, ad neksi ijj n wawař zeg wawařen i icarcen aked wawařen n midden, amecnaw /qqḍ/ /řqeddid/ /iɣɣeḍ/ /tiɣarɣart/, /reɣ/ /reqq/, marra awařen a udsen i wawařen n taɛrabt d/niɣ tasirect (l’assyrien) amecnaw, /alwaqud/, /waqad/ , /tawaqqud/....

13.3.07
Agraw n yiṭij :
D iṭij, imtiwgen, ayyuren-nsen, itran, ismilen d tYawsiwin nniḍen. Iṭij yezga di tlemmast n wegraw n yiṭij-nneY; imtiwgen, ismilen, ugar 61 n wayyuren, ismilen d tYawsiwin nniḍen n iẓra neY gaz ttezzin-as i yiṭij .
Iṭij : d itri d yezgan di tlemmast n wegraw aniṭij,d takurt tameqrant n gaz izeYlen yettezzin. gravity-ines tameqrant tettaṭṭaf imtiwgen deg imeḍqan-nsen . Iṭij yettak-aY-d tafat d tezYel.
Iṭij d itri awraY yeggug 149 680 000 km f wakal.
Yal aseggas, deg 2 yennayer akkenni yettqerrib ar 147.1 imelyan n yikilumitren .
ma deg 2 n yulyu akkenni yal aseggas yettbaeid ar 152.6 imelyan n yikilumitren .
TezYel n yiṭij:
Ul n yiṭij yezmer ad isaweḍ si 10 ar 22.5 imelyan farenheit.TezYel sufella tmurt azal n 9900 farenheit.
G.T: Ur ilaq ara att-muqleḍ srid ar yiṭij s wallen, acku yezmer ak yesderYel .
Amezruy
Agraw n yiṭij-nneY yebda yettlall-ed azal n 4.6 imelyaren iseggasen aya seg tegnawt n gaz yettezzin, yesherwilen. Mi ieada wukud, gaz-nni ismiḍ yeckunṭeḍ deg yiman-is yewqem tifekkiwin timeqranin neqqar-asen, imtiwgen imezwura 'protoplanets'. Tisiggar-nni weqment ismilen, yettezzin s tsusmi i yiṭij .

Imaziɣen am wagduden izaykuten n dduniyt ttamnen s tillawt n ij n umaḍal innuffer wer t-nettwili tteddren deg-s imeɣnawen nnuffren, zedɣen deg iraqen imallasen, mkul twalat imeɣnawen-a ttadfen-dd tudert n wefgan teggen-as imxumbal, timukrisin d tɛenkrifin, ssadafen-t di tiggʷdi d weḥbaḍ.
Tawalit n Imaziɣen i imeɣnawen-a tbeddel aked wakud s iḍis n twalitin nneḍni (tiṛumanyin, tifiniqin, timselmin). Imeɣnawen-a deg-sen yenni wer zi tteggʷden midden am iɛessasen n yexxamen, deg-
... 
teslan, minzi twukt d ajḍiḍ d aberkan ntesla-yas s tmeddit.
Merɣriḍu
Di Arif din ijj n umiy itwassen s Meɣriḍu, netta d ij n wejḍiḍ wer ɣer-s bu tefras ula d udem, ittlaɣa-dd x yiwdan ixes, wenni i x dd-ɣa-ilaɣa ittemsar-as ca d aɛeffan. Ajḍiḍ-a ɣer-s tizemmar meɣrent, wer tzemmared ad tesned min ittegg d mamek ittegg ataf ad ineɣ yenni xef dd-ilaɣa.
Iqqar uduktur Mustapha El Ghadiri aqqa aẓur n Meɣriḍu netta d iman n iniɣi ittwaneɣ s umuttel iteffeɣ d itlaɣa d x twacunt n umenɣu.[10]

4 Djember/Dujember 2014, sɣur Mack Aït-Aoudia
Taqvaylit ihi sya d afella d tameslayt am netta-t am tiyiḍ. D tameslayt n tira. Ad iniY i imusnawen nneY taqvaylit “est langue écrite”. Désormais, akken qqaren Irumyen. D aya i Yef ilaq-aY ad nefk azal i tjerrumt-is akken i wulem. Akken as nefk azal d leqder tuklal.
Wa inna nettaru u nettaru akken d-nnan imusnawen nneY. Win seg-sen id-ittwadren aṭas d mas Cakir. Wiyaḍ, ini ggulen wa s Dda Lmu (wigi ahaqel cedhan-t kan!), wa s Kamal Uzerrad u kra diYe
... 
fella: e+a= wa, we. Kif kif diYen i “i” am di: i netta, i uqcic, ahat ma ila nura-t “ie” as nessikes daYen ilugan nniḍen ara irefden tigwnatin d-qqimen. Kif kif diYen i n am di anamek n wawal, nezmer ad t-naru ne u syin a nesseddu alug am ufella u ad yuYal: anamek ne awal.
Unti d usgwet daYen yiwen udem-is u ilugan ara d-ifYen seg sen ad ḍhun kif kif.
Ijariḍen
Ijariḍen diYen wwin-d iman nsen. Tettuseqqa tmeslayt nneY s yis-sen imi akken ad yili awal iman-is, nennan-d ilaq ad yili Yur-es unamek s
...
hu yifit.
Tura, xas akka kkateY deg wid irran avrid-a neY avrid nniḍen, maca ula d nek aql-i am nutni. Tikwal ṭṭfeY avrid ayeffus, tikwal d win uzelmaḍ. akken neqqar, myal yiwen taqvaylit-is, myal yiwen akken is-ihwa.
D tismin di tmeslayin n mmeden izgan ttnarnint, izgan teddunt ar zdat, izgan ttveddilent udem d ilugan, iyi jjan cadaY. TtmenniY ad tuYal teqvaylit d tameslayt tameqwrant ara isseddun timsal timeqwranin. D aya kan. Wanag ddaw uvrid nnig uvrid leqrar-is d avrid.
Sɣur Mack Aït-Aoudia

Asarag-a d win aydeg ara ttekkin yimazanen n snat n texxamin n umni, igensasen n tedbelt d tsuda n uwanak, iselmaden isdawanen d yimnadiyen, am wakken ara ḥedṛen daɣ yigensasen n tɣemsa d tmetti taɣarimt.
Ahil n usarag-a d win aydeg ara d-yili uneskin n umaru amatu n Useqqamu Unnig i Timmuzɣa, Si El Hachemi Assad ɣef yiksaben ay d-yellan deg unrar n timmuzɣa deg Lezzayer, asarag ara yeg uselmad n umezruy Mohamed El Hadi Harrech ɣef telqey tamezruyant n tutlayt d tirawt n tmaziɣt, d usarag ɣef « Timmuzɣa seg yidis n tesnilest d tsekla » n uselmad asdawan Mohamed Djellaoui.

Deg yiwet n tseɣrut i tɣamsa, deg taggara n temlilit i tga akked uneɣlaf n Teɣdemt, Belkacem Zeghmati, Massa Keller-Sutter tzul deg tazwara « assaɣen igerzen » yellan gar Lezzayer akked Swis.
« Yella-d umeslay abaɣur gar-aneɣ. Nemsegzi dakken assaɣen yellan gar Swis akked Lezzayer ha-ten-in deg yiwet n liḥala igerrzen », i d-tenna.
Deg wayen yerzan anmireg deg taɣult n teɣdemt, tenna-d dakken tesnebgi-d yiwet n tmagla n yiwkilen n Tegduda izzayriyen akken ad gen yiwen n yimalas n usileɣ deg Swis ɣef umennuɣ mgal n tinnɣi akked tsekkiwin-is yemgarden.

Ma nessaked mliḥ ɣer wazal umidag di leqraya-nneɣ di Tira Iqedsen, a naf deg-s ayen iɛeddan akkin i wudem-nni n leslak yakan.
Imi ɣer umidag iban-d deg umezruy n yemdanen wayen akken i d-iweḥḥa Yillu s timmad-is. Tadyant n umidag deg-s leslak n yemdanen si tama, aked uweḥhi n Yillu s timmad-is, si tama nniḍen. Ccɣel n umidag daɣen d “Awal”, d tabṛatt i talsa. Deg-s azamul d unamek i ddunit meṛṛa. Akken i d-ssebganen yemdanen azal-nsen d tmusni-nnsen s lecɣal i xeddmen, akken daɣen i yella umidag
... 
i d ẓẓeṭṭa i s ara nefhem meṛṛa iswi d unamek ɣef yura wadlis n Yuḥenna.
Lmasiḥ yellan d “Awal” n Yillu, ibeggen-d i yemdanen lebɣi-ines i leslak. S wazal-agi n leslak ara nefhem tama meqqren n tmanegt n Yillu. Tettbin-d tmanegt n Yillu deg wayen akk i d-yexleq d leɛǧayeb meqqren d tedyanin akk ara nɣer deg mezruy n talsa. Tettbin-d daɣen deg usfel n Mmi-s ɣef umidag. Lberhanat-is d tezmert-is ur xulfen ara lekyasa-ines lqeyan. Imi asfel n Mmi-s d abeggen n lekyasa-agi aked teɣdemt. Atah wamek i
...
tayri ɣer lsas-is. D tayri ur nesɛa ara leḥsab, teṣfa tbedd ɣef tidett. Deg umezruy n ddunit meṛṛa, azal n tidett yeɛnan tayri a t-nemlil ɣer umidag.
S wudem nniḍen, d tayri d yekkan sɣur Yillu. Ur d-tella ara seg umdan. D Illu i yḥemmlen imdanen, yefka-yasen-d leslak ɣer umidag. D leqsed n Yillu mačči d win n yemdanen. Yeqsed ad iceggeɛ Mmi-s ɣer ddunit, ad yili d asfel i wsuref d ssmaḥ. Ad yesbedd talwit d lehna ger yemdanen d Ṛebbi. S leḥmala i yeqsed ad isellek imdanen. Akka i d ban leḥmala.

Massa Amroun Faḍma tameṭṭut n Gaoui, i yettwasnen s yisem «Faḍma Ewica », n taddart n Wizgan, tewweḍ leefu n Rebbi iḍ n lexmis Yer lǧemea n ddurt-agi yezrin, di leemr-is 108 n yiseggasen. Nna Faḍma Ewica tefka-d acḥal d axalaf i 3 n tsutiwin, gar warraw-is, yessi-s, arraw n warraw-is d yessi-s d wiyaḍ, tessefrurex ayen yugaren 60 n yimdanen, tedder yiwet n tudert yelhan aṭas gar twacult-is.
Tlul deg useggas n 1903 i taddart n Wizgan, tedder snat n tegrawliwin n umaḍal (1914-1918) d (1939-1945) akked tegrawla Tazzayrit (1954-1962) anda i d-tefka ayen yellan deg-s, ama s tezmert-is neɣ s cci-s. Nna Faḍma Ewica tettwamḍel ass n lǧemea yezrin, 22 yulyu, di tmeqbert n taddart n Wizgan anda I ḥeḍren acḥal n yimdanen.
Nna Faḍma d tamYart wassaren di temnaḍt n Wizgan, Yas temmut yella wayen i d-teğğa s deffir-s, acku llan wid i yeskelsen isura fell-as, teḥka-d tudert-is merra, llan daYen wid i d-icerwen aṭas n yisefra-ines, sdukklen-ten, rran-ten d adlis ara d-yefYen deg useggas i d-iteddun.
Nna Faḍma Ewica d taewint anda I d-ugmen waṭas n yimdanen d tsutiwin ifuden idles d tmusni.
Islam Bessaci

Inni i yessnen Najim Masyur, mmis n Qasita. Tuɣa ttrajan lebda ɣer-s ad dd-yessufeɣ ijjen wass ca n album n uɣennij. Najim, i yelmden tmusikt s tzemmar-nnes, ass-a iwweḍ ad yegg amcan-nnes deg yiyyar n tẓuri di Arrif. Najim urid aqet weḥḥd-s, maca akid-s ijjen tseḍma n iḥudriyen i dd-yeyman deg ijjen wemkan wer dag-s la timzyidawin n musika la walu.
Album n « Tiɣarruba » i dd-yeffɣen deg wussan-a, d ijjen lxedmet n twiza d tameqqrant tettwagg di tseḍma n « Masyur ». D twiza eawed aked waṭṭas n I
... 
dayni ig ittiraren adjun. Masin netta yettwassen d agitarist. Asiwan Ebessalm netta ɣer-s pyanu d tgiṭart. Iwa Najim Lmercuḥi ittegg cwayt n temja (flawta) d Tgiṭart. Qa nettegg tizemmar maḥend ad dd-nexleq ijjen ljeww n tussna di jjihet n ayt Tuzin. Axarres n grup, wadji yus-d amenni waha, maca tuɣa-t zeg umezwaru.

Taɣdemt n tmurt n Lezzayer, ma nezmer ad as-nsemmi ‘’la justice’’, am akken tella di tmura nniḍen i yebnan ɣef uzref/droit d lqanun, terra aqelmun ɣer iḍarren, acku si tazwara-s tbedd zun d azduz deg ufus n udabu ; akka si 1962.
Ar ass-a ur telli teɣdemt igan ccan i wezref akken ad tbedd d talast, d afrag zdat lbaṭel ɣef yal Azzayri.
Timura timezwura deg umaḍal di temsizzelt n « liser n imezdaɣ-is », d tid yesbedden azref afella, mačči d tid ikesben tadrimt, iberwiḍen akked lebyur/inan n lgaz d 
... 
kken ur ireggel i ufus n teɣdemt, akken ur irennu tawaɣit nniḍen.
Di temsalt n imeḥbas n tikta/détenus d’opinion, tirza (2) ur tezmir ad tili d abrid amezwaru, acku win d-ikkren i lfayda n tmurt-is deg ubrid n talwit d tugdut, ur illi d win/tin ara yewwten ad yerwel akkin.
Ameḥbus/anekraf n tikta ad iwwet akken ad ifares zdat teɣdemt ad iseddu tikta n usalu deg yella, ad iwwet ad d-ibeggen anda yecceḍ udabu mi yeffeɣ seg ubrid n izerfan.
D abrid-nni i yessaram yal anekraf n tikta, ad yeg zdat me
...
 yellan ass-a ttwarzen, am wid d-iffɣen s yiseɣ ass-a d yiḍelli, d nutni ara yesbedden azekka izerfan, ara yekksen anzel n teɣdemt akken ad teqqim kan di talast-is, am akken teteddu di tmura irebḥen… am tmurt n la Suisse i yecna umedyaz.

Nna Newra, tamɣart n 73 isegwassen, temmeslay-d ɣef teswiɛt tettidir tmurt. Tedder di tallit n tegrawla, tedder tallit-agi n mbeɛd tagrawla.
Dagi tgelm-d (décrire) taswiɛt yettidir weqbayli yal ass. Tiɣri-s d tiɣri n wegdud s lekmal-is, tenna-d ayen akken ɣef susmen waṭas n yemdanen, Nna Newara tefka-d dagi yiwet n tesleṭ/(analyse) ɣef tmurt, warǧin itt-id-yefka ula d yiwen n ukabar asartan. Ayen id-tenna Nna Newara dagi yugar merra ayen nezmer ad t-id-naru. Ihi sendi-t tameẓuɣt u xemmem-t…! "

Aselkin i uheggi ɣer leqdic amasiḥi
Ahil n uswir wis 2, i yettawin ɣer uselkin n uheggi n leqdic amasiḥi, ittak yiwen n usileɣ isɛan lsas di Tira i yinelmaden d iqeddacen di tmezdayt. Imugg:
1) I wid ikfan asileɣ n lsas (aswir amezwaru neɣ ayen nniḍen) d wid ibɣan ad gmun di tmussni n Yillu d Wawal-is.
2) I wid ibɣan ad kemmlen di leqdic di tmezdayt neɣ ad uqlen d iselmaden, d imekyuḍa n trebbuyaɛ timecṭaḥ neɣ d iqdimen.
Ahil-a isea aseggas n ulmad deg uɣerbaz amasiḥi. Ibḍa ɣef 11 iḥricen: lsas 
... 
en Aswir 2 isea 11 n temsirin anida tella tidelli n 10 n temsirin d yiwet nniḍen n uheggi i leqdic uslig. Yal tamsirt tettawi azal n 60 ar 90 n swayae n leqraya, n lweqt di tmeɣriyin d warmuden imiren ad fakken s ukayad. Inelmaden zemren ad kemmlen ahil-a ɣef 3 neɣ 4 iseggasen skud lehhun-d d lxedma-nsen neɣ leqdic-nsen, akken i zemren ad t-fakken deg useggas ma qqaren yal ass. Yiwen ugerdis ad yettunefk i wid ara yessiwḍen ɣer taggara n ulmad s trennawt.

LEZZAYER – H ad ittekki uneɣlef n ṣṣhiḍ, Mass Mustapha Guiṭouni, deg wussan, n wegraw n tefsert ameḍlan n l’pitrul, (ADIPEC). Way, di tamaneɣt n timiratit, Abu Ḍabi, seg i, 13 ɣer 16 umber yettazzalen, ɣef leḥsab n ulɣut n, wass-a lḥedd, sɣer uɣlif.
Mani h ad yerfed ulmus n, Abu Dhabi, n yefsaren, ussan, n ugraw-aya, u netta yettwaḥsab seg i timlilin timḍlanin yessenɛat azal n temsalin-aya deg wammas n ssuq apitruli. Aren i h ad mlillen deg-s ineɣlafen n ṣṣhiḍ d tkebbaneyin n ṣṣhiḍ timeqqṛanin deg i umaḍal d yimaẓẓayen di lextiṣaṣ n ṣṣhiḍ.
Tamawt belli timlilit-a terfed azamul n “taseɣnut n wassaɣen i uluzzi n twatirt n tseɣmit”.
Ad nesmekti belli carken di tizriget n yennaṭi ugar n 1000 n imerzaf usin- d seg wazal n 125 n tmura n ddunit.

Wehṛan: assedrem n uẓeḍḍa n yemsettiyen n lkif ay yettmahalen deg temnaḍin yemgerraden n tmurt
WEHṚAN – 3 n yemsettiyen ay ubẓen, ass n laṛebɛa deg Wehṛan, yimeẓla n temsetla taɣelnawt s ussemyuddes d yiwet n tsensirt n Tredsa Taɣelnawt Taɣerfant n Temnaḍt Taserdasant Tis 2, yernu ḍḍfen ɣer-sen azal n 8 n yikiluten n lkif, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna temsetla.
Tamhelt-a gan-tt yiferdisen n tgezmi n unadi n temsetla n Wehṛan mi d-uwḍent telɣa ɣef yiwen n uẓeḍḍa ay la yettmahalen deg temnaḍin yemgerraden n tmurt maca yessemyuddus tigawin-nnes deg Wehṛan, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna weɣbalu-a.
S waya, ubẓen yimeẓla n temsetla, s ussemyuddes d tredsa, 3 n yemsettiyen n tehyufin, ḍḍfen tihyufin yettwasekkren yernu ḍḍfen daɣ sin n yemseddayen, ugar n sin n yimelyunen n yidinaṛen d 2.500 n wuṛuten.
Tettwarẓem tsestant i uferru n temsalt-a, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna teɣbalut-a.

Mansa Kanku Musa neɣ Musa amezwaru n Mali, yemut deg 1332 (neɣ 1337), d amenkad n Tamnekda n Mali seg 1307 (neɣ 1312)[1], yeḥkem tajumma teččur s ureɣ ed yiɣir, yeḥkem tnezzut gar arḍaxel ed ugafa n Tafrikt, Mansa Musa yella umenkad ineslem, mi d-yuɣal ɣer Mekka (lḥeǧǧ-is deg 1324) akked yimesgaden ed yimusnawen, yebna leǧwamee ed tesdawiyin, ad d-yerren tamdint am Tin Buktu mecḥuṛet deg umaḍal[2].

Yella-d, ussan-agi iɛeddan, uɣlaq n tesnawit Sliman Emirat n taddart Taqerbust sɣur kra n yimawlan n yinelmaden i d-staxren seg uɣerbaz-agi. Yettwaɣleq ubrid n unekcum ɣer din s ttjur akked yiblaḍen, ayen i d-ixelqen aneḥbus ɣef tiddin n waṭas n tkeryas. Zyada ɣef wanect-a, rnan yimdanen-agi ɣelqen tawwurt n tesnawit s sin lemfateḥ ayen yeǧǧan ad qqimen yinelmaden, iselmaden akked yixeddamen n tesnawit-agi deg berra. Ma ɣef tigawt-agi, yenna-d yiwen ubabat : «Ssebba n uɣlaq d astixer n 53 n yinelmaden, yerna ula d aseqqamu i yettwasbedden i lmend n waya, ur d-yerri ula d yiwen unelmad ɣer uɣerbaz, ayen yesserfan aṭas imawlan-nsen imi ɣur-sen, llan yinelmaden yuklalen ad uɣalen». Seld aɣlaq-agi s sin wussan, letnayen d ttlata, tella-d temlilit gar tnemhalt n tesnawit akked kra n yimawlan n warrac-nni, anda wwḍen ɣer rray n ueiwed n useqqamu ara iwalin i tikkelt-nniḑen deg tuttriwin n yinelmaden-agi yettraǧun acu ara d-yeffɣen deg unejmue-agi. Ass n ttlata yezrin, usan-d iğadermiyen ɣer tesnawit, qqimen mebeid, ugaden ad tili lexsara.
Nisma Tigrine

« Asnegmu adigan ur yerzi ara kan timnaḍin yettwassnen, maca iḥuza-d akk timnaḍin aydeg llan yiɣermanen s uḍfar n temyadast d tamiɣist ay yebdan tettakf-d abaɣur-nnes (…) deg wakud d awezzlan », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Merad i tɣemsa deg wass-nnes wis sin d uneggaru n terzi-nnes n umahil ɣef twilayt n Tinduf.
« Iseḍra-a qqnen srid ɣer ukatar n tmeddurt n uɣerman, gar-asen aman n tissit, asedwes, aẓeḍwu n wurrig, tatrist d usfaw anagdud, am wakken ay ttwabnant daɣ tsersiyin taddalanin d tsersiyin niḍen i yilemẓiyen », ɣef wakken ay d-yerna.
Yerna-d daɣ dakken « isenfaren ay d-yettwasseḍran deg ukatar n ubdad i temnaḍin tiwmazirin d wasunen uɣḍisen d wid ara d-yesɣenwen timras s urẓam n waṭas n yicanṭiyen, am wakken ara yedrew waya deg tdinamit n usnegmu i ubaɣur n temnaḍin-a d yimezdaɣen-nsent ».
Brahim Merad yellan, azal n 30 n yiseggasen aya, d awali n twilayt n Tinduf, yenna-d dakken « tawilayt-a talasant d tin aydeg d-yella unegmu d agermaw seg yimir-nni ɣer wass-a », am wakken ay d-yerna dakken mazal yella waṭas n lexṣaṣ d yikmaren deg useḍru n usnegmu deg twilayt-a, yernu ɣef waya ay yessefk ad ttwakksen akk wunjugen yerzan aya.

Amǧahed Aknouche Messaoud, i wumi ttinin « Mohamed Bouachrine », d yiwen seg gar wid imenɛen seg unṭad n tdusiwin tihersanin, yenna-d dakken yecfa i « yikkeḍ » n temzelt-a i « d iḥettmen ɣef yimenzaḍen n Tredsa n uslelli akken ad fernen yiwen n usuddes asetratijan n yidurran-is akken ad zemren ad menɛen seg « wahes ».
Ɣas akken temɣer-is akked wayen i yis-s i d-tegla n lexṣara, tamzelt « Jumelles » i icar, 63 n yiseggasen aya, ujiniral Challe, ladɣa deg ugezdu wis III amazray, « imnaɣen n Tredsa
... 
an d ul n Tredsa n uslelli aɣelnaw n usun-a. « Mennaw n tikkal i menɛeɣ i temzal n ucengu, d kra n teswiɛin n wahes ladɣa mi ara d-serḥen i yisafagen i la d-yeṭṭeggiren fell-aɣ lbumbat », i d-yettmekti.
Yerna yenna-d : « Tamzel Jumelles ur teqbir ara Taredsa n uslelli, maca tefka-yas yiwen n nnefs amaynu akked yiwen n uguccel amaynu. Nella neẓra dakken qrib ad nawi azarug, s ucqirrew n temzelt taredsant n ujiniral Challe, nella numen s trennawt taggarant ».
Ilul ass n 14 furar 1936, yekcem Bouac
...
mejṭaḥ n 12 n yimǧuhad akken ad zemren ad qablen tamzelt-a ideg d-bran i wugar n 500.000 n yiserdasen ifransiyen i la d-ttallalen wallalen n yisgalfen imeqqranen », i d-yessegzi ufesyan-a aqbur n Tredsa n uslelli aɣelnaw.
Yesseddi-d Si Salah Ouzrourou dakken tasetratijit tamaynut n tegrawin timejṭaḥ ɣɣaren-as daɣen « Azlu » lan iswi n usishel n tikli n yimnaɣen n Tredsa n uslelli aɣelnaw akked mi ara ruḥen ad qḍun tagella akked yiselsa i teyunin yemgarden, akked mi ara gen inṭagen mgal n ucengu.

aḍen n tnarit taslekmant n Tfidiṛalit Tazzayrit n Urdab ad faken tasemhuyt taddalant n waddal-nsen i useggas n 2019-2020 ɣef lǧal n useɣzef n usekmen adawsan arma d 29 Mayu ɣef lǧal n tkaɣreft n unfafad bu uqacuc.

...
019-2020 ad ikemmel s umasal umḍin deg tɣerɣar tisensegmanin, ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked, ass n uynas, yiwen n umasay n uɣlif n ulmud imineg d unadi ussnan.
LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Lezzayer tebda-d, ass n uynas, afares n tegrummiwin n ukcaf n unfafad bu uqacuc yernu ad yeqqel ad d-tettfaras 200.000 n tyunin i yimalas. Tagrumma-a n ukcaf tezmer ad d-tekcef aḍḍan deg 15 n tmikin yernu d ta ay d tikkelt tamezwarut aydeg ara d-tettwafarsent tegrummiwin-a deg Lmeɣreb, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna tliẓri tanagdudt.

Am yal aseggas, sfuggulen Yimaziɣen amenzu n Yennayer, neɣ tiwwura n useggas akken i as-qqaren, deg yal tamnaḍt n Tmazɣa, ladɣa deg tmurt n Lezzayer imi yuɣal d ass aɣelnaw n usgunfu yettwaxellasen. Ayen yeṭṭfen lwelha n useggas-a 2971/2021, d asebdad n Cacnaq deg tlemmast n temdint n Tizi Uzzu ara yalin azekka n umenzu n Yennayer. I usmekti, asenfar-a, ihegga-t-id Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu s lmendad n uselway n tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu akked kra n yimḍebbren n lwilaya-agi. Deg wahil n uzekka i d-ihegga Useqqamu Aɣerfan-a, ad yili usarag deg Uxxam n APW, afraq n warrazen i wid i d-yufraren deg Temsizzelt n usmuzzeɣ n twennaḍt i yexdem, diɣ, Useqqamu-agi, syin, ad yili imensi n yennayer. Seg tama-s, ihegga-d Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa yiwen wahil i lmend n usfuggel n umenzu n yennayer netta akked Tneɣaft n tmerrit i yebdan s wudem unṣib deg lwilaya n Tbatent ddurt-agi. Deg usiher-a, llan yisaragen, timsekniyin, asenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen, rnu ɣer waya, ssinima, tamezgunt, taklut, aẓawan…atg. Ula seg tama n yicennayen, aṭas i yessarmen ‘’Aseggaz ameggaz’’ s tezlit-nsen i d-suzren deg yiẓeḍwa inmettiyen, yecban Zedek Mouloud, Akli.D. d wiyaḍ. Ula d Ali Belhot, yessekles yiwen uklip anda i iɣenna ɣef ‘’useggas ameggaz’’ netta akked wiyaḍ s tutlayin n tmaziɣt yemgaraden, am teqbaylit, tacawit, tamẓabit, tacenwit…atg. D aklip ara d-yessuzer bab-is ass n yimensi n yennayer, ɣef wakken i t-id-iwekked deg tdiwennit i as-xedmeɣ ara tafem deg usebtar 12.
H.M.

Deg tmuɣli n Montesqiueu, isaḍufen neɣ leqwanen d nutni i yesselḥawen tilufa gar yemdanen, zgan-d sufella n kra yellan. I wakken ad nefhem isaḍufen i d-sersen yemdanen, ilaq ad nerzu ɣer teɣdemt axaṭer dinna i yettbedday lḥedd.
Isaḍufen n yemdanen mgaraden ɣef wid n ugama, ur d-ttnulfan kan akka. Leqwanen i d-sbedden yemdanen, ɣas ur ttemcabin, resen ɣef yiwen n llsas. Wa icudd ɣer gma-s. Asaḍuf yettḍebbir, d netta i d assaɣ gar wid yesmendiwen (wid d-yesnulfayen lqanun) d yineḥkamen. Asaḍuf d a
... 
bbi fell-asen.
Dɣa seddaw n Udabu Aqdim, igelliden ttaɛraḍen ad d-sersen leqwanen wer ma fkan azal i tseddarin n yemdanen (tisegluyin), aya i wakken ad sefḍen icelqem yellan gar medden, ɣilen d ayen fessusen. Montesqiueu iwala-d aseɛdel-a ger medden yettawi ɣer leḥkem udebbuz.
Tifrat ɣer-s d aleggen n lǧehd i yesɛan yemdanen: yessefk lmizan ara yesserkden timetti d wefraq n tzemmar n ddula.
Afraq n tzemmar
Ɣer Montesqiueu, tilelli mačči d timunnent, iswi mačči d tazmert ad yexdem yiwen akken i s
...
adaren medden isaḍufen ibedden. Ɣer Montesqiueu, ur nkennu ara i lqanun, meɛna nxeddem ayen yessuruf lqanun. Afraq ger tzemmar yezmer ad d-yawi tadukli, i waken wa ur yettali ɣef wa. Deg taggara, lqanun yella-d i waken ad yesḥirbeb amdan, ad t-yesserked.
Ma ɣef yedrimen, Montesquieu yettwali belli d ttawil yelhan i userked d useggem n lemxalṭat ger yemdanen, yettarra-ten wa yettnadi ɣef wayeḍ. S tmuɣli-a, Montesqiueu yesnulfa-d ajdid deg tussna tasertit, imi yessuẓa ar sdat “lmeɛna”.

Ass n larbea tameddit iwwed’-aY-d lexbar iqerreh’ : iYli usalas n tmuzYa.
Ifka tudert-is i tmaziYt, yura, yurar amezgun, irna-d ar tirect n yidles nneY kra yufa igerrez deg tutlayin n ayed’. Brecht, Prévert,H’ikmet, isenteq-iten-id akk s taYect imesdurar.
Yumen s tegmatt d tdukli ger wid inh’afen, iqbel knant tuyat-is ddaw teekemt zz’ayen, Yas ma drus i t-ifehmen. Seg wasmi tluY tegwnitt, yal wa ijebbed ar tama-s, yuYal Muh’ya ar rrif : myif ad isel i tsusmi wala i useglef n imencaf...
At’an i t-iwwin, ur illi degs ccek, ikka-d seg iYeblan i d-slul deg walaY-is yir tagmatt. Melmi ara nefk azal i imawlan n tmusni, melmi ara sen-neg ccan deg tudert nsen ? Muh’ya iruh’, iğğa-d agerruj ur nettfaka, irz’a asalu akken i terz’an wiyad’, am Dda Lmulud.
Wissen, nekwni s wid iddren, ma nessiwed’ ayen i Y-d-iğğa i tsutwin i d-iteddun , wissen ma nkemmel deg ubrid i inğer, neY deg-neY ala awal ?
SsarameY talwit i Muh’ya, am akken ssarameY ad tettwarfed tira-s, ad yidir yisem-is.
Boualem Aourane
Montréal, ass n lexmis 9 dujendir 2004

Ass-a n 18 yebrir 2022, d asmekti n tmettant n Massinissa, asnawan n 19 n iseggasen sɣur ijadeṛmiyen izayriyen deg At Dwala; 21 n iseggasen-aya, wid i tyenɣan ur cuṛɛen xas ulamma nezṛa belli d ajedaermi Merebet Mestari i yḥuccen iḍarren-is.
Acu yeḍran ass n 18 yebrir 2001 ?
– Ass n Tlata 18 Yebrir 2001, ɣef 18h30, Sdat wexxam n massinissa win ibeɛden azal n 200 n lmitrat ɣef tesnawit anda yeqqar, tlata n ijadeṛmiyen izayriyen deg tkaṛṛust “LAGUNA”, ẓedmen ɣef yiwet n terbaɛt n yelmeẓyen akken a
... 
ḥedṛen ” Ad teqqimeḍ deg wemkan-ik neɣ ad k-ḥucceɣ iḍarren”, d ayen i yexdem kra kan n dqayeq, imi massinissa ur yugad ara, ma d Merabet Mestan ur ikukra ara ad yenɣ ilemẓi n 19 n iseggasen.
– Massinissa wwin-t ar la clinique d-iqeṛben send imi ssawlen i bab-as, imi yewweḍ ar “la Clinique” walan mači d ayen umi zemren, massinissa yeqqar kan ” UGADEƔ AD MMTEƔ“, ijadeṛmiyen sutren deg imejjayen ad ǧǧen massinissa ad d-lhun deg wemdakel-nsen yettwaḥuzen ar temceṭ n uḍaṛ. 21 n iseggasen i yezrin ɣef 18 Yebrir 2001, Masinisa yemmut, ajadeṛmi i t-yenɣan Merabet Mestari d ilelli yessuli itri ɣef tayett-is. 21 n iseggasen ɣef lbaṭel, ɣef tmettant, ɣef temharsa, ɣef tsusmi. Masinisa yemmut, tɛawded talalit tmurt taqbaylit s usenfaṛ-ines asertan, i yettwarefden deg wulawen n imelyan n yeqbayliyen, asenfaṛ n uslali n uwanek aqbayli, win ara yerren tajmilt i masinisa, win ara yesseḥbibren, akken weǧin ad yuɣal ad yemmet yiwen deg warraw-is.

... 
t tasḍma talimant nna ittnzaɣn f ukrwas lli tiwi 2014, ɣ tsga yaḍn llant tsḍmiwin nna yamun ɣ tgariwin n umundyyal tikklt tamzwarut ɣ umzruy nnsnt, zund tasḍma tanamurt tabanamit d tsḍma tislandit. Ttuskarn 64 n imnalatt ɣ 12 n usuras ɣ 11 n tmdint, amnala amggaru ittyurar ɣ usurar Lujniki ɣ tmaẓunt Musku ass n 15 yulyuz 2018. menṭag anammas (milieu offensif), Ibrahim Afellay, amirar Amaziɣ amezwaru ɣ umezruy n FC Barcelona zɣ telalit nns ɣ 29 Yimrayur (novembre) 1899.
Ar nsitim i y Afellay tudert tunnunant taɣezzaft d tabrida tamaɣudt g tarmit nns takaṭalant.
Awsat ɣ tirra n imgradn n Wikipidya s tutlayt Taclḥit afad ad timɣur uggar, Ɣid a ɣ tẓḍarm ad trnum kra n umgrad amaynu, arayat aynna mi tẓḍarm bac ad igutn imgradn s tutlayt Taclḥit.
Iɣ tesɣawsat s tiwisi ɣ tirra n imgradn, tẓḍaṛt ad nn-taggʷt ɣ Tasna n Tiwisi.

Tamkerḍit n ubrid
Sdat n umyezwar ɣer wumḍiq amzwaru deg temsizzelt n taddart tazeddgant deg ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu, i d-yessuddes Useqqamu aɣerfan n ugerzu, yal taddart, tettnadi ad d-tufrar ɣef tayeḍ s tigawin d leqdicat yemgaraden. S leqdicat ara yefken udem igerrzen i taddart u ara wa iweneen tudert n yimezdaɣ n yal ass akked wayen ara yezdin tagmat gar yimezdaɣ n tudrin. Dɣa akka i d-tufrar tɣiwant n M
...
zdaɣ. Tikti-agi, tella-d s ɣur n tddukkla tadelsant n Tiɣilt n Teqḍibin, yettabaeen ɣer taddart n Ibarquqen. Teldi temkarḍit-agi deg tlemmast n taddart ɣer rrif n ubrid, s ddaw n usentel “ Ddem adlis, teǧǧeḍ-d adlis”. Leqdic yecban wa, dayen ara d-ixelqen tayri n tɣuri gar leǧiran d yimezdaɣ n taddart. Rnu ɣef waya, ad yili lḥir meqqren ɣer yilmeẓyen deg unadi ɣef tumussniwin yemgaraden. Am waken neẓra, tussna ad d-teglu s yidles n taẓunt, s wacu ara bnun yimdanen tawejiḍt ireẓnen iman-is.
A. Z.

Wuhan
Wuhan (s Tcinwiyt tuffirt: 武汉, s Tcinwiyt tanasayt: 武漢) d tamenrut n iɣir n Hubei deg tlemmast n tmurt n Ccinwa, Wuhan d tamdint ilan (yesɛan) akk aṭas n imezdaɣ deg Hubei. Akken i tga d tamdint tameqrant tis 7 di Ccinwa, Yezga-d deg usamer n Ccinwa akken i tga d ammas amugran d udamsan ilan (yesɛan) azal meqqren deg tlemmast n Ccinwa
Deg ussan ineggura n yennayer 2020 tamdint n Wuhan tettwamdel yerna tettusinef s usrag (s sebba) n usefruret d unfufed n waṭṭan n Covid-19 id yekkan seg ulzuz n Wuhan i yimeččiyen iwlalen seg imaren medlen ula d alzuz-nni
Amezruy[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Tarakalt[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Yettwasnirem-d waṭṭan n Covid-19 i tikkelt tamezwarut deg temdint n Wuhan id yezgan di tlemmast n Ccinwa deg wayyur n dujamber 2019. Imusnawen ttɣilen d akken aṭṭan-a yekka-d seg iɣersiwen sin akin ineṭṭ-d ar yimdanen s iɣersiwen-nni ig yuɣ waṭṭan-a deg ulzuz n tnezzut n iɣersiwen, sin akin yerna Yenfufed ar igezda n iden n Ccinwa deg wussan imezwura d ilemmasen n wayyur n yennayer s usrag n tfaskiwin n yixef useggas n Ccinwa

Seg yidis-nnes, Tagelda Tasaɛudit d nettat ara yessuddsen talɣuɣa taɛṛabt n ddaw 19 n yiseggasen, deg wakud aydeg Lekwit ad tessuddes tilɣuɣiwin n ddaw 13, ddaw 15 d ddaw 17 n yiseggasen.
Deg wayen yerzan Talɣuɣa Taɛṛabt n Ubadminṭun n Yimeɛdaṛ, ad d-tili ya deg Beḥṛin, ya deg Limaṛat Taɛṛabin Yeddukklen, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna Tdukli Taɛṛabt n Ubadminṭun.
Mraw kuẓ n tmura ay yettekkan deg ugraw-a amatu ay d-yellan, i tikkelt tamezwarut, s usarag n teẓrit, yernu ti d Lezzayer, Tagelda Tasaɛudit, Beḥṛin, Lekwit, Taselṭna n Ɛuman, Lubnan, Tunes, Maṣer, Ɛiraq, Luṛdun, Falesṭin, Sudan, Libya d Surya, deg wakud aydeg ɣabent 3 n tmura niḍen, nitenti d Meṛṛuk, Ǧibuti d Muriṭanya.

Di 8 Tuber 1988 krent tmesbaniyin di lezzayer tamanaɣt, adabu n Cadli yesmar lbarud ɣef wegdud melba ceḥḥa, di tmurt n iqbayliyen urɛad slin lɣaci s wayen iḍran di lezzayer, d ibzizen n isallen kan iten-id-yettawḍen sya ɣer da. Ɣef aya inelmaden n tseddawit Lmulud At Mɛemar, nejmaɛen ass n Lḥed 8 tuber 1988 tameddit, akken ad tili tamurt n iqbayliyen deg umussu i d-yekren di lezzayer, acku aṭas n inelmaden iqbayliyen yekkin di tmesbaniyin-agi i yellan di tmanaɣt, sawḍen-d isallen n tmettant n wa
... 
ddam-d yidi d imsebriden! »
Am akken is-icar Mass Maɛtub i teḍra yid-sen deg webrid. Ferqen ulɣu-nni di L.N.Y, imiren ṭfen abrid-nsen ɣer Micli, dɣa walan iǧadarmiyen ɣer sdat ad d-leḥḥun s Land Rover-nsen, seg waken tella yiwet n R4 zdat n tkarrust n Maɛtub, iǧadarmiyen ur zmiren ara ad asen-gezmen abrid, ǧan-ten ɛeddan maɛna din din dewren-d, ḍefren-ten-id s deffir, dɣa di lawan-nni Mass Maɛtub yettɣawal akken ad yaweḍ ɣer Micli uqbel ad ten-ṭfen. Seg wakken id d-heggan iman-nsen ad ten-id-wte
...
 uǧadermi-nni “{{ Rfed rebb-u, xellih imut, lkelb!”}}.
Maɛtub yeqqim di sbitar n Micli, Masin akwed Mehdi bwin-ten iǧadermiyen-nni ɣer lkazirna-nsen, imiren ɣer tin n lezzayer tamanaɣt. Aǧadermi-nni i t-yewten ur iɛedda di creɛ ar ass-a n wussan, d abeddel kan id as-bedlen amḍiq n uxeddim!
Akka i d Lezzayer n Cadli, n Nezzar, n Bumedyen d Buteflika…! D wigi akwed waṭas nniḍen is-yefkan i tmurt tiyita swayes ur tettnejbar ! D acu kan amezruy yezga-d d anagi, d netta ara ten-iḥasben…
Sɣur: Muccen.

Tizizwit
Tizizwit (Asget: Tizizwa), (assaɣ usnan: Anthophila) d aburɣas yeṭṭafaren tafesna n tedlafriwin, Tawuri-ynes d afares n tamment d uɣrum n tzizwa d ufarer, Ar tura ttwasnen-t wazal n 20.000 n telmas ttidiren-t deg yakk imenẓawen n tegnit anagar Antraktika, Ɣas akken azgen ameqran n telmas d timettyin maca llan-t waṭas n telmas n iden d timsufin (ttidiren-t iman-nsent). Tizizwa n tamment yakk i d tawsit yettwassenen acku d talmest id yettaken tamment i wefgan

Iggaĝ yan itri AmaziY Y initid nna issen umaḍal s ufrurt n ujeYdid ilan talYa n tbejḍut amm is ur izmir ul nnes ad ikmr taqisust ddeY g sxuxn izeglaln ikkan ar ttubelbuḍn s umussu n tudert, zund is iznuccm ad imun d ucabar n imttinn. Ixsey yan itri akeswawat yusiyn asaṛiḍ AmaziY d ufegnan x twengimt nnes d wul nnes. S tmija d tegzut nnes izuzzer mennaw n wazann i imezdaY n iYzwr . Irekwl s timmuzYa d tiffugna.Iḥrref s therḍant (guitare) d tabja (flûte) , ar ittenziz, ar ittazn tisawayin immenzaz
... 
) aẓawan nnes alley ila azizzy (écho) g umaḍal. Ifka i tẓuṛi nnes yat tcamnt (le cachet) inttan s twennaṭ nnes tadelsant.
Ar ittirir i ayt inugga (les consciences) iddern Yif inna nnes d akkᵚ may d igan inna d taytct (femme) . Iney amzzag (selle de haute qualité) n wuṛY , ar issektutur (souder) iYerfan n iYezwr Yif tiffugna . Ar ittagm zeg umedYus (source d’eau chaude) n timmuzYa amm is ira ad yini i ufgan : «Nga yan s mennawn iniln, s icencaln (modèles) unmidn (variés) ». Ila timiwar n unaẓuṛ y
...
ku yan umnnayu tama n isemḍl nnes iddeY iga amm itsn inaẓuṛn umaḍal abelhiz (légendaire). Inḍer «Idir» (mourir subitement) g yan ukud nna g ur ttafan iwdan ad munn d ubeḥlus nnes iddeY ittuskr usttum . Mer ufin wulaw afriwn ad ayllin mar ad munn d tzujra (le cercueil ) nnes s uzdduY nnes amggaru . Mec ibḍa «Idir»d tduyt hatin ad iqqim idder g icba n iwdan iddeY tga tallara nnes acenyal amaziY. Ad t ifced umeYni aha issidf t amaglal nnes anmmazzu. Ad ifek i imalgn d igurad d imnumcn nnes azegẓn .

Taggara n ddurt-agi iɛeddan, i d-tella temlilit tamezwaut n usileɣ n yiɛeggalen n umussu aduklan, i d-tger s annar tddukkla Tadelsant “Itri Uzekka” n taddart n Yixelwiyen. Timlilit-agi n usileɣ tamezwarut, tella-d ɣef usbeddi n usenfar aduklan, i izemren ad d-yawi tadrimt i texriṭ n tidukla. D aduktur Cennan Arezqi, aselmad n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, i d-yellan ɣef lmendad n usileɣ-agi, i d-yeḍran ussan n 04 d 05 deg waggur-a n tuber ideg nella. D tagnit ideg i d-yemmeslay Mass Cennan, ɣef yiswan n
... 
int deg-s tiyaḍ akka kra n wussan. Ma ɣef yiswi n tmelilit-a tamezwarut n usileɣ, yenna-d Mass Bedrani Amar, aselway n tidukla “Itri Uzekka”: “Iswi-nneɣ nekni s usileɣ-agi, d aɛiwen n tddukkliwin iqeddcen deg unnar, i wakken ad sbeddent isenfaren-nsen akken iwulem lḥal. D awelleh-nsen daɣen ɣer teɣbula-nniḍen iseg zemren ad d-skecmen tadrimt. I wakken diɣ, ad nefk i leqdicat-nneɣ udem ussnan, ad nexḍu i cḍeḥ werdiḥ…”.
Mazal yettkemmil wahil n tidukla
Mazal yettkemmil wahil n tddukkla tadelsant “
...
sileɣ-agi. Am wakken diɣ, i yetturaǧu ad d-tili tuffɣa s adrar deffir kan n usileɣ-agi, i wakken ad d-yili usnas deg unnar n wayen xedmen deg usileɣ-a n sin wussan. Asileɣ aneggaru, ad yili d asuffeɣ n tanant n tsellak timenza (secourisme), ara yeddun ɣef tegzi n waggur. Ad tebdu ass n 15 unbir, ad tessali ass n 15 duǧember 2019. D Mass Ali Xeddam, imsileɣ aɣelnaw n tsellak timenza u d aselway n waggur azeggaɣ azzayri n tama-a n At Ɛissa Mimun ara yilin d imsileɣ n tanant-agi n secourisme.
A. A.

Emeutes à Bab el Oued
Catégorie : Actualités | 1 commentaire(s)
Il y a des emeutes à Bab el Oued (quartier d’Alger) depuis 2 jours. Les manifestants ont détruit le concessionaire renault et plusieurs autres magasins.
Si Alger tombe , le pouvoir tombe.
1 Message
hand dit :
Azul merra fellawen.
Tixret asen adh myutchen waygarasen tarwa n Aïcha !
1) Di tefsut n 80, ttferridjen deg negh ; qqaren as : bghan ad ferqen tamurt, a d-erren Fransa ar lzzayer, serghen tavendirt , serghen leqwran, hudden ljamaa, atg.
2) Deg inehvas nnegh ghef izerfan n umdan yaanan akk izayriyen (LADDH) 1985, ttferridjen degnegh. Qaren as : Iqvayliyen d staamar n Fransa iten id ittcewwiken akken ad rwin tamurt n lzayer, atg.
3) Di tefsut taverkant, ttferridjen degnegh u di tmesbanit n tikli n ugdud aqvayli ass n 14 yunyu 2001, ddan-d dudhabu amesbatli aawenen-t, erjemnagh-d s yezra, ewweteh agh-d s-lemwas deg iverdan. Innayasen udavu :" qeccaat-tten ar udran ansa d-kkan, ur d-ttasen ara ar lbehdja nnegh agh tterzen "leqvayel-ffayehin", haaa !
Turi yal yiwen idhebber aqerruy-is. Nekk wi yicban, ma d aqvayli at hammigh, ma d aarav awer d-yegwri yiwen degsen !

Tuǧa
Tuǧa neɣ Toudja d yiwet n temdint d tamecṭuḥt, tezga-d deg twilayt n Bgayet, zedɣen-tt azal n 10.000 n yimezdaɣ. Tamdint-a tezga-d deg umkan ɛlayen (Adrar n Weɣbalu, 1317 M) maca, teqreb ɣer lebḥeṛ am wakken teqreb ɣer Leqṣ̣er akked Bgayet. Imezdaɣ n Tuǧa (Ittuǧen) ttmeslayen yiwet n teqbaylit yettemcabin ɣer tin n Wayt Leqṣ̣er (deg ccerq) akked Wayt Ksila (deg lɣerb), yernu ufiɣ-d deg teqbaylit-nsen aṭas n wawalen ur nessin ara deg tuddar-nneɣ n Tizi Wezzu.
Isem n Tuǧa ad yili yekka-d seg

d yili yisem n Tuǧa yekka-d seg kra n tentala taznatit taqdimt i iɛeddan ɣef Tmurt n Leqbayel.
Yuɣ lḥal, ɣas ma yella taqbaylit mačči d tantala taznatit, maca nezmer ad naf deg-s kra n wawalen i as-d-yekkan seg tmaziɣt taznatit. ɣef umedya, "iccer", "ticcert" akk d "yiccew" kkan-d merra seg tmaziɣt taznatit. D acu kan, icebba-yi Ṛebbi dakken yewɛer ad nẓer melmi i d-kecmen wawalen-a ɣer teqbaylit. Tiqbilin tiznatiyin llant, deg lasel-nsent, d tiqbilin n yimeksawen ay yebdan la ttinigent deg taga
...

ASELMED (SIWEL) —Talatinit ansi i-d teffeɣ tefransist, ur s rran azal di Franṣa, ma d nutni (Adabu n Fṛansa), mmɣen ɣer taɛrabt.
Iqbayliyen yettidiren di Fransa, arraw-nnsen di llakul amenzu (Ecole primaire), ṭfen iseɣ si lakul i wakken ad ɣren kra n tutlayin tijenṭaḍ, garasent, taɛrabt.
Akken walaɣ, ur cukkeɣ ara llan Iseɛudiyen neɣ Iɛraben tidiren di Fṛansa, xas ma llan, aken walaɣ ad ɣren tutlayin yessaẓen ɣr zdat.
Tamuɣli-w, tenna-d belli Fṛansa, imi terna tutlayt n Taɛrabt deg uɣrbaz, ur cu
... 
ka ad tekcem di tdukli n tmura tiɛrabin yedduklen, Fransa terra akk izzayriyen d aɛraben, tesxerb assen allaɣ d laṣl nnsen alarmi kerhen ula d tamurt n imawlan nnsen.
Iqbayliyen yettidiren dinna, di Fṛansa, walit kan ma tebɣam arraw nnwen ad wexren si tlufa n rebrab, ur ilaq ara ad issinen Taɛrabt, ar a ten yawin srid ɣer idlisen d tiliwa n tkerkass d ccwal uran waɛraben s taɛrabt. Selket arraw nnwen, si cwal, neɣ ad tuɣalem akka ar zdat d imawlan n irebraben.
di lkaɣeḍ agi i cuddeɣ deg wadlis a
...
widak ig rebban Izzayriyen s taɛrabt. Ur cukkeɣ ara tɣefl-em af taggara, amek taɛrabt tečča taqbaylit nneɣ.
03) Widak ar ad yččaren lakkulat n taɛrabt di Fṛansa, banen anwa. D widak yumnen s yeswi n waɛraben n ibaɛɛtiyen. yal aɣref isɛa iswi-nes. Aɣref aqbayli abrid is iban ula d netta.
Slemdet iw arraw nnwen Taqbaylit ara ten yawin ɣɣer wannar n tmusni d tikli n imezwura nneɣ. D ayagi kan ara ten icudden ɣer tmurt nnwen taqbaylit, d winna kan id abrid ittawin.
Slimane Hallah

Lwis XIII
Lwis XIII "uɣdim" mmis n Hanri IV akked Marie n Médicis ,ilul ass n 27 cutmber 1601 de waṣuk n Fontainebleau yemmut ass 14 magu 1643 deg aṣuk amaynut n Saint-Germain-en-Laye ,tisulya as akked tgeldunt anna n lɛerc n tutrict d aggemmu id yewwin sin warrac yiwen d Lwis XIV ad yeṭṭfen amḍiq is ma d wayeḍ Philippe duc d'Anjou ad yesenzu axxam n Orléans. Lwis XIII d agellid afransis si 1610 ar 1643 , tagelda as ɣmeṛ ɣef tecreḍ usenḍuḍeɛ n prutestiyen ,abellen mgar tagelda tutrict, dayen ad iwekden aɣmaṛ d yiɣil iserdasen n tmurt n franca di lber n turuft di tṛad n kṛadet iseggasen.

Aneɣlaf amezwaru, Abdelaziz Djerad, yefkan urag n beddu n tigawt-agi tamɛiwent n Lezzayer akk d Lubnan di tegnitt-agi qessiḥen, iwekked-d ibeddi n Lezzayer, anabaḍ d weɣṛef, akk d wegdud alubnani ama di tegnatin yelhan neɣ d tid iwaɛṛen.
"Seg mi nesla s twaɣit-agi, aselway n Tegduda yumeṛ , mbaɛd mi yemcaweṛ d uselway alubnani Michel Aoun, aceyeɛ srid n uɛawen n weɣṛef alubnani almend usenɣes n wugur-agi-nnes", id-yenna Mas Djerad, am wakken yenna daɣen belli ṛṛay-agi uwanek azzayri ad d-yili s utekki n wayyur azggagh azzayri (CRA) "d ayen d-yettbegginen ibeddi n Lezzayer d watmaten-nnes aɛṛaben d yemselmen di tegnatin tiwaɛṛanin".
Aneɣlaf amezwaru, tella yid-s taselwayt n wayyur azeggaɣ azzayri, Saida Benhabiles, yesmekta-d assaɣen ilqayanen imazrayen yezdin s tegmatt ger Lezzayer d Lubnan, yerna yefka iwellihen i trebbuyaɛ timselkin tizzayriyin akken ad xedment akk ayen iwulmen i wid-agi teṭṭef twaɣit-agi di Beyrut.

25 Daymi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ : ur țḥebbiṛet ara i tudert-nwen, ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara teswem akk-d wayen ara telsem. Acu i gesɛan azal, ț-țudert neɣ d lqut ? D lǧețța neɣ d llebsa ? Tudert tugar lqut, lǧețța tugar llebsa!
26 Walit igṭaṭ ( ifṛax) deg igenwan : ur zerrɛen, ur meggren, ur jemmɛen ula d acemma ɣer ikuffan, meɛna Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan, yețțak-asen-d tamɛict-nsen. Eɛni ur teswim ara akteṛ n yefṛax ?
27 Anwa i gzemren s uḥebbeṛ, ad yernu kra n wussan i leɛmeṛ-is ?
28 Iwacu ara tḥebbṛem ɣef llebsa ? Walit amek i gemmun ijeǧǧigen n lexla : ur zeṭṭen, ur țellmen,
29 lameɛna a wen-iniɣ : ula d agellid Sliman s yiman-is di ccan-is ameqqran, ur yelsi am yiwen seg-sen.
30 Ma yella Ṛebbi islusuy akka leḥcic yellan di lexla ass-agi, azekka ad ițwadeggeṛ ɣer tmes, amek ur kkun-islusu ara ula d kunwi ay imdanen ixuṣṣen di liman ?
31 Kkset anezgum i yiman-nwen, ur qqaṛet ara : d acu ara nečč, d acu ara nsew neɣ d acu ara nels ?
32 Axaṭer ayagi d imejhal i gețḥebbiṛen fell-as. Ma d Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan, yeẓra ayen akk teḥwaǧem!
33 Nadit uqbel ɣef tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi d wayen yellan d lḥeqq, ayen nniḍen meṛṛa d nețța ara wen-t-id yefken.
34 Ur țḥebbiṛet ara ihi i uzekka, axaṭer azekka s unezgum-is weḥd-es. Yal ass s leɛtab-ines!

Ijjen wezgen d ameqqran zi tfeqqaɛ i dasen-yemsaren i Irifiyen, uqɛent di char n Kṭuber. Ad d-nfekker ila tagrawla n Arrif def useggas n 1958, tebda di Kṭuber. Tagrawla-ya i yareddej lmexzen bla arreḥmet di beddu n « uzarug », tejja ayezzim di tnefsiyt n Irifiyen s merra. Nettaf aya deg yizlan-nneɣ, tamuzikt-nneɣ…
Kṭuber d char i di ḥeryen Muḥsin Fikri deg uqamyu n wefraḍ, x-as i d-ikker unhezzi n Arrif. Mindi nettedder adu tili-nnes, ar lexxu ɛad. Zi 28 Kṭuber i d-tebda Taṭrajidiyt n Arrif n yiḍ-a aked lmexzen, ula kter awerni umi ittwaḥebbsen kter zi alef n Irifiyen s lmsibbet n unhezzi.
Qbel-nnes, ittwaneɣ Kamal Lḥessani deg Ayt Buɛiyyac, aterras tuɣa irezzu x lxedmet di tmurt-nnes, yuffu-d ittwaneɣ. Mayemmi ? Imeddukal-nnes ar lux ɛad wer ssinen. Mamec di char-a s yixef-nnes i di yemsar weḥmal n yiɣzar x imezdaɣ n Ddriwec. Yiwwi akid-s igelwan n imezdaɣ, yenɣa ca zzag-sen.
Amezruy n Arrif, d amezruy n tareẓẓiwin, imeṭṭawen, taṭrajidiyt… Wah, s tidet necca aɛmud mliḥ, maca waxxa qaɛ wer nelmid zeg umezruy. D wa d afeqqus. Mala neẓra mamec ttemsurrufen Irifiyen awarni i unhezzi n Arrif, ataf a nefhem ila ɛad ixess-aneɣ a nermed mamec ɣa negg a nexdem. Mamec i nzemmar a nili d nnumru yeqseḥ, mac ɣa negg a nweqqer aya d uya waxxa tili nemsebḍa deg uxarres.
D lweqt n lxedmet. Axarres deg yimal, maḥend a nali tsawent, waxxa tuɛar.
28.10.2020
